One leaked fro:the ceiling AND had a broken handle, and one did not seem to produce any hot water whatsoever. Also, the toilets were often dirty and clogged, and the sinks were full of hair and dirt.

title: Atendeu o que promete!
text:
Já fui sabendo de como era o esquema. Local simples, mas não tivemos problemas. Muito bem localizado, não espere grande atenção dos funcionários.
Quarto muito pequeno, mas tinha cofre e um frigobar. Cama e travesseiros ok, arrumavam a cama todos dos dias.

title: Very bad choice
text:
Worst place to stay.
The staff at the front desk sent us to a wrong room. I had to go down after seeing , we booked a room for 2 people while the staff gave us a room for one person.

The air-conditioning is bad,the room is hot,the bunk bed is shaking and makes noise,  the shared bathrooms are super dirty with broken faucets.
I paid a huge price for this.

title: Location & Value for money
text: This was my second stay at the Westside YMCA - for the price and cleanliness, it cannot be beat. Literally steps from Central Park, and within walking distance to Times Square, 5th Ave, and Columbus Circle subway 3 blocks away connecting you directly to the rest of Manhattan. The rooms are small, but very clean. Modern facilities and friendly staff.

title: Emplacement top !
text: Nous avons passé 8 nuits dans une chambre double (lits superposés). Les chambres sont propres et nettoyées chaque jour avec changement des serviettes de toilette, lits grinçants mais confortables, climatisation, TV, petit réfrigérateur et coffre fort. Le personnel est très agréable. Le petit snack avec boissons chaudes est super pratique. On peut laisser ses valises en consigne (2 dollars/valise). L'emplacement juste en face de central parc et à 2 arrêts de métro de Times square est vraiment top. Boire son café dans central parc chaque matin est un vrai luxe. Les salles de de douches individuelles avec toilette sont propres mais le bémol est qu'elles ne ferment pas à clé. Le code pour indiquer sa présence est de placer sa carte/clé sur le carreau de la porte mais personne ne nous en informe. il peut donc arriver qu'un voyageur non informé ou inattentif ouvre votre porte (ce qui m'est arrivé 2 fois). 2 piscines sont à disposition avec de la très belle mosaïque. Globalement très contente de mon séjour au YMCA.

title: Si buscas dormir barato y céntrico
text:
Teniendo en cuenta que NY es carísimo, es un sitio ideal para conseguir una cama, un baño semicompartido y todo bastantelimpio por un precio asequible (en comparación con hoteles). La situación es excepcional, al ladísimo de central park. 1min walk.
La recepción es un poco caos pero yo tuve un problema con la targeta y pusieron de su parte para solucionarlo

title: They Don't Know How To Run a Hostel or Hotel or Whatever they Call this SORRY
text:
The place is mismanaged to such an extent that it will make your head explode.
Maybe they should just be a gym and stay focused on that. As for the rooms, small. The staff doesn't seem to know what items should be in the room. Is there a refrigerator? is there a remote? A lamp is broken and not plugged in. Beds in bunks are thin no support. Management apologies for mistakes but it is a serious issue of mismanagement and the staff not making sure rooms have working and all appliances. SAD that the YMCA is run like this as a long time supporter of the Y, I'm very dishearten. They make a lot of money from tourists but I guess they are content to make lots of money doing a half --- job. 
The wait when checking in or going back when you find out something is missing or not working in your room is atrocious. Shared Bathrooms have gnats in the showers and are old on the 9th floor. Take a shower down stairs in the gym if you want something cleaner. Worst part they got me confused with someone else and without properly investigating with the video, they knocked on my door and accused me of the "incident". I didn't know what they were talking about. Upon leaving I inquired at the desk with the security guard and it turns out it was someone else who gave out the same room # but looked entirely different. No apology given to me by the management but that shows another example how they treat paying guests. Sometimes when you attempt to save money, you pay with your time and added inconvenience. There is no reasons for bad hotels/hostels in NY to change because tourists will pay to be treated awfully.

title: Pra quem quer economizar
text:
Este é um hotel mais antigo, mas muito bem localizado, num bairro muito bom, bem residencial, de frente ao central park e bem perto do metrô. O hotel é bem grande, com academia, sauna, piscina e área social. Fiquei num quarto individual com banheiro compartilhado. 

O quarto era bem simples, mas tinha tudo o que precisava, uma cama e uma tv. Saía bem cedo e voltava bem tarde, então pra mim atendeu bem. A única coisa ruim é que não tinha cofre, mas guardava tudo na mala e trancava com cadeado e deu tudo certo. Na época não precisei usar o ar condicionado porque estava fresco a noite, então não sei opinar se o ar funcionava ou não.

Antes de reservar, fiquei meio assim com o banheiro compartilhado. Mas não tive problemas, era tudo bem limpo até. Quase não encontrava com muitas pessoas lá, então era sempre bem tranquilo.

As vezes se ouvia algumas pessoas que ficavam conversando no corredor, mas nada que atrapalhasse. O hotel também não oferece café da manhã, mas tem um starbucks bem pertinho.

Bem perto também se encontram algumas lojas de departamento como a Best Buy e Bed bath and beyond, além de um shopping com mercado.

Se você quer economizar com hotel em NY, quer ficar em uma ótima localização e não se importa em ficar num quarto sem muito conforto, mas simples. Eu recomento este hotel.

title: Waste of money
text:
i have never experienced something so bad in my life. The worst hotel in the world !!!!
Room was dirty, we didnt say there even for 10minutes! Now they dont want to give our money back.... waste of time and money!

title: Prijs kwaliteit perfect in verhouding
text: Ligging is perfect, je zit op een mooie maar rustige plek naast Central Park. Times Square is voor fitte mensen op loopafstand, anders pak je heel eenvoudig de metro. (kost bijna niks) Kamers zijn een beetje gedateerd evenals de gemeenschappelijke toiletten en douches. Vind maar eens iets in New York voor die prijs waar het wel in orde is. Het hotel biedt goede faciliteiten, bijvoorbeeld de fitness zaal.

title: Excellent stay and wonderful hospitality
text:
I stayed here for a couple nights. I chose a semi private room. The room was small and limited in interior design but had all the important things one would need. The bathrooms are shared, however, there are several bathrooms in one floor so you always have one available for yourself. Once you're a guest at the hotel you are given access to the fitness center, swimming pool, and basketball court, which for me was awesome since I like doing sports. 
The staff are also great and very friendly! However, I did oversleep by accident when I was in fact suppose to check out at 11:30. At 12:30 someone came to my room and started banging on the door. He then used the keycard and told me in a harsh tone to get out of bed since I didn't book the room for another day. I told him ok I'll be down shortly. Other than this unpleasantry, the stay was great.

title: West Side YMCA
text: Останавливаюсь в данном хостеле уже  в третий раз! Отличнейшее расположение,всего в 5 шагах от центр парка.За свои деньги,лучший вариант в данном районе...учитывая цена на проживание в Нью Йорке )) Собственно в комнату приходил только ночью и с утра опять уходил! Душ и туалет на этаже,всё достаточно чисто! Номера маленькие,но для варианта переночевать то,что нужно! Столик,зеркало,тв,вешалки,стул в комнате есть! Wi-Fi работал всегда хорошо!В хостеле есть бесплатный бассейн и сауна! В низу есть не большой магазин со всякими снэками и кофе,оч удобно утром! Из аэропорта максимально просто добираться,метро приезжает на каламбус сёркл и от туда до хостела 5 минут пешком!

title: Room 1003 Double Bed w| Private Bath
text: Opening the door to our room sounded as if we were kicking it in. The room was small as expected, the soft/flimsy mattress on steel rails, lacked support, every small movement was felt. There was an 1.7 cu. ft. compact refrigerator, an small tv (possibly an 19inch), and an 3 drawer dresser, also an open area for hanging clothing. The bathroom door was unevenly installed, therefore each time it was pulled up it became jammed and was loud upon opening and closing. Our shower door wouldn't close, we had to wedge a towel in it to make it close and the soap holder in the shower had green rust on it. The water took 10-15 minutes to get hot but once hot it was fine. They didn't provide provide wash cloths, just bath towels and lastly, housekeeping just changed the bed linen and disposed of the trash in the bathroom. No noise complaints, walls seemed to be nicely soundproofed. We probably wouldn't stay here on our next visit to New York, even though it's close to Starbuck and is in a great location.

title: Excellent place in the heart of NYC for tight budget
text:
Located in Central Park West, 5 min away from Columbus Circle, 15/20 min from Times Square, Central Park just across the street... Perfect location!
The room is small with A/C and TV, bunk beds (bedding is average, noise with every move you make). No sink or minifridge. But it's OK for rest and sleep. It was quiet and that's a real plus in NYC.
Bathroom is fitted with 3 showers and 3 toilets, not enough in the rush hours. Towel is provided and changed every day.
The pool free access is a real pro.

Don't expect a youth hostel with outings like pubcrawls... It's more a hotel with hostel standard.
If you're looking for a quiet and perfect location, not too demanding regarding comfort, it's really the place to be.

title: Good Location and Safe, Everything Else is Disappointing
text:
The location, right by central park and a major subway intersection, is great for exploring Manhattan. The hostel is also safe/secure for anyone worried about that. 

Everything else is a negative. The staff is hit or miss - some very friendly, others clueless (the guy who checked us in didn't even know that the $30 service fee we were asked to pay was actually a $10/night facilities fee) or rude. 

Most of the showers (for the men, at least) on the 8th and 9th floor lack proper showerheads - that's complete and total cheapness/laziness on the part of the YMCA. The bathrooms are cleaned, but the paper towel wasn't replenished very frequently and the hooks/ledges to put your toiletries are broken/falling off. None of it matters that much, but it all speaks to the idea that this YMCA doesn't care at all, they're just trying to do the absolute bare minimum to get your money. 

Same goes for the bunk beds - not only are they cheaper quality than pretty much any hostel you'll find in most of the world, they haven't even bothered with basic maintenance (tightening screws) to at least try to make the shake/squeak a little less.  

The cheapness continues with the baggage storage. It's only $2 per bag, which isn't that much, but the fact that they charge at all is just them insulting customers and trying to squeeze out every dollar. Oh, and for some arbitrary reason, you're not allowed to store bags overnight. 

If you're looking for a budget private room in Manhattan, it's the cheapest option you're going to find. But it also seems like they know that, so they don't have to care at all.

title: RECOMENDABLE por $ y ubicacion
text:
Estuve alojado por nueve noches en una habitacion single del piso 8. Les comento que la misma era de tamaño adecuado con una silla y un escritorio y tv, reciclada a nuevo como asi todo el piso, la cama era de una plaza pero grande , el colchon de resortes en buen estado, realizaban la limpieza todos los dias. Como defecto es que tiene un baño general por piso (para ochenta habitaciones) con tres duchas , cuatro lavatorios , dos mingitorios y tres inodoros, lo cual si todos vamos al mismo tiempo, cosa que no me ocurrio, se pone dificil, y la limpieza del mismo deberia relizarse con mayor frecuencia. Comwento que hace 19 añops me aloje en el mismo hotel y esta en mejores condicion, en general es recomendable si no te importa lo del baño, ya que por lo precios de los hoteles y el tiempo en que estas en el mismo, vale la pena.La ubicacio es buena , en zona residencia no muy comercial pero a tres cuadras del Columbus Ciecle y los subtes.
Cabe aclarar que no es un hostel ni un hotel, por lo tanto no se puede pedir mas.

title: Worst place ever
text:
I don't know where to start.. I might suffer from heigh expectations but here it goes.. First of all my access card was locked twice on my 3-day stay and I had to explain to the crew in the reception that I did check in but they couldn't find my information (yes like passport and other PERSONAL information - did you guys here about the new GDPR? You should take those things serious...). One more thing to add about the check in was that I booked the room by using Hotels.com, garanteed that I could check in whole day. When I showed up at 9 AM, exhausted from my day long flight, YMCA let me know that I couldn't check in before 2.30 PM. They couldn't find me a room before and when I confronted them the fact that they are cooperating with Hotels.com where other rules are to shown, they didn't seem supeprised at all - what an awfull way to make business. Second, the crew were extremely unprofessional/immature in their way to welcome you and include you. It seems like the place is more friendly to you when you are a local with a membership to spoartsactivities. Speaking of that, the YMCA offers free access to their guests, which sounds good. Problem is just that when you show up to an activity no none is there but again locals who play with other locals = you are not included. Third the roooms are.. I haven't words to describe it.. So ugly and depressive, and smells like I can imagine dead wildebeast would. A prison room is more comfortable from where I am from (and it is not a even a lie). 

So to sum up.. I can't recommend it all! The intention about this place might be good but the standard is so bad in almost every way.

title: самое дешевое что можно найти в центре Манхэттэна
text: говорить о комфорте бессмысленно - вы получите крохотный номер с двухэтажной кроватью и... все. но нет, здесь есть плюсы помимо отличного расположения - к вашим услугам бесплатный бассейн, сауны и спортивный зал! кстати, отправляясь в бассейн, вы обнаружите что душевых там гораздо больше, чем на вашем этаже, оборудованы они лучше, и к вашим услугам фен и шкафчик для вещей - очень удобно. правда, замочек для шкафчика нужно приносить с собой. впрочем, краж замечено не было

title: Buena relación precio calidad
text: Fui en a río de 2013. Está muy bien ubicado, a dos cuadras de Columbus circunstancias, el central park en la esquina. Cerca del centro, del subterráneo. Muy bueno. Me hospedería en cuarto privado. Duchas compartidas. Sin desayuno. Wifi solo en el lobby.

title: Melhor custo benefício de Manhattan
text: Estive por 6 dias hospedada no YMCA e a localização é ótima, a meio quarteirão do central park, a 2 do Columbus Circus. Metrô muito perto, dá pra ir caminhando para a times Square. Ficamos num quarto privativo com banheiro semi privativo. O quarto confortável, com serviço de quarto, o que imaginei não ter, por ser um albergue.Tem cofre e tv no quarto. O banheiro é bom, chuveiro bom, só o único inconveniente é o fato do banheiro não ser no quarto. Mas pelo preço, andar meio corredor pra usar o banheiro é o de menos. Amei, e ficaria de novo, sem dúvida.

title: Eenvoudig
text: Eenvoudig, maar praktisch. Erg centraal gelegen en voor New York betaalbaar. Vriendelijk personeel, openbaar zwembad in zelfde gebouw dat ook door gasten kan worden gebruikt. Met badmuts. Kleine kamers.

title: Relación precio / calidad
text:
Excelente ubicación, a media cuadra del Central Park, a 2 cuadras del metro "Columbus Circle", hermosa zona tanto de día como de noche.
En una ciudad tan cara como lo es Nueva York este lugar fue el mejor precio que encontré en esa zona.
El tamaño de las habitaciones está bien. Tienen heladera, placard, escritorio.
Baños compartidos limpios, poca cantidad para tantas habitaciones, pero en general no tuvimos inconvenientes.
El lugar tiene un comedor grande y un kiosko en su interior.
En general lo recomiendo.

title: Excelente relación precio calidad
text:
Basando mi criterio en ubicación/precio, el West Side YMCA se llevó todos los premios. 
Su localización es excelente, cerca de todo pero en un ambiente distendido y sin tanto bullicio ( como el Times Square). La zona es super segura, con varios negocios cerca. 
Casi todas las líneas de subte te dejan cerca y sino, se puede llegar caminando tranquilamente a muchos lados. 
El lugar es agradable, quizas un poco chica la habitación pero seamos honestos, estando en semejante ciudad solamente se usa para descansar y seguir. 
Los baños estaban limpios y en perfecto estado. Saqué con la opción de habitación con baño semi privado y no me arrepiento, te daban una tarjeta con acceso a baños especiales que los compartías con pocas habitaciones y que raramente estaban ocupados. 
El personal super amable, tienen un pequeño negocio donde podés comprar para desayunar / merendar o picar algo a buen precio ( igual que en los supers de la zona).
Aceptan envio de paquetes con un máximo de una semana de antelación.  
Tiene pileta y gimnasio, pero no utilice esos servicios. 

Si bien si lo comparamos con otros hostels es caro, teniendo en cuenta su ubicación ( y comparando con otros lugares de al zona) me resultó excelente. 

Sin dudas volvería

title: Das richtige für Traveler und Menschen die nur im Hotel schlafen
text: YMCA - ein Name ein Programm und ja es gibt nur Stockbette!!! und Ja die Bäder sind auf dem Gang!!! aber für die Sauberkeit ist jeder selber verantwortlich und wer billig am Central Park wohnen möchten kommt zu " Youg Man chistian Assisiaion"!!! das ist kein Hotel! das ist eine Schule mit interna und Mission! aber da wir nur zum schafen da warenund in der früh von unseren Trips noch geschwind uns im hauseigenen Hallenbad erfrischen wollten war es genau das richtige für uns! Und wer kan schon von sich behaupten im berühmten YMCA übernachtet zu haben????

title: Très bon rapport qualité prix pour NYC
text:
Réservation pour voyage de groupe. 
Hôtel parfaitement situé (Metro, central parc, supermarché à 2 pas).
Chambre rénovée récemment (13e étages), propre avec télé, armoire pour vêtements, bureau, télé et coffre fort. 
Literie correcte et propre (lits fait tous les jours). Serviettes changées tous les jours.

Salles de bain communes (une dixaine de SDB pour l’étage) donc malheureusement parfois sales même si l’hôtel fait le maximum pour les maintenir propres. 

Isolation des chambres très mauvaises (bruits, lumières).

Petit magasin à l’accueil avec café, boissons, viennoiseries, ... 

Salle avec télévision et table pour manger, ...

Bon hôtel dans l’ensemble surtout pour le rapport qualité prix à New-York !!

title: Read the reviews, you know what you're getting
text: Staff were absolutely wonderful; bathrooms obviously not ideal, beds surprisingly comfortable. You can get a cup of boiling water for your own teabags at the shop downstairs. We had a class on the bottom floor and would not recommend that. Overall good for the location but for a similar price we stayed in a Yotel in Boston so either way you're paying for NY.

title: Extremamente precário
text: Localização boa, próximo a Columbus Circle e ao Central Park. Área tranquila e silenciosa. Mas as instalações são péssimas mesmo: colchão ruim, ar condicionado antigo, travesseiros velhos, persiana quebrada, quarto pequeno e mal cheiroso. O pior, porém, é a sujeira do banheiro coletivo. Imundo. Sempre. Muito mal cuidado. Os recepcionistas também não dispõe das informações básicas sobre o transporte na cidade. Além disso, cobram para guardar as malas algumas horas após o check-out. Enfim, uma opção econômica e bem localizada, mas com extremas deficiências.

title: Perfecta localización
text: Localizado en un lugar increíble!al lado de Central Park y menos de 5 minutos de la parada de metro Columbus Circus! Un acierto total! Buenas habitaciones, limpieza buena y opción de baño semiprivado muy recomendable. La unica pega que por la nochela habitación daba a un patio y habia bastante ruido, pero con tapones se descansa perfectamente. Camas cómodas. Además hay piscina y sauna aunque no tuvimos tiempo de usarlo. La cafeteria de abajo tiene buenos precios comparados con el resto de las cafeterias de la zona. Un acierto total!

title: Alright if all you do is sleep there
text:
The property met my expectations in that it had a bed and I could lock the door. That's about it, really. Location is pretty good if you're dividing your time between Central Park and the museums around there and upper Manhattan. The subway is only a couple of blocks away so connecting from there is convenient.

The bed was lumpy and Internet speed was bordering on nonexistent, even for the simplest things. You may as well write Google a letter and ask them to mail you an overview of your inbox. Also, the toilet paper is so thin that it is virtually seethrough. All in all, this is a tired old place but reaps the benefits of its location.

title: Buena localización y ambiente.
text:
El hotel está genial, fue una grata sorpresa.
Nuestra habitación era pequeña pero tenía lo necesario,con aire acondicionado y wifi. El baño es compartido,uno para chicos y otro para chicas en nuestra planta. Tanto la habitación como el baño estaban muy limpios.
Las zonas comunes están muy bien, tiene un gimnasio bastante grande y la piscina tiene diferentes actividades a lo largo del día y siempre hay socorrista. (Hay que llevar gorro de natación,nosotros no lo sabíamos y tuvimos que comprarlo en la recepción por 10$,un poco caro para lo que es).
El staff en general es bastante amable y el hotel siempre está animado.
La localización es inmejorable,en pleno Central park oeste a 3 minutos de columbus circle,dónde se encontraba el metro.

title: location is the best part
text:
It has simple rooms, but they let you use the gym and other amenities.
The worst part could be sharing the bathroom.
In general, it's clean, has a great location in Manhattan, next to Central Park and around 15 blocks away from Times Square. The subway station is justo 3 blocks away.
The staff is really nice.

title: Bárbaro!
text: Estuvimos alojadas una semana con mi hermana, como llegamos antes del check in pudimos dejar las valijas en el lugar. La habitación estaba bien, con aire acondicionado y caja de seguridad. Hay una persona de seguridad en la recepción las 24hs. Con lo cual no había problema en llegar a cualquier hr. Los baños son de uso común pero individuales. Siempre con papel y limpios!

title: Localização e conforto excelentes, mas sem as comodidades de um hostel
text:
Apesar de achar o YMCA uma opção incrível pela localização (literalmente na esquina do Central Park) com o preço que cobram, não sei se poderia ser considerado um hostel, pois faltam algumas áreas comuns como cozinha, área para lavar roupas e um espaço de convivência.

No entanto, acho que seus pontos positivos superam em muito as deficiências. É fácil encontrar lugares para socializar, e tem um whole foods a 300m de lá, mas a possibilidade de ter um quarto super confortável, banheiros individuais e a possibilidade de fazer boa parte da viagem a pé, não tem comparação para mim.

E ainda permite utilizar as dependências da academia e piscina do clube!

title: Très bien situé, prix attractif!
text: A New-York, j'y suis allé pour me promener, le matin, l'après midi, la nuit, pour en prendre plein les yeux et les oreilles. Le YMCA situé en plein centre de Manhattan est idéalement situé. Les chambres sont bien pour dormir, et faire une pause. Les douches et salles de bains sont grande et pratique. Tout est très propre. Si vous ne voulez pas faire flamber votre budget avec l'hébergement, alors c'est parfait.

title: Avoid like plague
text:
Horrible place. Dirty, disgusting, noisy, run down.
Avoid at all cost!
It looks like a run down homeless shelter

The location was good, but that's all the good thing I can tell about this place.

I should have spent some more and go to someplace else

title: Austero, pero en un lugar inmejorable
text: Me gustó mucho la ubicación, es austero, pero limpio. Tiene wi fi gratis y es buena. La pileta de natación es muy utilizada por los gimnastas así que se puede usar con ciertos límites. En general es muy bueno.

title: Great placement!
text:
Perfect if you're only staying a few nights. The beds were not great, but definitely manageable. The placement is great if you want walking distance to Broadway, time Square, Centeral park etc and everything else is easy to access with the underground system. 

The staff were nice and helpful and you can easily store luggage for a few dollars if needed.

title: Good Hostel
text:
The location is the best thing about this hostel. Its right next to central park, and is so easy to get to from all over NYC. The rooms are good for the price, but a bit small. The bathroom is okay. 
The best thing about this hostel is how safe it is. There is security on the main floor, and the bathroom for women needs a code to be able to enter. 

Good hostel for a great price

title: Nicht empfehlenswert
text: Leider sehr dreckiges Bad auf dem Gang und winzige Zimmer mit fürchterlichen Stockbetten. Für den Preis erwarte ich zumindest ein gewisses Maß an Sauberkeit! Wohlfühlen ist leider wirklich etwas anderes...

title: Great location, great price
text:
This is exactly what you expect and pay for; a low budget hostel, but at a great location. 
The building is beautiful and only two blocks from central park and the metro. It is about 15 min walk to Times Square.

Staff is very friendly. 

Rooms are small but clean and sufficient. You only spent time there to sleep, so don’t need a fancy room. 

They provide towels and sheets.

The bathrooms were clean and cleaned every morning. Showers were nice and hot!

If you don’t care for luxery and don’t mind sharing a bathroom, this is the perfect low budget hotel for you!

We would definetely go back.

title: Bom para o que ele se propõe!
text: É um hostel com dormitórios mas também com possibilidade de pegar quartos individuais (quarto pequeno com uma cama de solteiro, tv, ar condicionado, uma mesinha e um mini armário). Durante a minha hospedagem eu peguei um quarto individual. É um hotel/hostel popular, sem luxo, mas com o minimo de conforto. Os banheiros são coletivos, mas usa-se uma pessoa por vez. Tanto banheiro como quarto são limpos. É um lugar organizado. Possui na recepção uma mini "loja de conveniência" que é uma mão-na-roda, pra quem quer comer rápido, barato e não sair do hostel a noite. Todo o prédio é super movimentado a toda hora, gente do mundo todo, de todas as idades. A melhor parte dele é por ser literalmente bem localizado: ao lado do Central Park; próximos aos museus, Starbucks, uma grande loja de conveniência/Farmácia que funciona 24hrs, 15 minutos da Time Square, Brodway, 20 minutos do Empire State, 15 minutos do Rockfeller Center... enfim, se vc tiver disposição pode-se fazer tudo a pé em Manhattan a partir do hotel . A parte ruim do hotel são os demais hospedes, como tudo é pequeno e simples, é constante o bater de portas dos quartos e dos banheiros, conversas pelos corredores, dos quartos é possível ouvir claramente os passos de quem anda pelos corredores... mas no fim você esta tão cansado do dia todo fora do hotel que nem dá muita bola. Wifi funciona bem. Não tem café da manhã (o que é comum nos EUA), o chuveiro é bom. Fica a 60 minutos do Aeroporto de JFK e 60 min do Newark. Em geral eu recomendo, me atendeu bem, dentro do preço que cobram.

title: Horrible experience, a real nightmare !!!
text:
Basic room but so small, but it is not the worst: it was humide, smelled bad, the toilets cannot be flushed properly. It was so disgusting, yuk!!! Every morning, the water in the toilets was brownish. The "things" you flush away come back... I felt so sick. It does not worth the price at all. I have have taken pictures and a video to prove that it's not a lie.
You'd better run away and select an Airbnb for that price !!! 
The corridor is noisy as nobody cares about the others... People knocking at the doors or yelling in the corridors.
The only positive point is the location: next to Central Park and Columbus circle/Lincoln MTA stations.

title: Non recommandable pour séjour en groupes.
text: Si l’hôtel est bien situé, l'accueil laisse grandement à désirer parfois même désagréable. Hébergée avec un groupe (34 personnes), les chambres sont exigus, manquent de propreté. Le couchage est sommaire, sans rangement adéquat. Bien que les lits soient faits tous les jours et relativement confortables, les serviettes ne sont pas renouvelées quotidiennement. Les sanitaires collectifs de notre étage sont insuffisants, manquent d'hygiène et d'intimité (rideau au douche, loquet de porte des WC non fonctionnel). Je déconseille vivement cet établissement pour un séjour en groupe. Enfin la consigne des bagages pour le dernier jour n'a pas été possible.

title: Adequate .
text:
Budget was the chief motivation for staying at 'The Y' I wanted a cheap single room - and this is not easy to come by in NYC. I paid around £70 a night for this. 

Pros: comfy bed; clean linen; good locker rooms, with hairdryers; telly; little caf that gave away free hot water for my own teabags; easy to arrive late; easy to come and go.

Cons: Really rubbish windows with draughty plastic inserts that accommodate the air conditioning unit - these can mean that noise outside is loudish; small bathrooms with revealing shower doors or flimsy plastic curtains (different on each floor); unpleasant rule that if you want to use the pool you must wear a horrible swimming hat, that they can sell you (information not apparent in the publicity); left luggage needs a $2 ticket (information not made explicit in the instruction/room folder); staff were not very friendly (exception being the late night security guy).

This being said, I loved the location, which enabled me to take an early morning walk in Central Park each morning. There was a great organic supermarket in the shopping centre at the nearby Columbus Circle and also a vegan fast food place in the subway area Turn-style Market.

 I found the room comfortable to crash in, when I was exhausted - so it was a good base. However, I did need to rearrange it because it was too noisy and draughty to have the bed next to the window.

There is a real mix of people staying there, at any one time - all ages, so it was comfortable to be there as a solo mature woman.

Would I stay again? Yes, certainly (but I do think they need to invest in the updating of the windows and bathrooms. The place was packed - so they must have the money for it.

title: Go to place to stay in NYC
text: I have stayed here quite a few times. For overnights in NYC trips w friends. And also on a longer term basis several years ago while working in NYC. Its certainly not a five star resort... its shared bathrooms "dorm style " for most part. Its clean,  and staff is very friendly! If you're on a budget, and need a place to crash for a night ok r two in NYC I'd recommend it. One I'd the great perks that I truly enjoy is you're able to use the fitness center and pools.  Yes pool two of them! Very few NYC hotels have pools so west side having two available to guests is a def perk.  There's a little cafe on site, ok place to grab breakfast in the am. Its also location wise perfect few blocks ....from Columbus circle where you can get subway. One block from central park!!!  Like I said,  it's nothing fancy but, it's a place to lay your head at night to enjoy NYC! I will of course return again.

title: A GREAT VALUE
text: Listen, if you're staying at the YMCA, it's probably because you want or need to save money. So my review is based on the VALUE received. First of all, it's located a 3 minute walk from two different Subway stations and one block from Central Park. The neighborhood is quite upscale, and one feels safe. Secondly, it's clean enough. It's not spotless, but it's clean. It smells fresh and there's no trash lying about. The room I stayed in was about 10 feet x 12 feet. Big enough for a desk and a twin bed. There's a safe and a sturdy lock on the door. The bed was OK, definitely a bargain-priced mattress. There was 1 towel in the room. The bathroom was about four doors down the hall. There were 3 baths on floor 13, and each bath was complete: shower, toilet, sink. One can lock the door and have the whole thing to oneself. One of the baths was permanently locked the whole weekend which left two baths available. I never had trouble accessing the bath, but I got up early and got home late. On Saturday night, I found that some pig had peed all over the toilet seat, but that was the ONLY time I had to clean up before I was able to use the toilet. Nonetheless, it was off-putting and really set my teeth on edge. There was plenty of hot water. On Sunday morning all baths were occupied, so I took the elevator down to the women's locker room on the 3rd floor and used the facilities there. The locker room bathroom is much larger and in fact cleaner. Access to towels and hair dryers. The bedroom was a bit warm, so I had to run the window unit AC around the clock which kept it comfortable, but seemed wasteful as it was 50F outdoors. There was almost no noise from the halls, even though my room was across the hall from the elevators. There's a nice cafe downstairs with really good tea, coffee, pastries, yogurts, fruit, etc. Enough to get you started for the day. I didn't use the gym or swimming pool. Most guests were in their 20's and there seemed to be a lot of guests from other countries. I ordered dinner through GrubHub which was promptly delivered to the lobby where they would call you to come down and get it. I would definitely go back.

title: Not improved from my last visit
text: I am not a big fan of the West Side YMCA, but I was making a quick trip into NYC to go to the opera, and the location was convenient.  It used to be pretty cheap - but not so anymore.  Rooms are spartan, no carpet, no hooks on the walls, no door on the closet and the bed had wheels so when you sat on it, it banged against the wall.  Outlets did not work; I had to unplug the lamp to charge my phone.  Hallways smelled slightly of urine and the one bathroom for the entire floor (with several corridors of rooms) was cramped, over-heated and a bit grotty.  No lounge area to sit in.  WiFi worked well.  I was there for less than 12 hours, but I would not return, regardless of the convenient location. Cheaper (and nicer) to go uptown to the HI Hostel or Hotel Broadway.

title: La colmena
text:
1. La ubicación es inmejorable. En central Park y al lado de la estación Columbus.

2.Rodeado de supermercados,restaurantes y todo lo que necesites.

3. El hotel( más bien hostel). Ruidoso, las habitaciones parecían colmenas, todas pegadas, por ende ruidoso, con limpieza bastante deficiente, tanto en baños como en las habitaciones. 
Me encontré cosas en los baños que mejor no os cuento. 
La habitación la limpiaban por encima o ni eso, y debajo de la cama había pelusas como algodones de azúcar. La cama bastante mala.

4. El personal bien en general, alguno había desayunado vinagre pero casi todos encantadores.

5. Gimnasio, piscina, tienda y bar.Correcto.

6. Precio unos 53 Euros persona y día. 

*Si vuelvo a la gran manzana buscaré otra opción aunque haya que coger metro*,para lo que es decepciona bastante.

title: Bonne auberge
text:
Les + : le prix attractif ; l’emplacement ; salle de sport gratuite et piscine ; ouvert 24h/24 ; chambre faite tous les jours + serviettes changées ; douches et WC propres !

Les - : chambre soit trop froide soit trop chaude ; manque de bol on était en face des toilettes et insonorisation pas top ; wifi moyenne ; pas de sèche cheveux

title: Ótimo custo benefício
text: As acomodações são simples, mas atendem a necessidade de quem passa o dia na rua. Os banheiros são limpos e suficientes para as quantidades de quartos em cada andar. É possível utilizar as dependências, além de ter um estoque para quem for fazer compras e mandar entregar. O prédio fica em frente ao Central Park e ao lado do metrô. São 10 min andando até a Times Square e o atendimento foi excelente.

title: Great if you don't EVER use a bathroom
text:
The hostel is very well located and our room, while basic and somewhat dated, was quite nice: clean sheets, comfortable size, well-lit, aircon, TV, no-frills safe, a big desk table. My mattress was not the best but I had no trouble sleeping either. Staff was always nice and helpful. 
The big disappointment was the bathrooms. Firstly, there was only 1 bathroom for a 70-room floor (we were relatively close to it but some rooms were more than 60 meters/200 feet away...). Then, said bathroom had ony 3 stalls and 3 showers. The stalls had one hook to hang stuff but no rest where e.g. leave your keycard or tampons while you tend to your business; there was also no trash cans in the stalls so you had to carry your used higiene product out and use the bin at the oposite corner of the bathroom. One of the stalls did not close/lock. The showers are directly opposite the washbasins i.e. they have NO privacy but a flimsy curtain; no place to leave your stuff save one little hook per shower; water splashes just sit on the floor between showers and basins and ventilation is clearly insufficient which means by the end of the day the place looks disgusting until well into the next day when the one cleaning took place. 
So, 4 stars for room and location, 1 for the bathroom.
Although it was really price-convenient, I'd think long and hard before staying here again as the bathrooms were simply not up to standards.

title: Nice hostel with superior gym facilities
text: I visited the Y with my school class that studies fitness, and both I and my fellow students were very pleased with the excellent gym facilities and truly superior  and variated group exercise classes. I was especially fond of the yoga classes. Many times a week you have the opurtunity to practice mysore asthanga under an excellent teacher. In addition to this great gym, this hostel can brag about their location. Just seconds away from the beautiful central park and a huge metro station that conects you to the rest og this  facinating and alive City. I would definetly recommend staying at YMCA

title: Ubicación a metros de Central Park West
text:
Si buscas un lugar barato y con ubicación en el Upper West Side aplica perfecto. 
Destacable, la relación costo beneficio, es perfecta. 
Las habitaciones son MUY pequeñas, con cuchetas, y la limpieza no es su fuerte, si bien nos hicieron la habitación todos los días, en los pasillos había olor feo (como a sucio), los baños del piso 8 donde estuvimos, eran normales. Hay pisos como el 13 y 12 que están renovados y hechos a nuevo, quizás las habitaciones también están mejor, pero no lo se porque no las vi, del piso 11 al 8 que es el Guest House, es vetusto, 
Lo mas rescatable son las instalaciones del club, es decir se puede utilizar todas las instalaciones de club, piscina, gimnasio, clases, vestuario, duchas, sauna seco y húmedo, estas instalaciones son excelentes, muy limpias, todo funciona perfecto y vale la pena. El wifi es básico, puede haber momentos que la propia red tranque algunos sitios por seguridad, no tiene desayuno, pero hay un café y comedor para poder tomar un café con un sandwich en caso que no quieran desayunar en otro lado.

title: Très bien situé !
text: Assez modeste, en lits superposés non attachés au mur ( juste l’horreur la nuit il. E faut pas trop bouger...) et avec des sanitaires sans propreté irréprochable, cet hôtel dispose d’une âme d’auberge étudiante, avec des services sportifs de bonne qualité et une situation rêvée au cœur de Manhattan. Bref, si on va dans cet hôtel, ce n’est certainement pas pour son confort de chambre mais bien pour profiter de son emplacement.

title: Great Location
text: They have daily maid service. The rooms are basically equipped with a tv, desk chair and bed. The staff is very friendly and outgoing. They are very helpful. The location is excellent. Close by Central Park, Lincoln center, and steps away from public transportation and tourist attractions.

title: Goed!
text: Uitstekende ligging naast central park. Prijs valt ook heel goed mee voor New York. Badkamer is gedeeld op de gang maar was nooit druk, zelfs niet op de ‘drukke’ uren ‘s ochtends en ‘s avonds. Heel goede gym en basketzaal ook gratis te gebruiken. Ideaal voor jongeren.

title: Budget hostel
text:
I must start by saying the location of this hostel is amazing! Right next to Central Park and the nearest subway station is only 3 blocks away. We got a 7 day unlimited metro card which meant we could travel all over the city.

However, the rooms are very basic - our room had a narrow bunk bed, desk and chair. It was clean but felt very dated. The shared bathrooms were fine but could do with being cleaned more than once a day considering the number of people using them. I would suggest bringing flip flops to use them!

If you are looking for somewhere cheap and well located, this fits the bill. If you want a room to relax in, this is not the place for you.
I would definitely consider staying here again if I was travelling on a budget.

title: Good Single Room
text:
I stayed here back in April 2015 (my first visit to the big apple). The room was very small only had a bunk bed and a desk with a fan on that didnt work. The air con was outdated and occasionally worked, but had to keep the window open due to there being a heat wave.
There was limited floor space to put our suitcases and to get our things out of them.
We didnt spend much time in the room due to exploring the city but it did it's job for what we paid for (around £600 for 7 nights). 
The staff were helpful and friendly and it was in a good location in the city.

The big downside to this place was the massive shared bathrooms for all the rooms.

Overall a good place to stay on a budget.

title: Accommodation
text:
Worst mattress I have ever tried to sleep on!!! 
I was taking a nap for 10 minutes and woke up with a sore lower back. In response to that problem the receptionist sent people to replace it, but they got an even worse one.
Afterwards, another receptionist tried to give a lame excuse that since it's a hostel there's nothing to be done, and even quiet me down when I tried to give my opinion.

title: Excelente ubicación a módico precio
text:
Excelente ubicación en pleno Central Park con muy buenos servicios y personal amable y simpático. 
Las habitaciones son limpias al igual que el baño, que aunque compartido, está muy bien.
No llegue a probar ningún servicio adicional, pero hablaban maravillas y muchísima gente empleándolos.

title: Good single room
text:
I stayed there beginning of Christmas. 
I think I got very lucky. Did not have to wait to checkin. Got a good quiet room. Clean. BO BED BUGS. Good view. 

However, bathroom were pretty dirty. Shower door are pretty transparent :s

Some rooms are next to the toilet and pomp which are very noisy. Must be horrible room to stay at. Probably ask when booking for a quiet one as I did. 

Location was absolutely perfect amazing !

title: Quick Christmas Trip
text: I stayed here back in December with my 7 year old for a weekend. I have stayed at the Vanderbilt prior to this stay and would say I prefer the Westside location. It is directly across from Central Park and a couple hundred feet from Lincoln Center. Easy walk to see the Nutcrakcer and some nice restaurants. This is  a great location in the winter as it also only steps to the Christmas Shops and ice skating at Central Park. However, this location is far less inviting and the bathrooms were awful. One toilet on the whole floor was working at this time. The showers had less privacy then the Vanderbilt and there was no minifrdge in the room either. For a hostel and the price I would stay here again but I would likely chose the Vanderbilt for its cleanliness.

title: Emplacement de rêve
text:
Superbe endroit. Propre mais quelque peu bruyant.
Après tout il s’agit de NY!

380$ us pour 2 nuits dans Manhattan c’est vraiment un bon prix.

Vous êtes à 1 min de marche de Central Park et à 10 mins de marche de Time Square.

Je vous conseille de vous apporter des bouchons pour dormir si vois avez le sommeil fragile puisqu’il y a beaucoup de vas et viens dans l’hôtel.

Le stationnement est juste l’autre côté de la rue au coût de 55$ us par 24h.

Bon séjour

title: Bueno
text: Nos alojamos del 4 al 11 de este mes, el hotel tiene una buena ubicación, es barato y pintoresco. Tuvimos inconvenientes con la calefacción, ya que se apagaba o tiraba frío, considerando el frío que hace en esta temporada en la ciudad, deberían mejorarlo. La habitación es pequeña pero cómoda, hay muchos baños y casi nunca hay nadie (por lo menos a nosotros nos pasó eso). Reciben paquetes de amazon gratis, pero el que los recibe no es muy amable y sabiendo que la mayoría de los que van hablan inglés pero algunos no, deberían ser más abiertos a entender a los latinos. De todos modos el hostel está bueno para alojarse con amigos o familia (en mi caso fue con mi hermano)

title: 壁が薄い
text: 壁が薄いので外の音がすごく聞こえます。部屋の中は通常のビジネスホテルのような感じです。ニューヨークでこの値段ではしょうがないのかなと思う価格相応ではないかと思います。

title: Эконом-вариант
text:
Нормальный хостел. С таким расположением и за такую цену, наверное, не найти. Через дорогу Центральный парк, в 5-15 минутах 2 станции метро разных линий. Рядом есть магазины, кафешки. До достопримечательностей и основных музеев нужно добираться на транспорте. Сам хостел располагается в историческом здании, в котором раньше была школа. Видимо с тех времён и повелось, что там все время дети, какие-то секции спортивные, как я поняла. Зато, есть бассейн, которым можно пользоваться бесплатно, по будням с 5, а в выходные с 6-ти утра. Нормальный бассейн на 4 дорожки. Также, на 1-ом этаже есть магазинчик, где можно купить кофе и перекусить, удобно. Также, на 1-ом этаже есть "зал ожидания", стоят столики, где можно подождать заселения или перекусить. Там же стоят компьютеры, тут за денежку можно пользоваться интернетом. Но необходимости не было, их бесплатный wi fi летал, я даже фильмы смотрела. Персонал странноватый, им вообще нет до постояльцев никакого дела. Главное при входе, показывать карточку, которую дают при заселении. Я жила на 11 этаже, в одноместном номере. Номер крошечный,но жить можно. Три небольших окошка, кровать, тв, стол, стул, комод и лампа. Для одежды углубление в стене с перекладинами и вешалками. Дают 2 полотенца и мыло, полотенца меняют. Самый большой минус номера по-моему мнению, в нем очень холодно. Одеяло тонкое, из окон дует. Зато из окон вид хороший. Туалеты и души разделены на мужские и женские. Вход по коду, который дают при заселении. 3 туалета, 3 душа, очереди не было. Но все хлипкое, ручки отваливаются. В целом, на несколько ночей вполне подходит.
P.S. это описание хостела, который на 63-ей улице. На сколько я знаю, а НЙ есть ещё один с таким названием.

title: Excelente ubicación
text: Me encanto la locación. Es muy centrico y seguro. La habitación es pequeña, pero acorde con requerido y precio. Definitivamente regresaría a quedarme allí. Tiene cerca la estación de metro, restaurantes, mall y al frente del central park que mas puedes pedir

title: PAS DE CUISINE
text: Je pensais que pour une auberge de jeunesse, il y aurait au moins une cuisine. Mais il n'y a rien pour se faire au moins un petit repas. Par contre, la piscine n'est pas vraiment necessaire. On ne va pas à New York pour la piscine !!!!!

title: Awful place to stay!
text:
We stayed in the hostel/hotel whilst on a school trip from the UK. Whilst we didn't expect anything amazing before we went, i was frankly shocked with the disgrace we were given to stay in. Our door had to be forced locked, our radiator was broken, our room was so small we could hardly fit both me and my friends case in the room. The beds were highly uncomfortable and to top it off the ladder would not connect to the top bunk. We also found a small rusty pin in our bunk on the second night! The bathrooms were small, and very uncomfortable to use. The showers were see through and when sharing with strangers made for an awkward experience. Only 2 of the 3 toilets worked which made for long queues. It became very crowded at a night time and early mornings. 

Overall, i believe that if you are staying in a beautiful place like New York, you should spend a bit more money on a nicer experience in a nicer hotel. Will not be returning!

title: Bom, excelente localização e barato
text: Lugar muito bem localizado, a meia quadra do Central Park. Fiquei em um quarto com uma cama de solteiro, frigobar e ar condicionado, paguei $45,00 a diária. Lugar seguro, limpo, somente o banheiro que era coletivo, mas era grande, estilo de shopping, com cabines individuais para banho. Recomendo!

title: Location, Location!!
text: You can't get better than this location. Sure, you share a bathroom and you sleep in a bunk bed but HEY this place is cheap so get over it!! Recommend it for a young adventurer on a budget. Catch the sub anywhere in the city no problems..

title: Great location
text: Location is great, right next to central park and close to Times Squares, Whole Foods, shopping, subway, etc. The place itself is ok. The room had a tv, desk, heater and a/c. There was a lot of noise coming from the heater at night (only the first two nights), very annoying. I was glad it stopped after that. The shared bathrooms were not that good (I believe I was on the 8th floor). There were 3 toilet stalls only one with a working lock. Also 3 showers of which 2 worked. Luckily I never had to wait. There is however also a gym, swimmingpool etc down stairs but I didn't go there. If you're not in the room a lot, it's fine. And there is roomkeeping every day to replace towels and leave you soap.

title: MUY BIEN UBICADO, DEJARON MUY CHICOS LOS CUARTOS Y NO ES TAN BARATO
text: El bar es completo, pero cierra muy temprano, la ubicacion muy buena, la pileta y el gym excelente, el dormitorio muy chico, baños y limpieza muy bien, personal bien. precio podria ser mas bajo, en gral bien, volveria si no encuentro algo mejor.

title: Muy buen Hostel !!!
text: No soy de ir a hostel, pero teniendo en cuenta que en new york el alojamiento en malo y caro, que un hotel tenga baño privado es casi un lujo, es muy bueno opción considerar este hostel. Las habitaciones son pequeñas como en casi todo new york, pero es limpio y si vas a recorrer todo el dia, esta mas que bien para dormir. Los baños son compartidos pero cada piso tiene 4 o 5 baños, las puertas tienen un luz que indican sin estan libres o no y las puertas se abren con tarjeta magnetica, ademas los limpian todo el tiempo. Tambien la ubicacion es muy buena, a media cuadra de donde comienza el central park en el barrio de Lincold square.

title: Muy buena relación precio calidad
text: Nos hospedamos en diciembre 2017/enero 2018; el personal fue amable pero hasta ahí nomas; llegamos antes del horario de check in pero por usd 2 pudimos dejar las valijas hasta hacer el check in. Nos hospedamos en una habitación doble privada, la habitación es pequeña, una cucheta, escritorio (sin silla) y una cajonera. El servicio de limpieza excelente y super amable. En la planta baja  hay un Deli donde podes comprar para comer, los precios bastante bien y super amables quienes atiende, hay ademas un lugar en el hostel donde comer viendo televisión si no quieres comer en la habitación. Para dormir y descansar mas que excelente; su ubicación es muy buena, esta a dos cuadras de la baja de metro en Colombus Circle, hemos vuelto tarde en la noche y super tranquila la zona. Lo recomiendo.

title: It's fun to stay at the Y.M.C.A.
text:
It's fun to stay at the Y.M.C.A.
You can get yourself clean
You can have a good meal
You can do whatever you feel.

Young man, Are you listening to me
I said, young man, what do you want to be
I said, young man, you can make real your dreams

but you've got to know this one thing.
No man, does it all by himself
I said, young man, put your pride on the shelf

And just go there, to the Y.M.C.A.
I'm sure they can help you today
It's fun to stay at the Y.M.C.A.

It's fun to stay at the Y.M.C.A.
They have everything for young men to enjoy.
You can hang out with all the boys.

It's fun to stay at the Y.M.C.A.
It's fun to stay at the Y.M.C.A.
You can get yourself clean
You can have a good meal

You can do whatever you feel.
Young Man, I was once in your shoes
I said, I was down and out with the blues

title: BOA LOCALIZAÇÃO
text: Hostel muito bem localizado, em frente ao Central park e ao lado do colombus circle e estação de metrô, possui uma grande infraestrutura pois funciona como um clube também. Quartos bem pequenos, mas o suficiente para quem vai só para dormir. Banheiro compartilhados mas sempre limpos, atendentes simpáticos e prestativos.

title: Chi si accontenta gode
text: Bisogna accontentarsi: se vuoi stare a 10 minuti a piedi da Times Square pagando relativamente poco è l’unica cosa che si può dire. Stanze piccole e un po’ sporche, letti traballanti, bagni abbastanza puliti (dipende dal momento della giornata, il miglior orario per farsi la doccia è dopo pranzo oppure subito prima delle 20, quando in genere passano a pulire). Staff abbastanza cordiale. Se ci fosse più attenzione alla pulizia di bagni e camere avrei dato anche 4 pallini. Ripeto: se siete soli o con amici va anche bene, accontentandosi, in coppia lo sconsiglio. Ben fornito il piccolo bar dove poter fare colazione la mattina. Piscina e palestre grandi e attrezzate.

title: Excelente ubicación, la atención del front desk pésima
text:
A pesar de los esfuerzos hechos por Francisca, la gerente de reservaciones del YMCA WESTSIDE., el personal de recepción encabezado por Day Vázquez se llevan el premio a la antipatía, falta de atención al cliente, tacto, y seguiría nombrando las carencias de este empleado para tratar con turistas. Los otros que se llevan la medalla de plomo son los que están antes de la recepción y piden cada vez que uno entra mostrar la llave electrónica. Hay maneras y maneras de hacerlo. Luego de tres semanas descubrí que la mayoría de ellos hablaba español. Pero pocos o casi ninguno lo hizo.
Lo mejor la ubicación.
Pero buscando se pueden conseguir otros precios.
No volveré

title: Mejor de lo que esperaba
text: Empecemos por lo mejor, la ubicación es inmejorable, puedes llegar en autobús y te deja en la esquina y en metro son dos cuadras desde Columbus circle, a una cuadra de central park. El lugar es limpio y seguro, aunque el guardia de la primera noche fue muy grosero puesto que llegamos antes del check in y según el fue muy amable porque nos dejó estar ahí en el lobby refugiándonos del frío sin embargo mi esposa se estaba quedando dormida y la despertó diciendo que era un favor que estuviéramos ahí pero que no podía dormir, a lo que preferimos esperar en la calle, los baños son limpios aunque en dos ocasiones me tocó mala suerte ya que un drenaje de la regadera estaba tapado y no es agradable sentir el agua estancada en los pies,  y en otro baño el lavabo presentaba el mismo problema, las habitaciones son cómodas, pequeñas pero muy acogedoras y pensé que los colchones al tener 10 CM de grosor iban a ser muy incómodos pero resultó que no lo eran tanto como imaginaba. La calefacción había veces que te hacía sudar de tan alta que estaba, en otras ocasiones no era suficiente. En la habitación nos hacían la cama y cambiaban toallas sin embargo jamás nos recogieron la basura. A pesar que estaba lleno el hostal siempre hubo cupo en los baños, por las noches era lo suficientemente callado para dormir en paz. Si lo recomendaría y si me volvería a hospedar ahí. Disculpen el desastre en la foto, pero olvide tomarla cuando estaba recién limpio.

title: Great time
text: We loved the location and how clean this place was, the gym is really good and everyone is helpful. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay the only negative was the bathrooms were quite small but that's all. We could see Central Park from the window on our floor!

title: Excelente opcion economica
text:
Excelente lugar para pasar unos dias a muy bajo costo.

Tienen habitaciones individuales e incluso con baño privado, lo que a no ser por el servicio de habitacion asemejaria a un hotel normal....

El precio super bajo y la ubicación es EXCELENTE, a una cuadra del central park...

Sin dudas volvería!!!!

title: Pésima atención hostel muy como no se puede llamar hotel
text:
Pésima atención , dos días nos morimos de frío con temperaturas cercanas al cero celsius. Prendieron la calefacción y no alcanzaba la ventana abierta imposible estar parece un horno. La atención es totalmente mala no aceptan reservas por más de seis días por lo que tenemos reservas parciales te hacen perder un día haciendo check out.por la mañana y el check-in por la tarde. Perdés un día. Y desayunando con vinagre no te hacen cómodo el viaje. No pidas que limpien debajo de la cama encontrás lo que quieras.
Veremos cómo sigue está mala experiencia. Quedan 15 días.

title: Good location
text:
I stayed at West Side YMCA on the first week of Dec/2017. 
Such a good location, convenient, right next to Central Park and only 15 min walk from Times Square. Subway about 5 min away . And it has a nice gym, sauna and swimming pool .

title: Hostel
text: Localização mito boa. Banheiro compartilhado não é bom, falta privacidade. Mas recomendo, principalmente pela localização. O preço é razoável, pois Manhattan é muito caro, qualquer que seja o hotel. Limpeza do quarto muito boa.

title: It's all about the location
text:
The reason for my average rating is that the accommodation by itself was not great at all. It was mostly dirty, the shared bathrooms were usually occupied and the bedsheets were not changed.
But the location (directly beside the Central Park and close to Columbus Circle) and the friendly staff (e.g. my sheets were changed without question right away) would make up for the previous points. In the end we did not spend much time in the accommodation, but were exploring NY. It was cheap (for NY) and the location of the YMCA was great. Hence, don't expect anything of the accommodation, if you want a cheap place to sleep in central NY then it's a good choice.

title: Para un par de dias recomendable!
text: Me hospede solo una noche porque tenia que esperar la salida de mi vuelo al otro día. Pedi una habitacion individual. No tuve tiempo de recorrer el hostel en sí, pero estaba un poco descuidado, por ejemplo el armario no tenia puerta, la tele no la pude prender y tenia algunos detalles de pinturas. El descanso fue bueno y la ubicacion es excelente. Para pocos dias es recomendable. Habiendome hospedado en otro hostel de New York, diria que hay mejores. La limpieza muy buena y el personal muy amable :)

title: Muy recomendable, muy buena ubicación
text: Una semana en una habitación con dos camas. La habitación pequeña pero cómoda, muy limpio todo, muchos baños grandes, súper cómodos y limpios, impecables siempre. Aunque son compartidos no genera ningún problema porque siempre hay uno libre. La ubicación es perfecta para una recorrida turística fuerte de Nueva York, porque está a muy cerca de varias atracciones, muy cerca de Times Square, y con el metro cerca para ir a todos lados. También para los altos precios de alojamiento en Nueva York, teniendo en cuenta la ubicación, el precio está bien. Opción muy recomendable.

title: Recomendable
text: Lo mejor es la ubicación, cerca de Columbus Subway Station. La habitación es pequeña pero cambian las toallas y sábanas diariamente. Los baños son amplios, tienen un espejo grande y están siempre limpios. Hay un market chiquito pero con variedad de productos. Es recomendable para ir a dormir, bañarse y salir a recorrer la ciudad.

title: Great location
text: If you aren’t looking for luxury, you will have a great time in this place. I booked a room just for me. It was great. Is basic and clean. Shared bathroom wasn’t a problem for me. I probably will go back!!!

title: Parfait pour le prix - Emplacement idéal
text:
Auberge de jeunesse pour tout âges ;-) Chambre petite et vétuste mais propre, toilettes et SDB communes propres. Personnels accueillants. Salle de sport très grande et très bien équipée, piscine agréable. Wifi très bon. Très calme.
Serviettes changées tous les jours mais pas le lit.
Emplacement idéal face à Central Park. A 3 mn à pied du métro (Columbus Circle) et 15 mn à pied de Time Square. Pas habitué et fan des auberges de jeunesse mais je conseille pour ce tarif (3 fois moins cher qu'un simple Hôtel à Time Square) et cet emplacement

title: Guvenli ve temiz
text: Eşimle kaldığımız 11. Kat 2 kişilik oda temiz ve asırı sıcaktı. Sakın kalın pijama koymayın.. odada Tv var. Yanınıza mutlaka terlik alın. Temizlik malzemelerinizi de almayı unutmayın :)) odalar şehir manzaralı.. girişinde bir market var akşamm7 den sonra kapanıyor.. girişte solda dinlenmek için kafe ve internet odası bulunuyor..  gecelik kişibaşı yaklaşık 250 ₺ dir..

title: Temiz ve ucuz
text:
Eşimle kaldığım guvenli, merkezi ve huzurlu biryer.. ortak kullanımlı banyo ve tuvetler temiz.. mutlaka terlik ve temizlik malzemelerinizi valize atın
Odaları temiz ve asırı sıcak.. tv var.. banyo havlusu var.. kovuş modeli bir yer.. guvenebilirsiniz

title: excellant updates
text: This is our second time staying here and the updates are wonderful. The rooms are freshly painted the beds are comfortable. You also get to use the ymca facilities. The location is perfect. staff is very friendly

title: Первый опыт
text: Оставалось немного времени до поездки и найти что-либо по нормальным ценам было трудно, впервые решили взять хостел с общими ванной и туалетом, тем более прилетали поздно переночевать 2 ночи и вылет в 14 часов, не так уж и много времени находились в этом хостеле. Нашли быстро по maps.mi,Да расположение зачётное и сверху смотрится хорошо, нормальный рецепшен, лифт, но номер-сначала - шок, хорошо, что вещей было мало, 2 маленьких чемодана-ручная кладь, одит засунули в подобие шкафа, а второй положили на подоконник. Туалет женский открывался  по коду, мужской без. Было много молодёжи,проходил какой-то марафон, но неудобств не вызвало, вели себя тихо.Удивило. что некоторые молодые люди ходят босиком не только по отелю, но и в туалет.Вообще если уж надо съэкономить, то пару ночей можно переночевать, т.к. местоположение очень хорошее прямо напротив Центрального парка, рядом много кафе вполне приличных, турбас, велосипеды напрокат. В отеле есть бассейн.Можно набратьв бутылку питьевой  воды около фитнес центра

title: Ótimo custo benefício
text: Um dos lugares mais caros de Manhattan. Para mim, foi uma ótima experiência! O hostel faz parte da YMCA e recebe visitantes do mundo todo. Ele está localizado na 63rd  ao lado do Trump International Hotel e em frente ao Central Park. A limpeza e o atendimento dos funcionários deixa a desejar mas se você procura preços baixos e boa localização, esse é seu lugar! Fiquei sozinha por 5 dias e paguei US$530,00

title: Great
text:
This is a great hostel, it was exactly what we needed for an amazing trip in America, we used the pool while there which was a good start to the day then hit the streets of NYC,

Staff were all great and the room was what we expected, a little small but it did for us

title: dirty and basic
text: when we first walked into our room it seemed small but we didn't mind because its not the size of the room that matters. But when you pay to stay in a room you expect some level of cleanliness which unfortunately there wasn't even that. The window was covered in grime and paint from a bad paint job they had try to do. until the day we left we didn't even realize the 3 cracks in the glass panels in the window because the grime and splatted paint seemed to some how mask it. although there was lots of faulty things i cant deny that the location was amazing.

title: Basic hostel in an unbeatable location
text: Given that hotel rooms are very expensive in NYC, this hostel is a good choice. The location is unbeatable, but the installations (I had a single room) are basic and noisy. Bathrooms were regularly "cleaned" (the cleaners spend an average of 3 minutes in each bathroom, so do not expect much) and left much to be desired. The place can be noisy.

title: Does what it needs to!
text: A great ymca in a stunning location. This is basic accommodation but it's clean and safe. On check in the reception were efficient and excellent, we were a school group and there were 9 of us. The bathrooms are basic but our pupils showered in the gym which was clean and private.  The location is fantastic, safe and quiet and away from the hustle and bustle of Times Square.  The cafe here is also fab, a great coffee for two dollars!  We left our luggage here on the last day, they have a great system and for two dollars your case is safe! Overall a great stay, thanks to your wonderful staff.

title: Buena opción para viajar solo!
text: Me hospedé una semana en una habitación con cama individual: sencilla, con escritorio, TV y armario para colgar ropa. Lo justo y necesario para guardar tus cosas y dormir. Siempre la limpiaban y cambiaban mis toallas. El baño estaba muy cerca (a la mañana es cuando más lo agradeces), pero no todas las habitaciones tienen esa suerte. No es super grande el baño pero era limpio y funcional. Como tengo distintos horarios con respecto a los americanos, nunca había gente. El baño de mujeres es con contraseña. La atención en recepción y de la persona de seguridad (24hs) ha sido muy amable. Super cerca de Columbus Circle donde pasan varias líneas de subte. Hay varias opciones para comer cerca, de distintos precios. No es un lugar para hacer sociales a menos que realices alguno de los deportes que ofrecen en el edificio. Estoy pensando volver!

title: Limpio, tranquilo y bien ubicado.
text: Me quedé en una habitación single, la cual era perfecta. Lo justo y necesario para dormir y luego recorrer Nueva York. Los baños son compartidos pero el estado es IMPECABLE. Ni te das cuenta. El WiFi gratis de muy buena calidad.

title: THE BEST ...
text:
Me encantó
Los chicos de la cafetería fueron muy Amables sobretodo el chico de habla hispana mexicano ,se me olvidó su nombre. 
Aunque es poco caro pero vale la pena.
Me harté de tomar expresso ☺
Y los sándwiches son bastante grandes 
La limpieza me gustó

Elegí una habitación privada me salio un poco caro perooo magnífica.
Y no me arrepentí.
Volvería hacerlo

La localización;
El clima, todo salió perfecto,
La ubicación. Para mi fue un gran regalo
Haber conocido NEW York 😍😍😍
La 5 Avenida queee lujo
Y el CENTRAL PARK es lo the best...

Lo Recomiendo siii ese Hostel.
Vale la pena. 
Volveré fijo
Meeee enamoré de esa Ciudad 😁😁

title: Relacion calidad, ubicacion, precio. Excelente
text: Me toco una habitacion de luxe silenciosa, pequeña pero justa, cambio de sabanas y toallas diario, podrian cambiar el aire acondicionado creo que para pleno verano es insuficiente y los colchones son algo viejos por tratarse de habitaciones de luxe mas caras. Los baños completos, agua caliente, no muy limpios en los horarios pico, pero eso es culpa de los huespedes. Wifi excelente. La tienda en el hall muy completa con precios muy buenos para desayunar o comprar comida, el personal super agradable, la pileta de natacion muy buena, el gimnasio no lo use pero muy completo, la ubicacion inmejorable. Con algunos pequeños cambios  seria excelente todo. Igual lo recomiendo ampliamente.

title: RUN AWAY seriously
text:
I thought YMCA is an organization that represents something good for the society. I changed my mind after staying in that particular accommodation. We had to wait until 15:00 pm to check in which means we had to walk around ny with our bags on hand. Front desk people were rude and not helpful at all. Room was on 8th floor. We had to wait for the elevator sometimes for 10 min. Dorm was like you were in prison. Doors as well. Room was tiny as hell. We couldn't move both at the same time as there was no space to do so. Bed was noise and window was locked. Bathroom... dirty, busy and so uncomfortable. There was no place to leave your towel and clothes. Doors were see-through. No paper sometimes for long. There was no space between the showers and the sinks so when it was busy it was hard to leave the shower. I met a cleaning lady once asked her "how people shower in here?" She replied to me "there are showers on the gym downstairs" in broken English. She was nice and tried to help but her answers describes the actual situation of the bathrooms. Don't stay there. New York is a nice city, you do deserve somewhere nicer to stay. 

Recommendation for the personnel : if you don't like your work find another one, you can't be rude to visitors. Recommendation to management: 120 $ dollars per night is a price for a decent room in ny. Either low your price because the experience you offer is not decent at all 
, or rise your standards/quality.

title: Good enough
text: I stayed there for three nights with my mom and it was ok. The room had a bunk bed and it was bigger than I thought. The breakfast is not included and the installations could be better. It needs a comfortable lounge and a place to, at least, pour yourself a glass of water without charge. The staff was nice and the location is PERFECT. Three blocks away from Columbus Circle and one from Central Park.

title: kleine kamers, oud maar perfect
text: Niet te veel eisen stellen. New York is duur. Daarom is de ymca een prima hotel/hostel. Relatief goedkoop en prachtige ligging. Bijna tegen Central park aan. En op loopafstand naar Time square. Je slaapt er alleen. de rest nodig om de super stad te verkennen.

title: se ci si accontenta, ma posizione più che ottima
text:
ostello situato sulla 63esima, posizione più che ottima. a 5 min dalla metro e 15 min a piedi da times squares. zona centralissima con vicino davvero tutto!
il personale nella hall l'ho trovato scortese ed arrogante, soprattutto le donne. 
le stanze piccole e vecchie, ne ho cambiate 3 perchè nella prima mi hanno messo un una stanza con davanti alla finestra un motore dell'aria condizionata.....non vi dico che rumore. sapendolo, la usano lo stesso. le altre due stanze erano migliori. i bagni piccoli perché servono tutto il piano. c'è tantissima umidità, la pulizia sufficiente, ma c'è da dire che la colpa è anche degli utenti che non sono rispettose.
la wifi è presente ovunque e funziona abbastanza bene.
la tv, su tre, solo una non ne andava
però, visto i costi a new york, adattandosi un po' e valutando la posizione ottima, lo consiglio e personalmente ci riandrei

title: Top
text:
Chambre pour 2 prix plus que attractif pour un tel emplacement a NYC . 
Accès à pied jusqu'à Time square 15min , centre commercial à deux minutes . 
Ne pas oublier que c'est une auberge de jeunesse et pas un hôtel !! 
Chambre propre petite mais largement largement suffisante  à NY la chambre sert qu'à dormir nan ? 
Bruyant à l'extérieur ? Étant une fille de la ville je ne trouve pas que c'est choquant évidement si j'étais habitué à la campagne il y aurait un choc ... Et oui , la nuit il y a des voitures et des lumières ... 
Pour les douches femmes propre avec produits pour nettoyer , jai apprécier le code de sécurité a l'entrée des douches (l'hygiène était nettement meilleur que les douches des hôtels F1 en France en matière de comparaison) 
Par contre celles des hommes était plus sale d'après mon mari , mais nous n'avons pas tous le même savoir vivre et la femme de ménage ne peut pas rester derrière chaque personnes . 

Pour conclure nous avons été agréablement surpris par cette auberge de jeunesse qui équivaut à un hôtel F1 chez nous (en mieux perso) , les avis négatifs ne sont pas vraiment justifié si l'on veut mieux il suffit d'y mettre le prix mais à titre de comparaison à choisir entre le YMCA WST et un hôtel 2etoiles sur Time square (au triples du prix) je retournerais sans regret au premier .

title: 1 WEEK STAY
text: I would have given a 5 star if there were a few basic things that could be improved. I stayed on level 11. There were 3 showers and all 3 had some maintenance issue. Each shower pipe had holes, meaning the water would spray out everywhere when turning on, another shower had a broken handle hanging of in the inside that remained broken. There were also 3 toilets, of which 2 had no working lock. There is nowhere to put toiletries inside the shower, which doesn't sound like an issue, but in fact it was very inconvenient. However, the rooms were clean, the staff were friendly, and the cleaners were also always making sure the communal bathrooms were cleaned very often. If the hostel kept up to date with maintenance i am sure the hostel would be more of a pleasant stay!

title: Lamentable
text:
Sucio, viejo, personal desagradable, baños asquerosos, ventanas oxidadas y atascadas , ambiente super rato , no lo recomendaria bajo ningun concepto , dormir en el metro seria mejor opcion.

La ventana estaba atascada por el oxido y la suciedad... debajo de las camas habia pelos y polvo.

Con diferencia el peor hotel que he estado en mi vida.

title: Céntrico, barato, y con todos los servicios
text: Estuve de vacaciones hace 4 años. Esta al lado de central Park y times square. Tiene piscina, sauna y gimnasio. Las habitaciones son antiguas pero limpias. Repetiría otra vez si tuviese que volver sin pensarlo

title: Ubicacion Ubicacion Ubicacion
text:
Espectacular. Para mi lo mas importante en un alojamiento es la ubicación. Y este alojamiento esta en Columbus Circle, en la 63 con Central Park WEst, (8º avenida) . para dos chicas que estuvimos, pudimos volver al hostel, sin ningun problema por la zona, a cualquier hora, había gente "normal". Times Square esta a 12 minutos caminando por calles totalmente pobladas de gente.
El alojamiento en el que yo estuve, constaba de una habitación para dos, y baño compartido. la habitación tenia, litera, armario enorme, escritorio aire acondicionado y televisión. Te daban un código para acceder al baño femenino mas cercano. La limpieza espectacular, nos hacían la habitación todos los días, cambiándonos las toallas, y dejandonos amenities de marca, en el caso del champu con acondicionador.
El baño constaba de 3 duchas, 3 lavabos y 3 inodoros, y a mi no me toco esperar en ninguna ocasión.
Hay piscina, pero no es climatizada, hay gimnasio, hay ático, un pequeño supermercado en planta baja. Me pareció para ser Nueva York, un acierto.
Lo recomiendo 100%. No creo que vuelva porque Nueva ÇYork, es muy caro para los españoles 1000 euristas..... pero el alojamiento esta muy ajustado.

title: Lo mejor es la ubicacion
text:
Lo mejor es la ubicacion y el bajo precio que se paga.
Mala atencion en el front desk.
Mi tarjeta magnetica dejaba de funcionar cada vez que salia del cuarto lo cual fue una verdadera molestia que no solucionaron.

title: Если у вас крепкие нервы и вам не важен ночной сон, это неплохая возможность остановиться в центре Манхеттена
text:
Расположение просто прекрасное. У юго-западной стороны Центрального парка.3-5 минут неспешной прогулки и вы у площади Колумба. Здесь же одноименная станция метро и главный вход в парк. Пересекает ее Бродвей. В универмаге на нулевом этаже неплохой продуктовый супермаркет.
 О номере : комната размером 3х2,5 метра, со стоящими стояками во всех углах и трубами у потолка. Две трети комнаты занимают два матраса, стоящие друг на друге и на металлических ножках. Стульев нет. Сесть можно либо на кровать, либо на унитаз :). Есть туалетная комната с окном и отдельная душевая кабина с дверью. Душ встроен в стену, лейки нет. если в наши планы не входит мытье головы, берите с собой шапочку для душа. Достаточно чисто. В окно комнаты встроен кондиционер. Сильно шумит. Окна открыть невозможно. В номере очень влажно, даже окна запотевают.
Теперь о грустном. Двери. Дверь в туалетную комнату имеет ручку только с внешней стороны. Чтобы закрыть ее изнутри, надо засунуть палец (ломая ноготь) в какую-то дырку в двери и тянуть дверь на себя. Задвижки внутри тоже нет. Дверь в номер тяжелая, разбухшая от влаги в номере, очень плотно прилегает к коробке. На ней огромный врезной замок с металлической накладкой размерами 30х15 см с четырьмя защелками. Такую бы в средневековый замок. Чтобы закрыть дверь, надо со всей силы толкнуть ее бедром. Лязг и грохот при этом стоят на весь этаж. Звукоизоляция в номере нулевая. Несмотря на то, что наш номер был на 11 этаже, хорошо был слышен шум проезжающих машин, звук спускаемой в унитазах воды и шум из коридора. В этом отеле живут в основном студенты. Похоже, что в их комнатах нет душа и они пользуются общим душем на этаже. К 12 часам ночи начинается паломничество в душевую комнату. Толпы студентов бегают по коридору, сильно шумят, перекрикиваются, бесконечно хлопают этими ужасными дверьми. У них даже мысли не возникает, что в других комнатах могут спать люди.

title: Much Better Than Some Reviews
text:
Some of the reviews have not been kind to this Y. I had some concerns about staying here but decided to give it a go and I am very glad that I did.

Location was the best. Staff was friendly and helpful. Room was small but clean. Bed was good and I slept fine. I had three pieces of furniture. They were light wood and very attractive.

Bathrooms were ok for the most part. I had upgraded to the shared bathrooms where there are 12 on every floor and you use your key card to get in and have a private one.

The Y gym was very nice and easily accessible.

I would recommend this Y for some persons. It is not for everyone. I would be glad to stay at this Y again.

title: Not what we expected
text: Rooms were like cells, we had noisy neighboors, the shared bathroom was not that clean. When checking in I asked the reception "how many people are sharing the bathroom" and she replied "only one at a time". Is than an answer? Of course one at a time, I wont be showering with strangers. But she did not eventually answered my real question. How many people will be using the bathroom daily. About 80. Thats the number of rooms on each floor. And only 3 toilets and 3 showers. Stay away from it if you can afford something else. The only pros is the location.

title: 値段相応
text: 一人用の個室がありますが、シャワーとトイレは共用です。女性用はパスコードの入力が必要なのでセキュリティ的には安心ですが、シャワーは固定で温度が低く、トイレは３つあるうちの２つが鍵が壊れていて使えませんでした。

title: hostel mewah harga menengah
text: Hostel ini berada di pusat kota New York, hanya beberapa langkah dari Central Park dan Lincoln Center, di lengkapi pusat kebugaran, sauna, ruangan steam, dan 2 kolam renang dalam ruangan, tiap ruangan di lengkapi penyejuk udara dan televisi

title: Aceptable
text: Lo bueno es la ubicación, está cerca del metro y bastante bien comunicado. Los baños son lo peor. La cortina de la ducha no cierra, el suelo asqueroso (estuve en los compartidos, quizás los privados sean mejores). Las habitaciones pequeñas pero limpias.

title: West Side YMCA
