text: estuve en julio 2017 alojada una semana en West Side YMCA, no me gustó para nada, muy descuidado, los baños compartidos siempre ocupados y usados mojados. la habitación no tenia ni una silla, me resultó muy incómoda

title: Five Day Trip
text:
I stayed in this Hostel for  Days in Summer 2017. Overall it was not that bad but unfortunately the toilets were often quite dirty or clogged. I understand that especially a lot of people book rooms but a it would be nice if it were cleaned more often. 
The Hostel was nicely situated right next to the Central Park. There are enough Restaurants, Shops and other places to see in walking distance. Even Time Square was close by, which made the expierience a lot better. You mostly just sleep in the Hostel because youre out in town anyway ;)

title: Muy bueno
text: Fuimos en junio 2017, habitacion doble con baño privado. La ubicacion es tremenda, cerca de todo, a 3 cuadras de columbus circle, debajo de éste hay un super Whole Food donde podes desayunar  y comer con relativamente buenos precios. La habitacion es chica eso si y no esperen grandes lujos. La atencion fue muy buena, estuvimos 9 dias y la verdad que muy buena la estadia, quizas agregaria una frigobar para dejar bebidas... El gimnasio de primer nivel... Pudimos enviar paquetes al hotel y ningun problema en recivirlos. Volveria!

title: Quick Weekend Trip to the City
text: Great inexpensive option for a short trip to NYC. The location is right near Columbus Circle and can't be beat, as you are central to everywhere and anywhere you would want to go. The room is small, but is very comfortable and very clean. AC was very good, and I liked the fact that I had a desk and a strong WI-FI signal to get some work done before I headed out to hit the town. Flat screen TV in the room as well. There are many rest rooms and the rest rooms are very clean and secured y your guest key card, so only 1 person can enter at a time, and the shower was very clean with great water pressure and shampoo and body wash was provided, which was an extra plus. The venue is very secure with a front desk, and there is a store on-site to buy healthy snacks, and of course the gym is available for use. Inexpensive, clean and very good option for a short stay.

title: Un emplacement idéal pour visiter NYC
text: Une auberge de jeunesse de 7 à 77 ans. Prix plutôt bon marché pour NYC (80$ la nuit pour 2). Chambre très petite de 7 m2. Hôtel très bruyant (Prévoir des bouchons pour les oreilles). L'emplacement est idéal pour visiter NYC : Colombus Circle et Central Park sud). Le personnel est aimable et professionnel pour ce genre d'hôtel.

title: It was very nice staying!
text: The location is so nice. I have enjoyed a jazz session at Dizzy’s club until midnight without any concern about a returning-way to the YMCA and it  is easy to access nearby subway station, so you can save your time. The state of the room and bath room is also good, considering the rate. But I recommend to bring shower slippers so that you may have comfortable time in the bath room.

title: シャワーとトイレが微妙
text:
シャワーとトイレがかなり微妙です。シャワー場所はカーテンがあるだけで、着替え置き場などはありません。
トイレは鍵が壊れていたり、使い方が汚かったり。
マンハッタンにある別のYMCAの方が良かったです。

title: Expect the bare minimum!
text:
Expectations were not high when me and my friend paid $50 a night but I've stayed in a few hostels and this West Side YMCA isn't the best value for money. Essentially you pay for the location. The rooms are bare and what can be best described as prison cells. Uncomfortable beds and I had to sleep with my shoes cause the metal bunk bed steps where too painful to walk down without.  Beds are clean but the rooms floor needed a good sweep - there was still hair and dust from previous guests. Noisy air con unit in broken window.

The bathrooms reminded me of 'Orange is the new Black' Netflix's show. Tired tiny facilities with no where to hang your towel and clothes whilst you shower. Toilet doors broken and not cleaned regularly enough. After a day the state of the toilets were disgusting. 

The gym area and change rooms are much nicer - I recommend ignoring the Hostel facilities and heading to level 3. Modern, clean and spacious. Big mirrors and hairdryers. 

The main positive is the location. Adjacent from Central Park and near a sub it helps with the overall experience inside the Hostel. With some modernisation this Hostel could be outstanding but at the moment you pay to stay in a prison. All an experience!

title: Nice place nice price
text: Me and my friend went to New York and were doing it on a budget, for the price we paid we couldn't fault it. Plenty of bathrooms which were always clean and tidy and always clean bedsheets daily which was a added bonus, the room we chose had bunk beds which suited us both and also a tv. Admittedly the room was quite small but we didn't go New York to spend all our time in the room and for the price what do you expect, location was excellent as Central Park was literally across the road and also a easy walk to Times Square and also a stones throw away from Columbus circle subway. Would stay here again and unsure after reading the other reviews why other guests had such a bad experience, you get what you pay for and I couldn't fault it.

title: Never Again
text: I attended the West side YMCA and was bitterly disappointed. Even though going to this hotel I did not expect 5* luxury I expected simple and basic things which were not met. Upon entering the hotel the old fashioned look of the building is reflected some what in the floor and gates on the door, however, this quickly deteriorates as the lounge features tables and chairs that you would expect to see out side a low-quality caffé in a city centre not inside a building. Upon arriving on the floor I was to stay on it was immediately apparent that this was going to be somewhat disappointing due to the brightly coloured orange and blue doors which gave a very dated vibe. upon entering my room I was immediately concerned with the quality of the floor and the bed as they both looked grimy, to say the least. The AC unit looked as though it was installed in the 1980's and had not received any Maintainance or a clean since and as for the blind I think a kitchen cloth would be more functional. I will mention that the additional storage cupboard was small but usable. The TV in the room was around 23" and at a 720p HD quality which although not up to my personal high standard was a welcome addition as other hotels of the same quality did not feature this. The desk in the room, on the other hand, was fantastic as not only did it give the room a bit more of a modern feel and the built in speakers with Bluetooth connectivity was a welcome upgrade to your smartphone speakers it must be said that it was hardly on par with a dedicated speaker (e.g: Bose Soundlink Mini). Our room, however, was a huge contrast to my friend's room as it was almost double the size, didn't smell, had working air conditioning and the TV was like a cinema screen in contrast to theirs. The communal bathrooms were disappointing for a variety of reasons, please note that I can only comment of that of the Gentlemans facilities ). Firstly I have to begin with the absurd cubical in the corner as a pillar stuck out so far it practically prohibited entrance to everyone unless you have been living of a single blade of grass per week for the last 6 years. secondly, on the subject of the cubical toilets, they were extremely confusing to operate as the location of the flush was not in normal position but rather mounted on the pipe (I am from the UK so this may be common in the US but I am unsure). Secondly, the taps were grimy and in need of replacement and the shelf below the mirror desperately needs replacing. Finally, we need to talk about the showers which were a disaster. From the grimy controls, the grimy floor, the shower curtain that hardly covered anything, cracked, smashed, broken and missing tiling and finally the showers were awfully cold and had about as much power as a watering can being slowly poured over your head. In addition to this, the middle shower did not even work reducing the number of showers from 3 to two. On the plus side the urinals did feature a barrier between them giving you privacy although they could do with a clean. To conclude, this accommodation needs to work on a few aspects. firstly they need to give the entire place a clean and repaint the ghastly doors in addition to fixing any broken appliances. Secondly, I would advise a full refurbishment, in addition, to looking to increase the size of the rooms and even consider if at all possible expanding and improving the capacity of the bathrooms and maybe look at including a small bathroom in the room. To anyone travelling consider this place as a last resort unless serious action is taken.

title: Un 5/5 pour l'emplacement!!!
text: Alors certes, certains vous diront que ce n'est pas un hôtel, c est vrai; d'autres diront que ce n'est pas clean clean, c'est pas faux (bien que les femmes de ménage passent chaque jour et changent vos serviettes au besoin); certains se plaindront qu'il n'y ait pas de quoi cuisiner, c'est toujours vrai... mais bon sang, quel emplacement idéal!!! En sortant du YMCA, vous tombez sur Central Park. Les chambres sont calmes. Il y a accès à la salle de sport et aux piscines du YMCA, et surtout vous êtes à 20 Minutes à pieds de Times Square!!! Le top! Moi qui ne suis pas du tout fan des auberges, j'en redemande!!

title: Buon ostello
text: Se quello che cercate a New York è un ostello in cui soggiornare per pochi giorni e con prezzo conveniente, vi consiglio il West Side YMCA. Stanze piccole, ma pulite. I bagni in comune erano in condizioni buone, mentre le camere un po' vecchie. Posizione ottima e centrale.

title: Ottime potenzialità ma da migliorare
text: L'ostello YMCA è un'ottima sistemazione in una zona splendida, piena di servizi e vicinissima a Columbus Circle dove passano sette linee della metropolitana. Il prezzo per questa sistemazione sarebbe più che adeguato se i servizi della struttura funzionassero meglio. Abbiamo soggiornato una notte all'8' piano e proseguito al 12': all'8' i bagni comuni erano spesso in condizioni igieniche precarie a causa di passaggi del personale di pulizia insufficiente e per l'utilizzo "disinvolto" degli altri ospiti mentre al 12' erano spesso inaccessibili a causa di disfunzioni legate al sistema informatico delle chiavi elettroniche. Nonostante numerose lamentele e sollecitazioni questo problema non è stato risolto. La pulizia e il riordino delle camere è stato approssimativo: più volte non è stato svuotato il cestino e la coperta non ci è stata quasi mai rimessa, una volta il servizio è stato saltato del tutto. Le nostre rimostranze legate ai bagni, a ospiti rumorosi e che non rispettavano il divieto di fumo e che hanno fumato in casa e poi lasciato i mozziconi nel cestino fuori dalla propria camera sono state gestite con uno scaricabarile generale e nulla o quasi è cambiato. Ray della reception è stato l'unico che ha cercato di migliorare il nostro soggiorno. Le camere sono piccole con letti ballerini e materassi molto sottili. Insomma, la struttura sarebbe valida se i servizi migliorassero.

title: Excelente lugar
text: Me pareció un hostel hermoso. Para el que busca lujos o viajar en familia numerosa o con niños, no es el indicado ya que las habitaciones son pequeñas; sin embargo, para mi hermana y para mí, que solo íbamos a dormir, fue ideal. La ubicación es lo mejor ya que se encuentra en la esquina del Central Park y justo nos tocó una habitación privada que daba al parque también. Viajamos para fin de año del 2016 y enero del 2017, pleno invierno, y nunca pasamos frío. El baño es compartido pero hay muchísimos por piso y son muy limpios. Además, hay un kiosko dentro del propio hostel donde comprábamos cosas para desayunar, a muy buen precio. Nosotras que somos argentinas pedíamos el agua caliente para nuestra bebida y no nos cobraban nada. El personal siempre fue muy amable. El wifi era gratuito y andaba a la perfección.

title: Muy bueno
text:
Nos hospedamos en mayo del 2016.
En realidad habiamos reservado en otro YMCA, el de Queens, pero como cuando llegamos estaba lleno, nos ofrecieron cambiarnos sin costo al de Manhattan, lo cual nos vino al pelo.
Eramos 4 y nos dieron una habitacion de 6 solo para nosotros por ese inconveniente.
Las habitaciones estaban correctas, con cuchetas cómodas y siempre todo muy limpio.
Los baños si bien eran compartidos, ya que se trata de un hostel, estaban en un pasillo y eran independientes, es decir, cada unidad era privada con inodoro, pileta y ducha (la mejor ducha que vi en un hostel, muy buena presion). A cada unidad ingresabas con la tarjeta de la habitación.
Además, contaba en planta baja con un servicio de Starbucks, que no sé muy bien por qué motivo, vendía los productos a un precio menor que en las demás cafeterías.
La locomoción es excelente, si bien haces todo caminando, la estación de metro está a un par de cuadras.
REALMENTE MUY RECOMENDABLE! Iría nuevamente sin dudarlo.

title: excellent
text: Located in a great area of the city, near Central Park and Lincoln Center, just the perfect place to be! Prices are unbeatable, compared to other venues around. They also have a gym and sauna. Remember: This is a hostel, not a hotel. Expext no extra luxury, but affordable and clean accommodation.

title: Horrible experience
text: I stayed at YMCA hotel during the end of July for 3 days and unfortunately I had terrible experience. The hotel do not provide any refrigerator in the rooms, the air conditioner was noisy and old as I slept together with a tractor (I had to sleep with earplugs), not to mention the pipe system that passed through my room… The doors of the rooms are made from metal and hold a ventilation lines that remind a little bit the doors of a prison. The place including rooms and bathrooms do not represent the pictures that shown in the hotel website at all! In addition, it is important to mention that there is no separation of the shared bathrooms in the hotel between men and woman at the floors, I had to shower less than 2 min because I was afraid that some weirdo (and there are a lot of weirdos over their!!) will enter the bathrooms while I’m there.. There is a code to the bathroom doors and they supposed to be locked all the time- but nobody strict to lock them. The hotel mentioned that there is free Wi-fi in the rooms—it is not working at all!! There is no cellular reception  in the floors and also there is no phone in the rooms.. Meaning that if there is kind of emergency no one can help you... Which leads me to speak about the check-in process- it was not informative the receptionist only took money from me and didn’t provide any details about the hotel- for example how to contact with housekeeping or reception (that closed the desk at 00:00!!). Cables of TV at my room didn’t worked, when I ask about it at the reception they told me that this is not their problem and the cable company supposed to take care of this.. In other word no one care... I really suffered over there and the most annoying part is that I paid 108$ per night!! Not including breakfast… please give yourself a favor and to go their!

title: excellent service
text: I stayed here as a stop gap and loved it the sheets were soft and clean Egyptian cotton and most comfortable bed. It was good to stay here I hadn't realised it was so near to the Central Park as it was night when I arrived and the taxi came next day to take me to the airport. Missed out on some great sight seeing that is for sure.

title: Ótima localização e custo
text: Funciona em um antigo prédio, como hostel e também tem quartos com banheiro privativos. No prédio funciona academia e piscina. Parece tratar-se de uma associação ao estilo SESC. Fica a 2 blocos do Central Park e do Columbus Circle. Os quartos são pequenos, sem muto luxo, mas quem está em Manhattan o que menos quer é ficar no quarto.

title: Definitely low budget accommodation but adequate for us
text:
My daughter and I have just spent four nights at Westside, although it had its good points, we would pay the extra next time and find a cheap hotel.  Location was excellent, just a few minutes walk to Central Park and Columbus Circle, Lincoln Centre just around the corner.  Columbus Circle Subway station just up the road, we used subway a lot. Cab only $10 or less to get into Time Square and Broadway. 
I booked to have access to the pool but we didn't use it, after a day out in the heat we just headed back to the air con, which in our room, was fantastic. We kept it on high so was heaven at the end of the day.  We did go for a look at the pool, could only find the small one, found it a bit stuffy with strong chlorine smell but I guess that's to be expected with such a high volume of people using it. 
Great wifi coverage for us, I noticed some reviews saying otherwise.
Shared bathroom a new experience for us, travelling, that would be the biggest downside, from our point of view, but if you're used to that, it was adequate, on our floor the women's bathroom had three toilets and three showers, presume men's would be the same.  We had late nights so showered around 11am/midday so never had to wait, I'd imagine it'd be busier early morning but you do have the option of using the pool bathrooms.
Found the staff excellent, reception always friendly, helpful with directions and suggestions, housekeeping pretty efficient.
We had a private room with a set of bunks, quite small but adequate, beds very comfortable and we heard very little noise, although we were right down the end of the corridor, but no problem sleeping.
If you want a cheap place to stay, right in Manhattan, and don't mind basic accommodation, would recommend Westside. Don't stay if you're looking for any luxury.

title: Ubicación, Ubicación!
text: Las habitaciones dobles son con cama cucheta, un aire un poco ruidoso y un espacios pata ropa y valijas. En NYC no necesitas mas que eso, un buen colchon y una buena ducha. El temas mas flojo es los baños que son pocos y compartidos. Yo solo vi uno de mujeres en piso y que tiene 3 cubiculos y 3 duchas. Las duchas un poco incomodas porque no hay donde dejar la ropa. Tienen el sistema que si compras por internet ellos lo reciben pero tiene horario de retiro especial. Un dia llegue despues de las 18 y me dicen que el mail room esta cerrado. EL personal de recepcion variado. Gente muy amable y otros bastante parcos. En todos lados hablan español o hay alguien que lo hable. Recomendable si vas unos dias con bajo presupuesto. La ubicación es lo mejor !!

title: 夏天 勉強可住，冬天絕對不可考慮住這裡！
text:
這間YMCA 晚上7點後，是不供應任何熱的飲用水的！
房內沒有看到適合紐約冬季的暖氣設備。
房內整潔中等，公用浴室水管堵塞的比例很高。
房間隔音很差(這點我本就對 YMCA沒有要求 不為此而扣分。)

一樓櫃枱 服務人員....素質不一，還好的也有，無緣無故就整天擺臭臉的也有，特別笨卻又愛說謊的也有！
櫃枱把我的感應門卡誤設為只有一天的效期(而我訂單是連住四天)，櫃枱卻"擅長欺騙"(不擅長把門卡設定一次做對)推說是門卡接近手機就會失效...所以推卸責任一切都是住客的問題。
如果櫃枱 常常把感應門卡設定錯誤 = 安全就有問題！

title: Ubicación vs. comodidad, esa es la cuestión!
text: Es ese tipo de alojamiento al cual no estas muy seguro de recomendar. Indudablemente está bien ubicado y el precio es el más barato que pude conseguir en Manhattan, pero los servicios podrían ser de mejor calidad. A su favor podemos decir que está apenas a dos cuadras de Columbus Circle. La estación de metro es accesible, es decir, cuentas con ascensores que resultan ser muy útiles cuando llegas en metro desde el aeropuerto cargado con dos toneladas de equipaje, además en ella paran tanto las lineas locales como las express. En el subsuelo de Time Warner Center, en frente de Columbus Circle, hay un mercado Whole Foods donde puedes comprar comida de muy buena calidad para consumir allí o hacer un picknic en Central Park, y en la esquina de la 63rd y Broadway hay un Starbucks para desayunar. La parte negativa del alojamiento son los escasos aseos: en un piso con 70 habitaciones dobles solo había tres baños para mujeres y 3 para hombres. De los tres baños de mujeres, uno no funcionaba, y de las tres duchas, una estaba fuera de servicio, así que a madrugar para bañarse! No se como se las arreglan cuando hay mucha gente alojada. La habitación se limpiaba todos los días, aunque los baños deberían controlarse mas frecuentemente. Por último, la cama no era la más cómoda, tal vez deberían renovar los colchones. De todas formas, Nueva York es un sitio caro para alojarse, por lo tanto es difícil determinar la relación calidad/precio de este alojamiento. Solo volvería a alojarme si en mi próxima visita fuese incapaz de conseguir otro alojamiento por el mismo precio.

title: Muy buena ubicación
text:
Lo que destacaría es la ubicación, a metros del Central Park, del metro, de supermercados y lugares de comida para llevar. No esperes lujos, los baños son compartidos, yo iba a la mañana temprano a ducharme, justo después de la limpieza. 
No me pareció tan ruidoso como todos dicen, fue mi experiencia. Tiene gimnasio, pero no tuve tiempo de usarlo. En la habitación hay un televisor, mesa y silla. 
Al fin y al cabo, me iba en la mañana temprano y volvía a la noche destrozada y dormía. No tuve una mala estadía.

title: Ok stay for the price
text: It's important to note that the price has to be taken into concideration when leaving a review for this place, you can't expect the best when you buy the cheapest. That being said, it has some weaknesses; the air conditioning did not work at all (more like a fan than an air con), so sleeping in 90 degrees was not pleasant. There were also no places to put your stuff while taking a shower (not even a toilet lid). Most bathrooms had two hooks on the wall, but many of these were broken. It was also almost never any paper towels. When we checked in we got a single room instead of the double we ordered, so we had to go back down and wait for approx 30 minutes until they sorted it out. They were polite about it though, so it was ok. The rooms feel clean, the location is excellent, the beds are ok, not too much noise. Overall an ok stay, and I feel no need to discourage people from booking this place. You get what you pay for.

title: Attentive and friendly staff, good prices, very poor comfort
text: I truly believed that not having a bathroom in my room for only three days would be tolerable. Big mistake! I wouldn't stay again in this place - which I chose only because the prices of hotels in New York (and not only in Manhattan) are surreal. But I do have some tips to make the experience at West Side YMCA a bit more pleasant. First and most important one: don't use the bathrooms at the corridors. Even if the hotel had a cleaning staff twice as numerous it would still be impossible to keep all the bathrooms clean during the whole time. The fact that they can be used by both man and women (a decision hard to understand, by the way!) doesn't help either! Use the large and always clean gym's locker rooms to have a shower, dry your hair, go to the toilet, brush your teeth and so on. It is really worth taking the elevator! If possible, ask for a room where the window is not sealed. Mine, for example, had a sealed window - and, therefore, a terrible stuffy, airless smell. The air conditioning, probably dirty as hell and impossible to be turned off completely, got me sick for five days. The canteen on the ground floor could stay opened until (much) later. That all said, one has to admit that the staff is very competent, polite and attentive, and is always doing its best to make the guests' stay as good as possible considering the way the hotel works and its limitations. Also, people who are brave - or young - enough to stay for a longer period and are into sports will certainly take huge advantage of the very good and big gym, the not so great but still reasonable swimming pools and the other several (including group) activities.

title: PERFECTA UBICACION.
text:
Perfecta Ubicacion , muy cercano del Metro y de Central Park.

En cuanto el Hotel , ruidoso , con moqueta , el colchon un horror , la gente poco amable.
Los baños compartidos un horror..pero si te quedas con los horarios de limpieza puedes disponer de ellos con bastante dignidad.
SI LO QUE PRIMA EN TU VIAJE ES NUEVA YORK Y SOLO VAS A PARAR EN EL HOTEL A DORMIR(CON TAPONES) Y DARTE UNA DUCHA ES TU SITIO SI LO "ENCUENTRAS BARATO" , SINO NI SE TE OCURRA IR....

title: Perfect balance
text:
The location is great, Just in the middle of Manhattan.
Personnel of the hostel is great, they have a great sense of humor all the time.
Rooms and all common places are very clean.
The only bad thing is the velocity of elevators... But nothing too serious

title: Prison cell
text: The best thing about this place was when we left. My girlfriend had booked here for 3 nights, because of the location. Very close to Central Park & the Metro. She thought the rooms were bigger when she booked. I believe a prison would have been better to stay, I reckon the conditions would have been better. The rooms were small and horrible and the shared bathrooms were disgusting and the hot water never worked.  We ended up leaving early and booking into a Holiday Inn, just so we could get a good shower and a good nights rest, beds were horrible too.

title: Vale a pena pela localização
text:
Não é perfeito e com certeza parece custar mais do que vale a primeira vista, mas a localização é excelente, você tem o Central Park como quintal e pode ir tranquilamente a pé para a Times Square, 5ª Avenida e outros dos principais pontos de Manhattan. Além disso fica a 5 minutos da estação de metrô do Columbus Circle e dali você vai a qualquer lugar. Os funcionários são simpáticos e se esforçam com a comunicação. Tem piscina e academia abertas, mas não posso avaliar pois não usamos. Tem um mini mercado e vending machines para o caso de precisar de algum alimento, preços razoáveis. Chegamos bem antes do horário do check in e pudemos deixar nossas bagagens por $2 a peça, o que ajudou muito. Saíamos sempre cedo e quando voltávamos no fim da tarde nossas camas estavam sempre arrumadas e as toalhas de banho substituídas. O banheiro feminino tinha senha para entrar, algo que me deixava bem mais segura. Havia ar condicionado e aquecedor no quarto. 
Falando das partes ruins: pegamos a opção com banheiro compartilhado e a limpeza deixou muito a desejar, o dispenser de papel toalha quebrou no primeiro dia e assim permaneceu até irmos embora. Haviam apenas dois elevadores em serviço, o que nem sempre dava conta da grande demanda de pessoas que queriam subir e descer. O quarto duplo é bem pequeno, chegando a ser apertado, mas como quase não ficávamos nele não sentimos tanto. Pelo valor seria bom ter um frigobar a disposição para colocar as bebidas que comprávamos na rua, a maioria precisamos tomar quente. 
Recomendo a todos que não se importem em ter zero de luxo e que apenas queiram um local para dormir e tomar banho, bom para casais econômicos e grupos de jovens mas ressalto que enquanto estava la vi pessoas mais velhas e pais com crianças.

title: Très bien au regard du prix
text: Emplacement du YMCA idéal à 3 bloc du metro de Colombus Circle - Propreté correcte sans - Douches et toilettes à l'étage, manque de place pour poser les affaires, séchoirs à cheveux disponibles dans les vestiaires de la piscine au 3ème étage. J'étais dans une chambre un peu petite, lits superposés pour 2 personnes. A New York l'intéressant est à l'extérieur, pas à l'hôtel. C'est donc idéal pour des personnes qui ne rentrent que pour dormir...

title: Once in a lifetime experience
text:
Because it was my first and last time staying in this place. Please take a decent hotel in New Jersey for half its price. No charging port no towels no locks on bathroom no tissue there is nothing here
Please aviod this at each and every cost 
Believe me i have a first hand experience

title: Excelente
text: Eu fui e fiquei no quarto individual com banheiro compartilhado. Não tive problemas. Você pode fazer as atividades do hotel de graça e o hotel é muito bem localizado. Pertinho do Central Park e perto de algumas estações de metrô.

title: Great location
text: This hostel is located in a great location write across the street from Central Park. The rooms are very basic but clean, good place to rest your head for an evening. They offer a lot of additional faculties such as a swimming pool and gym at an extra cost and the wifi is free

title: Sucio y ruidoso
text:
Cuando llegue al hotel me dieron una habitación usada, tenía la cama desarmada y el tacho de basura usado, avise y me cambiaron a otra.
Desde el cuarto se escuchaban todos los sonidos del pasillo (el golpear de las puertas del baño, las voces del personal de limpieza, etc), por lo que tuve que comprar tapones para poder dormir bien sin despertarme por los ruidos.
Además del ruido, la ventana del cuarto no tiene persiana, por lo que si no dormís con algo tapándote los ojos, te vas a despertar a la mañana por la luz del sol.
El colchón era viejo y estaba todo ahuecado, no era muy cómodo.
El cuarto y los baños no estaban muy limpios, debajo de mi cama había basura de huéspedes anteriores.
El personal de la recepción no es muy amable, contestan solo lo justo y necesario.
Lo único muy bueno era la ubicación, cerca del Central Park y del Lincoln Center, muy linda zona para hospedarse.
No volvería.

title: Solo per il prezzo
text: Ultima notte del tour del Nord America, per fortuna solo una notte. Camera doppia minuscola, letto abbastanza scomodo, bagni in comune che lasciavano un pò a desiderare. L'unica nota positiva è il prezzo, data la posizione ottima di fianco a Central park, vicina a 5th ave e Times Square. Perciò andateci se dovete soggiornare una o massimo due notti e volete essere vicini a questi luoghi.

title: Mixed Bag
text:
This place is such a mix of good and bad, it's hard to give it an accurate rating.

Good- Price and location.  You can't beat 'em in NYC.  The beds were comfortable enough.  It was pretty quiet for being so big, but I think it wasn't even close to full.  It it were full, I think it would be uncomfortably crowded and noisy.  We didn't have to wait to use the showers as some others have mentioned.

Bad - Check-in was slow because you wait in the same line with everyone checking in to use the YMCA facilities, renew their memberships, etc.  The rooms are tiny with barely enough room to walk between the desk and the bunk beds.  We didn't have to wait to use the showers, but one shower had no shower curtain, and the bathrooms were often out of paper towels.  The whole place has harsh fluorescent lighting. Housekeeping was pretty bad.  I know someone came in because the garbage got emptied, but the same piece of chewed gum was on floor in the corner from check-in to check-out 4 days later.

I would stay there again because (Hello!) 1 block from Central Park.  If your expectations are low, you'll be fine there.

title: 7 giorni a New York!
text: Siamo stati qui per 6 notti in una camera privata con bagno condiviso. Le camere dell'ostello sono essenziali, ma abbiamo trascorso pochissimo tempo in essa in quanto  eravamo fuori tutto il giorno e notte in visita. La posizione è fantastica per Central Park, con una fermata della metropolitana a 4 isolati di distanza. Non posso lamentarmi per ciò di cui si ha bisogno è per davvero. Dormire qualche ora!

title: First Stay In A Hostel And Was A Very Positive Experience
text: I organized and planned a visit to NYC for 8 friends and we decided to reserve a a room at the West Side YMCA.  We were very pleased as we had a comfortable room (nothing fancy), it was clean, the bathrooms were clean most of the time, loved the Cafe (best deal in New York for coffee and a pastry)  We all had rooms on the 13th floor and one room (mine) was on the long hall with all the bathrooms on one side.  Could be a bit noisy with bath doors banging but did not bother me.  There was also a ladies locker/changing room on the 3rd floor which we did use, found it to be very nice and included hair dryers. We were only at the facility two nights and were not able to take advantage of the many opportunities you have (massage therapy, excercise classes, etc.)

title: Superbe emplacement, à part ca....
text:
Superbe emplacement à quelques pas de central park et columbus circle, dans un quartier très agréable.
Sinon les chambres sont minuscules, les matélas completements défoncés et le ménage laisse à désirer.
Mais c'est la seule solution pour avoir une chambre à tarif raisonnable dans Manhattan

title: Muy buena calidad precio
text: Ya es la tercera vez que me hospedo en el ymca west side y la verdad que cada vez lo valoro un poco más , la relación calidad precio es muy buena tiene internet y TV en la habitación, buena ubicación solo le faltaría baño en la misma pero eso es algo normal en los hoteles económicos en NYC, aparte tuve la suerte que la última vez me tocó una muy buena vista

title: Kakerlaken im Zimmer
text: Mehr Kakerlaken als Bewohner im Zimmer. Tote Tauben liegen auf dem Dach. Ekelige Toiletten und keine Schränke. Kaputter Fernseher und Aussicht auf eine Wand. Wackelige Betten und vergammelte Fensterrahmen.

title: Worst value for money
text:
We stayed one night at the West Side YMCA over the Easter weekend. We booked it for its good location but were disappointed by the rooms and facilities on offer. We had a room with a bunk bed and shared bathroom. The corridor had a prison block feel, despite the doors being painted in bright colours. The room also felt like a prison cell, with a single bunkbed, a table and lamp and a TV. There was about 1m of floorspace around the bed which made it very cramped for two people to stay. The beds were old, small and uncomfortable and, given the number of rooms on the floor, we were repeatedly disturbed by other guests in the hostel.

The shared bathroom had poor cleanliness. There were only 3 cubicles and 3 showers for the whole floor. One shower was broken and the other two had such small shower curtains that you had no privacy. One sink was blocked and there was an unpleasant smell. After using the shower once, we decided to use the facilities in the pool area instead which were much better looked after.

We paid almost $150 for the room for the night making it the most expensive hostel I have ever stayed in. And it was the worst value for money I have ever experienced. I would not recommend the hostel.

title: Not what we expected
text: Beim YMCA handelt es sich um eine Art Jugendhotel in den oberen Stockwerken, darunter liegen Gymnastikhallen und ein Schwimmbad für New Yorker. Das Schwimmbad können auch "Hotelgäste" benutzen. Leider konnten wir es nur einmal besuchen, da sonst Schwimmstunden waren und das Hallenbad scheinbar dann für die Öffentlichkeit zu ist! Sie besitzen auch keinen Kühlschrank, wie angegeben, hatten anscheinend auch noch nie einen, weil die Dame am Empfang ganz überrschat war! Die Jugendherberge liegt von der location ganz gut, am Columbus Circle, da kommt man gut in die Stadt mit der U-Bahn und abends zu Fuß zum Broadway (15 - 20 min). Es bekommt deshalb die schlechte Bewertung, weil es einfach sau dreckig war! In den Ecken war richtig hoch der Staub, es war Sand am Fensterbrett, im Gemeinschaftsbad war nachts um 4 Uhr ne 6 cm große Schabe! Außerdem waren die Duschen entweder sau heiß oder super kalt. Das klingt vielleicht jetzt nicht nach Weltuntergang, aber egal ob es günstig für New York ist, für 160 Dollar die Nacht will ich ein sauberes Zimmer!!!!

title: Ótima localização
text: Esse hotel fica muito próximo do central parque. Fomos para a times Square andando pois não é tão longe. O quarto é muito pequeno e não é confortável. O banheiro é compartilhado mas estava limpo. Não recomendo para ir de casal ou com crianças. Tem um restaurante no térreo que acho que é um Starbucks mas não tenho certeza. Tem piscina mas não não usei.

title: 安いけれど
text:
1人だし、安いからとこちらに宿泊するツアーに申し込みました。
でも、シャワーはみんなと共同でお湯があまりでなくて、がっくり。
場所はよかったです。セントラルパークのすぐ近く！どこに行くにも行きやすい場所でした。

title: Dormire low cost a Times Square si può :D
text:
Per visitare New York ci sono tantissime soluzioni a livello di hotel e per tutte e tasche. Se però volete un bell'hotel dovete essere disposti a dormire fuori dal centro o a pagare prezzi folli :D Personalmente, volevo stare il più vicina possibile a Times Square e questo ostello è l'unica soluzione a prezzi accettabili! Ho scelto una camera doppia privata. La camera è minuscola e con letti a castello, chiaramene non è bella in quanto super basica ed essenziale. Il bagno è in comune, ma ce ne sono talmente tanti che è davvero difficile incontrare qualcuno! Quindi in pratica è come avere il proprio bagno, ma fuori dalla stanza. Attenzione perchè non c'è il phon e non ne hanno neanche uno da prestarvi in tutto l'hotel...! Io l'ho comprato nella farmacia che si trova nelle vicinanze :-) Ci sono anche a disposizione una piscina coperta e una palestra. Lo staff è molto gentile. Il deposito bagagli è a pagamento, 2$ a pezzo. 
Posizione super strategica, 5 minuti neanche a piedi e siete a Times Square! 240£ per tre notti (maggio 2015)!

title: Perfect for Backpacking Travelers
text: This hostel is located steps away from Central Park and lots of shopping, and entertainment activities. When we arrived, there was a party bus parked at the entrance and several college-aged people gathering together, so I was assured this was going to be okay. I actually rented this space as a place to change between various activities while stating in NYC. A single, dorm-style room: it was neat, bright, and had enough room for luggage and a couple guests to sit. The best part is that you have access to all of the YMCA activities while you stay there. It was perfect for my needs. A great value for someone who needs an inexpensive place to rest.

title: Não vale o custo benefício
text: Trata-se de um hostel com dormitórios parecidos com de universidade e banheiro coletivo. Com relação a limpeza, não tenho do que reclamar. Mas acho que em NY é possível encontrar hoteis mais confortáveis por preço similar. Os quartos sao bem apertados e o hostel é frequentado por pessoas bem jovens, que ficam sentadas no chão dos corredores e as vezes fazendo barulho. Para quem tem até 20 e poucos anos é recomendável. Ponto positivo é a localização. Fica ao lado do central park e da estação columbus circle.

title: Best location you can get at a very good price
text: To stay so central in the Big Apple with out getting ruined, it`s perfect: You can get a decent single room, and it`s quiet peaceful as well.I asked specific about a quite room (light sleeper) - and they provided me with that. Stayed here for 5 nights - you can\t beat the location.

title: Don't recommend
text:
Only good thing was the location!

I arrived at the YMCA after an 8 hour flight to be greeted by very rude reception staff! Rooms were small, however was not really an issue, main issue was the bunk beds - no ladders and no railing! Didn't help they were on wheel as slid about the floor with every movement. Spotted 2 cockroaches running through the hall of the 11th floor first night - was not impressed. Bathroom were awful!!! SHARED BATHROOMS might i add. Only one coded bathroom per floor with 3 toilet stalls and 3 shower cubicles. During my stay 2 of the toilets were out of order meaning ONE TOILET FOR A WHOLE FLOOR!! Showers were hard to control the temperature and the doors were see through!! The bathrooms were always dirty so obvious no one actually is cleaning them!! 
Overall, if you want cheap accommodation right next to central park then this is ideal however, would not recommend and will definitely not be returning!

title: situated glose to Central Park
text: Take your morning run in Central Park, and sat Hello to the famous fountain from "Frinds" , grab breakfast in the park , watch New Yorkers Walker Their DOgs. Ready for a busy and inspiring Day on Manhattan- enjoy😀

title: Para Jovens ou pessoas não exigentes
text: Na verdade eu nãoõ sabia direito como era esse tipo de acomodação e errei feio. Como era para passar somente 02 noites achei que valia a pena arriscar. A localização é indiscutivel, mas as acomodações não poderiam ser classificado como hotel. O local é um centro cutural, com atividades de aulas de teatro, dança, desenho além da academia. A acomodação é tipo faculdade americana, quartos individuais e com beliches, os banheiros feminino e masculino são compartilhados. Muita garotada barulhenta e pessoas andando de toalha pelo corredor, bizarro...O aquecimento no quarto não funcionou direito, reclamei , vieram consertar mas não resolveu..acabei desistindo. Para o meu perfil NÃO recomendo, principalmente se for sua primeira viagem a NY. Junte um pouquinho mais e prefira ficar em um hotel de verdade. Pode ser que sirva para outra faixa etária, pra mim não serve e não indico.

title: Awful
text: As soon as you walk in you will think you have entered a prison. I felt extremely unsafe there, with strange people walking round and whistling until gone 1am. The room was not clean at all and whenever you moved on the metal bunk beds it made too much noise. Me and my friends didn't shower for the whole time we were there because the the communal showers were dirty and the shower curtain was see through and didn't go the whole way across!I would put anyone off from going here, especially if you are travelling alone.

title: Ups and Downs
text:
If you are looking for cheap accommodation in a good location then this is probably your best option.   

There are quite a few downs thou.
The place is eerie, seems incredibly empty. Definitely not recommend is you plan on meeting people like you can in hostels. This isnt one. 
The shared bathrooms are actually hell. Everything gets wet. The shower heads are almost painful and there is mo where to put anything. Also only 3. The rooms unfortunately are like staying in a juvenile centre. Bunk bed style and everything is beige. Not much room to move. 
Overall you get what you pay for.

title: Günstig aber nicht wirklich schön
text: Direkt am Central Park, für uns war es das beste Hotel nach dem New York Marathon, unmittelbar an der Einlaufzone. Aber schön ist etwas anderes aber unschlagbar für Preis Leistung Verhältnis. Die Sauberkeit und Funktionalität der Gemeinschaftduschen und Toiletten lassen zu wünsche übrig. Jeder Haftanstalt hat sauberer und heilere Duschen und Toiletten

title: Impressionante
text: Hotel maestoso, sono stato per una settimana a ney york. le camere non sono un granchè, letti a castello e bagno in comune. hotel a non so quanti piani dove hanno piscina, spa, palestra (attrezzatissima) e addirittura un campo da basket regolamentare al 6 piano, il tutto a fianco di central park. Nota negativa: Non parcheggiate le biciclette li fuori perché ve le rubano e non hanno telecamere esterne.

title: Basico, barato y bien situado
text: Es un hostal al lado de Columbus, puedes ir andando a muchos sitios y está bien comunicado en metro. Habitaciones básicas y limpias, los baños son compartidos pero hay muchos y no nos tocó esperar. Por el precio no se puede pedir más.

title: Ideal location for budget travellers
text:
Make no mistake, the Westside YMCA is by no means a luxury hotel and is very much angled towards budget-oriented travelers- it is basic. That being said, my stay there was very acceptable and I would recommend it as it was great value. In New York, most of your time is and should be spent exploring the city.

I spent 14 nights in a 'deluxe' single room on the 13th floor, while the rooms were small I was lucky enough to have a fabulous view over Central Park. The building's location is it's biggest selling point- close to the Lincoln Center, Central Park, Columbus Circle, the Time Warner Center and a short walk to almost anywhere in mid-town. The trip to the YMCA from JFK was easy using the subway, even with luggage.

Pros: great value, superb location, close to the Subway, view of Central Park, good wi-fi, close to grocery stores and restaurants. 

Cons: the heating was way too high when I was there in November- I had it turned off all together and it was still hot. The staff could try to lighten up a bit, although there were exceptions they were otherwise helpful. Cleanliness of the bathrooms and rooms is the single largest loss of points. A communal kitchen or at least a fridge would be a plus.

title: Sempre é uma boa estadia
text: Funcionários bastante prestativos e numa ótima localização. Próximo a Columbus Circle e praticamente na esquina com o central park. Vale cada centavo. Aceita encomendas da Amazon. Só fique atento aos dias que a sala de entregas está aberta.

title: Bien para lo que es
text: Nos alojamos en dos habitaciones una individual y otra doble. La individual bastante floja, olía mucho a humedad no se el motivo realmente el tamaño era el justo y la cama cómoda. La doble las camas son en litera, no son el mejor colchón del mundo pero aceptable el tamaño quizá sea pequeño para dos personas con maletas pero organizandote bien te puedes arreglar. Los baños son comunes por planta, estaban siempre limpios y sin agobio para usarlo se veía que habían sido remodelados recientemente. Por el precio que pagas en NY centro yo creo que la relación calidad/precio de este albergue es correcta. No nos arrepentimos de la eleccion. Destacar que tienes líneas de metro a todos lados a pocos metros del hotel y justo pegado a central park

title: Fit for purpose
text: Typical YHCA - tiny rooms, cramped & stuffy, poor ventilation (therefore extremely hot, even in November!!!), rather unhelpful reception staff. Only plus side was the location - right on the Park, and for a small fraction of the price of surrounding establishments.

title: Not the best
text: Room had a hole in the wall. The beds were extremely loud when moving. The toilets were very communal and we all wished we could have showered in peace. I recommend taking swim wear if staying. The good points were the wifi was fast and staff were helpful

title: Muy buena  ubicación
text:
Excelente ubicación, a pocos pasos  del Central Park. 
La zona fitness muy buena y amplia, 3 pisos disponibles y con buen horario para disfrutarla.
Su  ubicación te permite recorrer a pie muchos de los sitios de interés en esa zona de Manhattan como el Museo de Historia Natural entre otros,
Buen sitio para disfrutar Nueva York, especialmente en diciembre.

title: An Unforgettable Experience.
text: 24 hour desk staff? They were very rude and incompetent. Except one woman who was very nice. The towels had brown stains on them, I dare question what they were. There was cat food in the guest book. The showers were dirty and the rooms smelt. Cheap prices for a hostel should not mean the staff should not care about the upkeep of the showers and rooms. I had no hangers on my extremely small "wardrobe" if you can call it that. Shower did not turn off and were cold. Great location and that was the only great thing. I left chocolates in my room and I came back after a tiring day looking forward to a piece, found it all gone! Must have been your maids! Overall my stay at your hostel was okay, but I will not be returning ever again!

title: Aids in Hotel Form
text: Welcomne to Hell. The showers had a build up of pubes, grease, feces and other human waste. There was bugs, the room smelt of my nan's breath and cheese when I first walked in. My friend's air conditioning didn't work so we put up with a broken window when the room got sweaty which was often. This place is literally disgusting. If you come here, you will catch some sort of infection and will be straight into the hospital. The worst place I have ever stayed at and I ever will stay at,

title: basic
text: we arrived after a 7 hour flight and all I needed was a nice place. Did I get that? No. It looks like a prison. The beds are lumpy and creaky. You have to walk into the SHARED bathroom if you want to go to the toilet. Then there is the showers, don't even get me started on the showers. On the 8th floor i presume there is a piece of a cloth to close the shower, on my floor which was the 11th, there was a glass door and you could see whoever was showering. There were clumps of hair in the shower, so great maids you have there. About the maids, they wouldn't even tidy your room, they would just fold up the cover of your bed at put it in the corner! wow. The blinds didn't shut and the windows were crap. Don't go, just don't do it. Seriously. Don't.

title: excellant stay we'll be back
text: our room was simple and clean.  the bathrooms were extremely clean. the location was excellent. I play racquetball and every morning I would meet up with other players at the courts and have a great workout. We will be staying there again.

title: Save, quiet, basic
text: If your looking for a 'room' that has a bed, table, quiet, great location, and save for the price, this is the place.  The bath room could use a little updating, but, functional.  We were there for 3 days during the 1st week in Dec.  We arrived early in the morning (1am) and was greeted by the 'guard'.  It was a little of a challenge to find our reservation, but, with our help were able to check in and go to bed.  It was small room - don't expect much.  A table and basic bathroom.  There is internet WiFi.  This is a great location - walking distance to all of great places in NYC.

title: Buen Alojamiento
text:
Muy comoda la Habitación, a excepción de la cama muy ruidosa, parecía colchón inflable ojo allí! pero lo demás todo super bien, con muy buena recepción.
esta en una muy buena Ubicación cerca del centro comercial en Columbus Circus y en frente del Central Park.

title: Disgraceful
text: I stayed there for 12 day over Christmas and new years eve. As soon as we walked into our room it immediately stank, and we were unable to open the window, and to top it all off our heater/ air conditioner didn't work. There was no hot water on our floor we had to go down and use the gym showers if we wanted hot water. The bunk beds were metal and every time someone moved it made a loud screeching noise. My stay there was horrendous i have never stayed in a place that bad, i would recommend anyone considering this hostel to avoid it and find somewhere else!!!

title: Someone to chuck your bags and rest your head
text: we stayed for a few days with my college group, we were on the 8th floor the rooms were 2 to a room - bunk beds small and simplistic, cramped and felt like a prison. But did the intended job! Somewhere to sleep and to chuck our bags. The beds were surprisingly comfy. However the bathrooms were not. I recommend using the showers on the floor of the gym (they have locking doors and not just a shower curtain) The wifi was good so was the breakfast 'grab n go' bar. Very close to Central Park and to the subway station. Good value for money if you are going to explore the city and not too bothered where you are sleeping. There's nowhere to really chill. But that's not what we needed as we were out first thing in the morning and back late at night!

title: Hostel com academia ou academia com hostel?
text:
Para quem já esteve em NY sabe da dificuldade em encontrar uma hospedagem justa, bem localizada a um preço acessível. Os valores costumam ser acima da média e ainda, nós brasileiros, contamos com o cambio bem desfavorável.

Tenho certeza também de quem vai a NY, com as inúmeras opções de lazer, quer fazer de TUDO, menos ficar dentro de um hotel, concorda? Pois bem, diante disso, e após algumas indicações de amigos viajantes me deparei com o referido hostel. Tinha alguns receios, pois viajava com meu pai, e não sabia se ele toparia ficar em um hostel e ainda por cima com banheiro compartilhado, pois a opção de banheiro privativo já havia esgotado. E não é que ele topou? :D

Além do excelente custo benefício, um dos fatores determinantes que me levou a escolher o YMCA foi a academia, se é que podemos chamá-la disso, pois parecia mais um complexo esportivo. Como estava treinando para a prova de triatlo IRONMAN 70.3 Brasil/Paraguai, não queria perder o condicionamento, principalmente no ciclismo e natação. É isso mesmo, o hostel possui uma piscina de 25 jardas em um de seus andares, acredita? E não apenas isso, quadra de esportes, salas com esteiras, bicicletas ergométricas, spinning, musculação, yoga, pilates, sauna, etc., tudo acessível aos hóspedes e aberto ao público mediante mensalidade.

A localização é algo que também levo muito em consideração. Fica ao lado de uma das entradas do Central Park, na 63 rd St, muito próximo do Lincoln Center e Columbus Circus, 66 e 59 st. respectivamente, ambos com estação de metrô.    

Os quartos são simples, pequenos e básicos, ou seja, cama (beliche no nosso caso), ar condicionado, armário, tv e uma mesinha. Os quartos são limpos diariamente e as toalhas são trocadas também. O banheiro, no nosso caso, era compartilhado e não tivemos maiores problemas, exceto por um dia que a água insistia em não aquecer. Fora isso, apenas o inconveniente de levantar no meio da madrugada para ir ao banheiro. :P 
Se pretende algo econômico, bem localizado em NY, pense nessa possibilidade e se encontrar algo melhor nestes requisitos, por favor me avise inbox, hahahahaha. ☺ 

Até o próximo review!
@Giovanifoz Raffagnin

title: Part gym, part hostel
text:
Great location near Columbus Circle, this place seemed very similar to HINY up on
103 rd. Cafe in lobby is convenient, and rooms with bath up the hall. But many people coming and going to the gym and pool who weren't staying there. Not as many international hostelers.

title: Better off going to vanderbilt.
text:
I was kinda happy when I left. Showers took so long to get warm water, it was actually easier to go to the gym locker room to take a shower.

The shower on the room floors were dirty, and most of them did not work. The bathrooms were not very clean, and the sinks were disgusting.

The Gym lockerroom was outdated, with a large number of lockers that were damaged. The sauna and the steam room were nice, and the showers were okay.

All in all, I'd reccoemd going to the Vanderbilt YMCA. It's comparable in price, and it's much cleaner and comfortable.

title: Best location
text: I've stayed in October. The hotel is average, the bathrooms are clean and the bed is comfortable, There is a small market downstairs to buy coffee, fuits and snaks, the staff is nice enough but the best is the location, I would go back.

title: Perfecto.
text: Muy buena ubicacion, a media cuadra del Central Park y a 3 cuadras del metro. Tienen la opcion de cuartos compartidos como tambien para 2 individuales. Las habitaciones confortables, nosotros nos quedamos en una individual con cama matrimonial, tiene lo basico pero estan muy bien. El personal muy amable.

title: La mejor ubicacion
text: El funcionamiento en general es buenos, el mail room tiene un horario amplio, la ubicación es buenísima; pero el area de star comun es algo pequeña y en relacion me pareció un poco caro por ser Hostel

title: Disappointed
text: I stayed at the ymca west side for about 8 days. First impressions are the bunk room is not suitable for two people; one person would have to sit on the bed to allow the other person to walk around while jumping over luggage. The bathrooms, 2 out of the 3 shower heads were broken, usable but would spray water in all directions. There is no way to put your clothes/toiletries when you shower. Don't bother asking the cleaners questions, as none of them speak English. Café staff are rude. Security however are brilliant and helpful! Location is great, only a short walk to time square/central park and subway!

title: Es un sitio para estudiantes y prima las instalaciones deportivas impresionantes tanto los gimnasios como las piscinas i
text: Ubicacion perfecta frente al MET. Habitaciones como en un colegio mayor con baños comunes en los pasillos, Pequña tienda para comprar lo que necesites e instalaciones comunes perfectas. Tienes que recordar que no es un hotel normal sino una instalacion para estudiantes

title: Comodo per visitare la Grande Mela
text: E' un ostello quindi ricordiamolo, il posto è in una posizione strategica e sicura, a piedi si arriva ovunque. Camere piccole e bagno in comune sul piano, con lenzuola pulite. Ottimo per chi vuole spendere poco e stare in centro.

title: Recomendable!!
text:
Excelente opción de alojamiento, sin dudas la ubicación es lo mas destacado. Hay que tener en cuenta que no te vas a encontrar con lujos pero tampoco es inhabitable. Son habitaciones (en mi caso para dos personas) de un espacio reducido pero con lo básico: escritorio, aire, tele, cuchetas NORMALES y un espacio para guardar las valijas. NADA MAS. En mi caso con los baños no tuve ningún tipo de inconvenientes, era como bañarse en un club. Tengan en cuenta de llevar algún tipo de bolsito apto para ducha, eso les va a resultar muy útil. 

Nunca habia estado en un hostel, sin dudas repetiría la experiencia.

title: Excellent Location!
text: I read all the reviews before I booked and was very pleased when I arrived. Yes, superb location, you can see the city and walk to Central Park. The room was surprisingly clean and shared bathrooms were ok. Because of the size of the rooms, I booked two, one for me and one for my son. The rooms are really for one person with luggage it becomes very cramped. The bed was ok, so if you are use to a comfortable mattress forget about it. I  must say this, if you are going to NYC to see the sights and enjoy what the city has to offer then this is the place for you. The price is great! It was basically a place to drop my suitcases, shower and hit the streets!

title: Ponto alto é a localidade com preço razoável...
text:
Localidade excelente...ao lado do Central park e próximo a Times Square
O hostel é bem decorado e simples.
Há metrô a 1 quadra
Possui um belo bar em piso superior,Piscina,quadra e academia.
E uma local muito bonito com bela vista da cidade.
Quarto muito limpo e simples,mas pequeno também e com beliches...
Banheiro limpo e compartilhado...
Não há café da manhã...
Mas para quem vai bater pernas durante o dia todo e pretende economizar em Manhatans é uma boa escolha sem luxo e sem estrutura de um hotel

title: Custo Benefício
text: Muito perto de duas estações, a 59th Street–Columbus Circle e a 66th Street–Lincoln Center. Achei bastante seguro, os seguranças são muito atenciosos, por sinal. O café que fica no hall do hostel não é Starbucks, há cafés do Starbucks mas não é uma franquia, pois tem outros produtos. Há uma Century21 bem pertinho. Super recomendo.

title: Location and facilities are great, everything else not so much
text:
We stayed in December for about 6 nights in the YMCA West Side. First of all the location is absolutely amazing for this money. You're literally 2 minutes from Central Park. There are free facilities to use (swimming pool and a fitness room). We haven't tried the swimming pool, but the fitness room was great, alot of equipment available and it was very clean. Downstairs there is a little shop available where you can buy hot drinks, cold drinks, sandwiches, cereals and some candy.
The rooms were quite terrible. First of all everywhere in the hostel/hotel it was extremely hot. It was freezing outside, yet for some reason everywhere inside (rooms and hallways) it was just too hot. In the room there was a window airconditioner, but it was so outdated and loud, that putting this on wasn't an option. In the morning we left with the window half open, in the evening we came back and it was still freaking hot inside (mind you it was freezing outside!). The rooms were quite small (hey what do you expect for this money) and terribly maintained. Paint coming from the walls, old furniture, uncomortable beds and so on.  For some reason staff came to clean our rooms daily, which seems very redundant for the shape the rooms were in.
There were three showers and toilets (for men) for I don't know how many rooms. Needless to say this wasn't enough for all guests. The showers were old and more often then not the handle came off. I must admit that there was plenty of hot water to take a shower in, which suprised me. The staff were in line with the overal hotel, they were there to check you in or out, but anything else was a burdon for them. ( I can understand if you get alot of complaints.

Anyway you get more or less what you pay for. For the most part you pay for the location.

title: Great Location
text:
I´d choose this hostel again just for the location, really close to columbus circle where you can take the subway, in a walking distance to times square and  hells kitchen where you can have a drinks by night and come back to the hostel walking. 
However during my 8 nights stay there was one day the wifi service was completely out of service

title: 立地、価格、個室にこだわる方オススメです。
text:
年末年始に利用しました。宿泊場所を検索するとやはりニューヨークのホテル代は高い‼︎その中で立地、価格、個室にこだわりここに決めました。
部屋はただ寝るだけだったら充分です。地下鉄、バス停までも歩いてすぐだし滞在中3日とも朝2時すぎでしたが、地下鉄で帰ってきても問題ありませんでした。

title: Bon emplacement
text: Très bien placé sur Colombus circle, cet établissement est un lieu stratégique pour visiter NYC. Auberge plutôt propre. Dans le hall : acceuil 24/24h, une cafétéria et accès wifi (pas dans les chambres). Literie moyenne, sanitaire commun mais douche individuelle pour le côté intime. Je recommande pour les groupes ou les chambres 2 personnes!

title: excelente ubicación. cumplidor
text:
Estuve en una habitación individual con vista al pulmón de manzana pero como era alta lograba ver el central park. 
No es un hostel donde uno pueda relacionarse con gente, con espacios para compartir y distenderse. las habitaciones son aceptables. el personal correcto. buen precio con una excelente ubicación.

title: 在中央公園旁 離地鐵站近
text:
櫃台服務人員很親切, 辦入住時提早到, 有嘗試讓我先入住, 雖然當下沒房, 但下午三點多一回來, 立刻認出我把房卡交給我. 
房間是12F 的高級單人房, 對於一個人出遊, 適合想要一點隱私, 又可以接受共用浴室的旅人,  12F的廁所及浴室 是需要拍卡進入, 相較之下比之前住過的Hostel乾淨一點.  

另外這次被安排在最後一間, 窗外可以直接看到中央公園, 雖然窗戶不大, 但還是感到很驚喜. 

地點 在中央公園一旁的巷內, 離哥倫布圓環站及林肯中心站都不遠, 交通很方便, 如果想散步 其實也能走到 第五大道或時代廣場, 

附近有 星巴克 24hr便利店藥局

title: Recomendable
text: Habitaciones chicas pero limpias, las camas son comodas aunque las habitaciones doble tienen cama cucheta. El hotel es economico y bien ubicado, cerca del metro y del columbus circle. Si envias paquetes al hotel te los guardan en un mailroom sin problemas. Muy recomendable.

title: Muy buena ubicación
text: Muy lindo, las habitaciones no son muy amplias, pero con todo lo que hay para hacer en new york vas a estar solo para dormir. Muy limpio todo. Ubicación excelente cerca de todo. Tene en cuenta que el horario de entrada es las 15.00 hs, si llegas antes te cobran 2 dolares por valija para que te las guarden. Atención muy buena. Volvería a hospedarme aquí.

title: Muy buen servicio!
text: Tuve el agrado de hospedarme en el west side ymca hace unos días y la verdad fue muy bueno todo, el baño siempre limpio y la habitación la limpiaban todos los días también! Volvería a visitarlo y lo recomiendo!

title: Buen lugar
text: Excelente ubicacion, comodas habitaciones, aseo una vez al dia, cafeteria funciona hasta temprano, no hay caja de seguridad, baños limpios. Edificio antiguo pero confortable. La calefaccion funciona perfecto.

title: LOCATIONNN!!!
text:
This place is great for short term stay, solo traveler.
Rooms are clean, comfortable and well equipped.
Shared baths are actually nice, kinda private, each shower has a door.
Location is absolutely amazing, walking distance to almost everywhere.
Price is very good and convenient comparing other options.
Been there 5 or 6 times within last year, and I´ll keep going.

title: Muy buena atención del personal y economico
text: Si bien las habitaciones son pequeñisimas!!! solo para dormir hay 12 baños por piso que son bastante grandes.- Nunca tuve problemas para usar sus servicios.-El personal siempre esta dispuesto a ayudar y el gimnasio es el mejor que vi hasta hoy, incluso en hoteles 5 * .- Muy recomendable-

title: Ótimo custo x benefício
text: Tive 2 momentos no West Side, um bom e outro ruim. No primeiro momento da viagem consegui apenas quarto com beliche, era feriado de Thanksgiving e foi uma ótima estadia. O quarto era bem pequeno, mas suficiente, camas confortáveis, tudo muito organizado e limpo. Além de ter conseguido fazer checkin cedo, a recepcionista era muito simpática e solícita. Nesse momento passamos 3 noites. 10 dias depois, retornei a NY apenas para mais uma noite e aí ficamos em um quarto com cama de casal. Desta vez não gostamos! A cama era estranha e desconfortável, o quarto estava sujo, com muito pó e tinha apenas 1 toalha de banho, a outra era tão pequena que parecia uma toalha de rosto. Além de ter sido mal atendida pelo rapaz da recepção em dois momentos. Foi engraçado como em menos de 10 dias tivemos experiências tão diferentes no mesmo lugar. A localização é o ponto alto deste hostel.

title: L'ottavo piano è una topaia, il resto è ok
text:
Ho pernottato in questo hotel per 14 giorni insieme ad un amico, la struttura è ottima, offre tanti servizi come piscina, sala pesi ecc.
L'ottavo piano in particolare faceva pena, stanze minuscole ma ottime se ci si deve solo dormire e spendere poco.
I bagni in comune facevano rabbrividire, docce vecchie e zozze, stesso per i lavandini, bagni puliti scarsamente e ho anche intravisto blatte.
Solo gli ultimi giorni ho iniziato a farmi la doccia e a usare i servizi igienici dei piani superiori che erano nettamente più puliti e moderni.
C'è da dire che la posizione è ottima però, a pochi passi dalla Columbus station e molto vicini a Central Park.
Personale molto cordiale e le aree in comune erano molto tranquille.

title: Value of Money
text:
- By the central park, my room had a good view.
- Very close to subway at Columbus circle and few minutes walk to many places especially Central Park.
- Very basic place to stay at.
- Clean, Wifi.
- Value of money.

title: West Side Y, New York
text: The Y is beautifully located, just a skip and a jump from Columbus Circle, with Lincoln Center just down the street. But this are simple accommodations with shared bathroom that is not always kept clean or dry. I did not mind a simple room, small TV, and spartan arrangement, however, and it is not easy to find hotels in this part of time without having to pay a great deal more. I also like the welcome room, with which offers drinks and snacks during the day, and furniture to rest and get ready for the busy life of the city.

title: Zum Schlafen und Fitness
text: Wie mehrfach schon erwähnt ist die Lage top. Das sollte auch neben dem Preis vielleicht noch der einzige Grund sein hier abzusteigen. Es ist nunmal kein Hotel! Man kann zwischen grosser Nasszelle und für etwas mehr Geld, semi-privatem Bad, d.h. abschliessbares Einzelbad für geteilte Nutzung wählen. Selbst semi-privates war teilweise hygenisch sehr grenzwertig. Zimmer sind sehr spartanisch mit grellem weissem Licht. Werden jeden Tag geputz. Weil Klimaanlage im Fenster sitzt Lärm von aussen gut hörbar. Personal hilfsbereit. Sicherheit gut. 24/7 Pförtner. Schwimmbad/Grosses Fitnessstudio im 2 bis 4 Stock kann mitbenutzt werden.

title: Una muy buena opción económica en una ciudad con hotelería muy costosa
text:
La idea es visitar Nueva York, alojándose a 150mts de una de las principales estaciones del Subway, enfrente del Central Park, gastando mucho menos de lo que vale en esa zona.
 Cuando uno visita esta grandiosa ciudad solo se está en el hotel por las noches, por lo tanto, adaptarse al baño compartido no es tan difícil. Los baños están muy bien (piso 11) y también pueden usarse los vestuarios y duchas de la pileta, con instalaciones muy lindas. Allí hay secador de pelo.
La gente de la recepción es, x sobre todas las cosas, eficiente. No vas a tener problemas. Las camas son muy buenas y las habitaciones están muy limpias, las limpian a diario. 
Tienen calefacción central y aire acondicionado.
Se pueden dejar las valijas x 5 usd c/u. Se puede usar la pileta, hay que llevar gorra de baño.
En planta baja hay un Starbucks donde comprar para desayunar en el salón común.
Otra comodidad? En Columbus Circle ( a 150 mts) está Wholefoods, un mega súper donde se puede cenar bien x pocos usd luego de un día de largas caminatas, y de ahí sólo quedan pocos metros para llegar a una confortable cama!

title: Mah...
text: Onestamente non so se ci ritornerei. Ma non per l'alloggio in se, quanto x il target di persone che è attirato dal prezzo vantaggioso ed economico per un hotel sul central park...posizione hotel OTTIMA. Esempio, ero in bagno (in comune, ma non molto "trafficato", pensavo ci potesse essere un problema di privacy ma nn è stato così, e vorrei tranquillizzare tutti coloro che ci andranno) e ad un certo punto mi vedo arrivare una persona che senza ciabatte o pantofole cammina soltanto indossando un paio di calzini che, si sono inzuppati di acqua e ALTRO! Il punto è, nn tanto la sua igiene personale quanto il fatto di immaginare che in quelle condizioni si sia messo nel letto...il personale cambia le lenzuola anche se non molto spesso (in una settimana una sola volta) ma il materasso ovviamente no. Il problema è stato solo quello, per il resto mi sono trovato bene, stanza piccola ed essenziale, ma chi va a NY non sta certo chiuso in stanza! In conclusione: esperienza positiva, nn si può chiedere di più con un prezzo così basso. Peccato solo quello che ho visto e che personalmente non mi è piaciuto, altrimenti ci ritornerei molto volentieri.

title: Una cosa positiva LA POSIZIONE!
text: Le camere non sono mai state pulite, i letti li rifanno solo una volta ogni tot giorni, per il resto delle volte ti lasciano solo le lenzuola pulite che te le devi mettere tu! Ci sono tre bagni con tre docce in comune sempre abbastanza puliti! HOTEL PER GIOVANI CHE SI SANNO ACCONTENTARE! La posizione è OTTIMA!

title: Best Location, excellent service!
text:
My boyfriend and I were staying in New York for 4 days! We chose YMCA Westside because of the location to central park in relation to the price. (We are students) 

Its our first time in New York and when we arrived at West Side YMCA, we were greeted with such friendly and helpful staff. 

Our baggage was delayed at the airport so we had to wait a full day before we were told it would arrive. After 36 hours.. It was still hadn't arrived. The Manager, James didn't hesitate to help me contact the airport and said that once it has arrived he will call our room himself! 

If you are coming to New York for the first time and plan on sightseeing all day.. Then YMCA is the place! There aren't many home comforts.. But the room is fitted with your basic needs! We had a comfy bed, Free wifi, working TV, working heater, desk with a chair and a clean room.

I suggest you stay on floors 11-13, as they seem to be the good ones!

The gym is also a lovely addition which you are free to access!

title: Cheap decent hostel
text: The hostel wasn't great quality but provided what you need for a trip to New York, a bed and quick access to the city(a bed and a shower). The view from my room was great as it was on the eleventh floor, however, the floor was very dirty, the tv didn't work, the heating didn't work(bare in mind this was February in -14 degrees Celsius) and the springs in the mattress were very uncomfortable. Apart from these issues the hostel was adequate and what you expect for the price... I went here on a trip with my school and throughly enjoyed visiting the city and the location of this hostel definitely provided an incite into city life being just off Central Park and Columbus square! Overall a decent hostel in an amazing city! 🎉✈️

title: 価格見合いという意味で
text:
ただの素泊まりで安くマンハッタン内での宿を考えるなら有りと思います。
私の宿泊プランはトイレもバスも共有でしたので、それを不便と考えるならやめたほうがいいかと思います。

title: Muy solitario y oscuro en la noche, pero muy centrico
text: El hotel con una temática muy bonita, me ayudaron con la maletas ya que yo estaba en silla de ruedas. Muy cercano al Central Park, pero en la noche es muy oscuro y solitario, rampa para discapacitados la cerraron temprano y se me complicó ingresar.

title: Location is great, that's all
text:
Despite all the comments about the quality of this place compared to the price, I totally disagree that it's worth!
I'm saying that because I've stayed in the Vanderbilt YMCA, and it's far more clean, organised, comfortable and above all: the staff was friendly and helpful. 
I can't tell you the same about the West Side. 
First of all, we arrived very tired after 9 hours flying plus 1 hour waiting at the airport immigration, and we needed to store our luggage for at least chill in Central Park that is steps away, because early check in was not available (I'm not complaining, just saying! I know early check in depends on availability of rooms), and it took at least 30 minutes for them to locate someone to open the door of the place that is reserved to store the luggage of guests in the same situation (I think fair to say that you pay 2 USD per piece you leave). 
Second, there was no fridge in the room (all the times I stayed in the Vanderbilt I could count with one, which was great because we bought food and drinks that needed to be cold).
Third, the bathrooms are too small for the amount of people they put on each floor. So it caused a bit of a line in the morning for showering mixed with the sound of people using the toilet. Ok it's a hostel and before booking we knew the bathroom would be in a communal area, but this should have been calculated and they should have spread more bathrooms in the floors. Or at least separate toilets and bathrooms lol.
Don't expect kindness or even a complete information from the staff. Receptionists are not attentive,

title: Voltaria com certeza
text:
Primeiramente tenho que ressaltar a localização: perfeita!
É uma região nobre de Manhatan e comparado ao preço vale muito a pena. Perto de duas estações de metrô (Lincoln Center e Columbus Circle). Dá pra ir até até a Times Square, Quinta avenida e outros.
O hotel em si é simples, quarto pequeno mas o suficiente pra deixar minhas malas, com uma cama, penteadeira e espelho: tudo o que eu precisava.
É necessário senha pra entrar no banheiro e achei isso moderno, nunca encontrei o banheiro sujo e nem cheio, a ducha é bem quente, um alívio pro frio que faz no Outono de NY.
Eu saía do hotel de manhã e só voltava a noite pra tomar banho e dormir, então pra mim atendeu a tudo que precisei... talvez se tivesse pago um hotel caro, teria desperdiçado o dinheiro.
Staff não muito simpático, mas não precisei deles mesmo, então ok.
Com certeza voltaria!

title: 立地条件や快適　Good
text:
快適さや　清潔感　は　Good!
立地条件も　どこに行くにも便利な場所です。
　ベッドメイキング等のお世話くださるおばさま　何時もベッドサイドの落とし物まで丁寧に対応、帰国時には　ベッドのしたに　忘れ物　無いかと　声をかけてくれました。
　ポットや電子レンジ等がないのが　少し不便　オニギリ用のお米等持って行きましたが　温めが出来なかった＞＜;;;

また　利用したいホテルです。

title: The Gym is the Gem
text: Manhattan is an expensive city for hotels so my choice is always YMCA Westside. I'll get a room at either of the two top floors. The rooms are rough but the beds are ok. The gym is the hidden gem of this place. You can enter free of charge, take a refreshening shower and chill out in the sauna or steam bath with the elderly regulars. Iðll be back!

title: Excelente ubicación
text:
Lo mejor del YMCA es su ubicación, a media cuadra de Central Park y está a una distancia buena para caminar a Times Square. 
La habitación es muy pequeña, la cama cumple, pero nada más, pero es razonable por el precio que uno paga, es muy económico para Nueva York.
Los baños compartidos son muy limpios.
La mejor opción para los que viajamos con un presupuesto ajustado.

title: Excelentes precios
text: Precios muy accesibles, alrededor de 130 dolares la noche para dos personas. Baños super limpios, muchos por piso y con tarjeta magnética. La ubicación inmejorable, frente al central park, y a 3 cuadras de columbus circle, se puede hacer casi todo caminando desde ahí. Muy recomendable, sobre todo en los pisos 12 y 13 que son nuevos.

title: Excelente ubicación
text: La hostal tiene una de las mejores ubicaciones de Manhattan. Está a media cuadra del Central Park, a dos de la estación de metro Columbus Circle / 59 st., y cercano a las principales tiendas, bares y restaurantes del centro.

title: Big room, a little bit cold
text:
We stayed here for 2 nights, 30 sept - 1 oct 2016. Let's take it from the beginning:

We got to the hotel around 10-11 in the morning, and they told us that the check in isn't until 2 30 pm, so we had to let our baggage (it's 2$/piece and they keep it until 11pm). We went to grab a bite and to visit the Central Park Zoo (which btw is really nice and close to the hotel) and then we came back and checked in. The room was at the 12th floor, it had a full bed, a table, a chair and a wardrobe but it was pretty large and we had a lot of space for the amount of baggage we had. The only thing that bothered us was that they did not exactly turn on the heating system (or the one in our room wasn't  working) and since outside was raining and cold, we felt pretty cold. We hat a blanket in the room but it could've been more consistent. 
If you're not a fan of sharing a bathroom, this one isn't for you. But if you are, the bathrooms are pretty clean and large, they have 2 on each floor (1 for men and 1 for women) and that's ok. My boyfriend said that he had some troubles waiting for the hot water to come, so I think it depends on how lucky you are. 

Overall, the hotel was nice, in a really good area, housekeeping's  done great. If we come back to NYC, we might consider this place again!

title: awesome location
text: enjoyed my stay and it was in the perfect location. had a bit of mess with my room booking so had to change room after a couple of days but got upgraded to a better room. the gym is fantastic and a brilliant extra.

title: 제발 가지마세요.
text:
호텔스닷컴을 통해 미리 저렴하게 예약했고, 3박 미리 결제 했으나. 1박차에 베드벅발견!!!
뉴욕여행 첫날이었는데 최악이다.

이미 창문 깨져있는 방을 받아서 방 교환한 적있는데 베드벅방을 준것이다. 

방교환시 2번이나 카드키 안먹는거 줘서 계속 카운터 내려갔다올라갔다 함.

난방도 안되서 추웠다.
 
시차적응이 안돼 못자고 있는 새벽5시 핸드폰불빛으로 새벽에 베드벅 침대에서 발견. 불켜보니 벽에도 기어가고
눈앞에서 살아있는 베드벅(진드기)발견!
유럽이나 남미도 아니고 뉴욕에서 베드벅을 볼 줄이야...
- 환불요구(매니저가 휴가가서 준매니저급이랑 얘기함)
- 남은 이틀. 다른방으로 옮겨주겠고, 추후 숙박예약하면 현재가의 20프로 할인가(학생할인가)제공해주겠다 함
- (우린 가격 쌀때 이미 전일정 예매다 해놓고 왔고 호텔스닷컴 쿠폰적용해서 더 싸게 예매함) 
이 숙소 에서 있고 싶지 않다. 연말이라 지금 알아보면 숙소도 없고 비싸겠지만계속 환불 요구함
- 추후 숙박시 반데빌트 지점 20프로 할인해주겠다.
-  이미 전 일정에 대해 결제해놓고 왔다. 반데빌트 2일 미리 결제한거 있다
- 그럼. 그거 취소하고 20프로 할인에 업그레이드 시켜주겠다. 아직 이용하지않은 남은일정만 환불해주겠다. 
- 26일 박싱데인데 쇼핑일정 망침. 
- 다른 숙소로 옮기고 원래 계획된 필라델피아 감. 불안함. 
- 진짜 매니저 메일 옴. 전액 환불해주겠다고 함. 하지만 반데빌트. (우리가 미리예매한건 취소하고 자기들이 예약해준 방)은 없었던걸로 할테니 알아서 다시 예매해라.
- 갑자기 그런 메일와서 답장보내고. 갑자기 내일모레 묵을 숙소 예약하느라 정신없어 여행일정이 엉망.
- 연말과 새해라서.  자기 휴가가니 반데빌트 지점의 직원에 얘기해놧으니 상의하라고 함. 환불해준다고 해놓고... 기다려도기다려도 안되서 메일보내니 자기네들은 못하니 니네가 알아서 호텔스닷컴에 연락하라고 함. 그냥 그말만 믿고 기다렸으면 생돈나갈뻔함.ㅡㅡ
- 여행내내 숙소 매니저와 메일 연락기다리고(답장도 바로안함.) . 호텔스닷컴과 통화 하고 힘들었음(휴가라 연락안됌). 귀국시까지 연락안되고 환불못받을까봐 불안함.

title: Excelente
text: La atención y ganas de ayudarte fue muy bueno. Sus empleados muy predispuestos. Limpieza y aseo muy bien. Muy bien ubicado y con instalaciones muy lindas. Las habitaciones individuales son cómodas. Lo recomiendo en tu visita a New York

title: War das schlimmste Hotel in dem ich je war
text: Besuch ist schon eine Weile her. Aber das Zimmer war winzig klein mit einem stockbett und super ekligem Bettzeug. Eine uralte Klimaanlage ratterte ununterbrochen. Wegen dieser könnte man das Fenster nicht ganz schließen. Duschen und Toiletten gab es nur auf dem Gang.

title: Bom atendimento, simples e bem localizado!
text:
Um bom lugar para quem quer pagar um valor justo e estar bem localizado. Perto do Central Park, este hotel é bem localizado e os quartos simples, porém satisfatórios.
