Peguei a opcão com banheiro compartilhjado, porém, eles são individuais, achei o esquema bem legal. As funcionárias limpam quartos e banheiros o tempo todo.
Modernizado a pouco tempo, os quartos possume cartões, no mesmo esquema de hotéis.

title: Du får, hvad du betaler for.
text:
Stedet er i og for sig fint nok. 
Det er voldsomt slidt og træt i betrækket.
Værelserne er bitte små og toiletterne plus badeværelserne er på gangene.
Hmm, ja.

Men tilgengæld får du en fantastisk beliggenhed - en beliggenhed som i NYC, ellers ikke er til at betale for penge.

Så når man skal til NYC skal man overveje om man vil bo lækkert. Det vil betyde at man skal ret langt uden for centrum. 
Eller om man vil gå en smule ned i standard, men så derimod bo helt fantastisk - lige ud til Central Park.

title: West Side YMCA
text:
Хостел расположен просто идеально ! В нескольких шагах от Central Park и от Columbus station (очень удобно добираться с аэропорта Kennedy и в аэропорт La Guardia. Весь Манхеттан под боком,супер ! 
Нужно понимать,что это хостел,за эти деньги в этом районе, то ,что нужно ! Комнаты маленькие,душевые расположены на этажах или на 3 этаже есть душевые бассейна.
Рядом есть супер маркеты с продуктами питания,много различных магазинов и кафешек быстрого питания .
Заселили нас быстро! Wi-Fi работал исправно в номере.Мы жили на 8 этаже. Больше ничего написать не могу,в хостел приходили только переночевать и с раннего утра уже убегали в город! Нью Йорк потрясающее место !!

title: Hotel ymc a New york
text:
Super emplacement tout près de time square, central Park
Chambre vétusté mais les sanitaires propres
Beaucoup d'aller et venue la nuit donc bruyant
Par contre super complexe sportif salle de fitness  et 2 piscines

title: Superb location and budget - rooms adequate
text: Stayed here for 1 night as this was so well located - we were actually staying in NJ for our great NYC visit but decided to see a show (Aladdin) as a special family treat and didn't want to fiddle around with trains so late at night (&wake our host!). Hence we wanted a cheap room (2 actually) that was central. As all other reviews say - cheapest place to stay so close to Columbus Circle, Lincoln Centre, Broadway, Central Park. Rooms very basic but perfect if all you need is a place to lay one's weary body after a full day & night in NYC. No extra comforts, don't expect anything except bed, linen, towel. That's basically it. Aircon worked but only just. TV with difficulty. Odd as it may sound, we would certainly recommend folk who are on a budget to stay here. It's a decent area and so very close to many famous tourist sites. We picked up take away breakfast at the nearby Whole Food Market and walked to Central Park and enjoyed a wonderful meal, on a Central Park bench watching all the Sunday morning people and doggie activity! A memorable non-restaurant meal in an iconic part of the world.

title: Excelente zona para estadia
text: El ymca en el west side tiene la mejor ubicación en todo Manhattan. Sigue siendo un hostel con complicaciones de competir baños, pero nada que no te digan antes de la contratcion. En el check in y checa out tienen la mejor atención. Lo recomiendo como excelente equilibrio entre calidad y precio

title: Not what I had expected
text: I'll get this off the table straight away, the staff were really nice and helpful. That's my only real positive in this review, I just felt the pricing and reviews on booking.com were the exact opposite. The rooms are severely dated, the cost of the rooms is wildly high for what was on offer. I would never ever stay here in winter, I froze for my two night stay and wasn't impressed. The best thing is you can disappear into central park for hours to avoid the room until some of the nearby restaurants open. It was so cold I had to wear most of my winter clothes, super sick today. Stay in summer only for the location that's my advice, I'll never stay there again.

title: Muy buena opción
text: La ubicación es excelente! Frente al Central Park y a una cuadra y media del Lincoln Center. Yo elegí habitación para dos personas. Super limpia y el baño si bien es de uso de todos es de acceso exclusivo, super completo con buena mesada, amplia ducha con mampara y demás aparatos sanitarios, todo super limpio.

title: Buena ubicación..solo eso.
text: El hostel está muy bien ubicado. Se puede llegar caminando a las principales atracciones de Manhattan. A 2 cuadras de Columbus Circle y de una estación de metro. Eso es lo único bueno. El personal del hostel es realmente desagradable, te contestan mal, te maltratan. Jamás me trataron así en ningún hotel. Los baños compartidos los limpian 1 vez por día (a la mañana) y la habitación es tan chiquita que solo entran las valijas (yo estaba en una habitación privada). Tiene un pequeño "bar" abajo donde se puede comprar café, snacks o algún sándwich (café o té 2 dólares, muffin 2.44, sándwich entre 7 y 9 dólares aprox.). Solo volvería si no pudiera pagar algo mejor, de lo contrario no lo recomiendo.

title: Funcional
text:
O West Side YMCA fica em uma ótima localização, no Upper West Side de NY, perto da Lincoln Square, pertinho de duas estações de metrô. Achei a localização ótima e bastante prática, principalmente considerando os preços cobrados por outros hotéis/hostels na mesma região de Manhattan.
O prédio é um grande complexo esportivo com centenas de apartamentos. Não é o máximo conforto e os quartos são bem pequenos, mas pra mim foi excelente! Ia pro quarto só pra dormir e a cama era uma beliche (com colchão bom, inclusive) e sempre havia serviço de quarto pra dar uma geral no quartinho. O banheiro é compartilhado, mas os chuveiros são ótimos e eu não tive problema nenhum na minha estadia. 
Para quem está com o orçamento apertado e procurando ficar em Manhattan durante a viagem para NY, recomendo!!

title: La ubicación es excelente
text: Un buen sitio para dormir y tener las cosas en tu viaje. Además tienes acceso al gimnasio y la piscina, junto a Central Park a un paso. Una maravilla para estar en El Centro de Manhattan por un precio muy económico y sin depender de transportes.

title: Just Budget
text:
Blame it on expensive hotel rate elsewhere, I stayed here because of it's cheaper. On the plus side, the location is very very good. 

Daily room cleaning was omitted even I returned to my room at 2pm on Sunday. I read again and again on their guest information book: "We like to keep our room clean, if you place "do not disturb sign" your room will be cleaned after 2pm. Guest cannot refuse room service for more than a day. Please notify the front desk if you don't want room service for one day." Oh well, whatever, liar.

No additional power plug. If you need to charge phone battery, unplug the desk lamp cable cord from the socket. 

Semi private bathroom is shared with other guests. We need to tap our room key to unlock them. Do not forget to lock your bathroom while using it, else other people can similarly unlock them by their room key and found you are naked inside! Beach flip flops are doing their great jobs for me, as the bathroom floor can be wet and not guaranteed clean.

I am not sure if I should return again to this place. If I find somewhere else with better cost-performance, I will surely stay there.

title: Goede prijs/ kwaliteit
text:
Wij verbleven 8 nachtjes in dit Hostel. Eenvoudige wat shabby kamer met stapelbed😳. Elke dag schoon handdoekje en laken. Gezamenlijk gebruik van toilet en badkamer. Dat ging meestal goed, een enkele keer had de jeugd voor ons de boel niet zo netjes achtergelaten. Deze ruimtes kunnen wel een opknapbeurtje gebruiken. 
Locatie is perfect; Central Park en Columbus Cirkel om de hoek. Alle high lights goed bereikbaar. 
We waren bang dat alleen jeugd het Hostel zou gebruiken maar het was een zeer gemêleerd publiek.
Gasten mogen gebruik maken van de inpandige fitnessruimte en zwembad.
In de nabije omgeving voldoende gelegenheid voor ontbijt, lunch, diner.
We zouden zó deze locatie weer boeken. Perfecte locatie in een mooi oud gebouw voor diegenen die niet kieskeurig zijn en niet zoveel geld willen uitgeven. New York is verder al duur genoeg!

title: Excelente ubicación y una alternativa economica
text:
La ubicación y la estructura del edificio es lo mejor que tiene el lugar. El punto más flojo y que con un poco de esmero pueden mejorar es el  trato del personal de recepción.  No tienen predisposición para colaborar con lo que uno necesita. Sólo destaco la amabilidad de uno de ellos el último ´dia cuando le explicamos que no podiamos reservar el shuttle al aeropuerto desde la web porque pedían un tel. de contacto y, siendo argentinas, es dificil que tengas la opción de llamadas (salvo que la quieras pagar)- Ya que tienen carteles por todos lados que resaltan los valores de las personas que trabajan en el lugar, podrían reforzar esta cuestión de cómo atender al turista y brindarle la información que necesita. 
Si bien había carteles de indicación sobre lo que las áreas de cada piso, me parece que no cuesta nada al momento del check in, brindar un detalle de los espacios a los cuales uno tienen acceso. 
Nos tocó una habitación en el piso 12 y el WIFI no funcionaba adentro. Tenía que salir al pasillo para que tomara la señal. 
Quisiera también expresar que un enchufe con 2 tomas en una habitación es insuficiente. Cuando uno va de viaje lleva muchos aparatos que necesitan carga. Si con 2 personas teniamos que turnarnos en lo que cárgábamos, con más integrantes en la habitación es dificil.

title: Fattibile con poco budget
text: Ho soggiornato in questo Ostello per due notti con amici. Camera privata con bagno in comune, modesto, ma pulito. Molte cose sono e aggiustate "alla meglio": termosifone, porte, tenda della doccia e sifone doccia. Prezzo ottimo per la posizione, personale poco ma gentile. Ci tornerei.

title: Hostel meia boca
text:
A localização é muito boa. É um dos poucos motivos que vale ficar.
Não existe a possibilidade de não entrarem/limparem o seu quarto. A cama é barulhenta (metal), e o colchão é de molas (não muito bom).
O banheiro é compartilhado, mas não é muvucado.

title: Location Great, Rooms not so much
text: I went on a four day trip to NYC with friends, and was delighted to find somewhere so cheap to stay. The location was great, a minutes walk to Columbus's circle subway station and around 10 mins from Times Square, it was ideal. I know the rooms were cheap, but there is only so much that can be lacking. The TV, radiator and plug sockets did not work ! I thought because it was only a few days I would just ignore it, but really the necessities should be working.

title: Services are not satisfactory
text: The YMCA is at a supreme location but very expensive in terms of money which we paid. The staff was not at all supportive and very rude. The rooms are not having much space to move with luggage and wash rooms are not attached. It is having a common toilet and it was not very comfortable. Drinking water cooler was not functioning. I was there to attend a conference with Microsoft. Booked online but later on realized that in this rate, we were having many options and get much better hotel.

title: Muy bien ubicado
text: Muy bien ubicado cerca del metro de Columbus que conecta para todos lados. El Central Park ahí nomas y Broadway. Muy limpio y con buena gente. Recomendable para el que soporta tener el baño fuera del cuarto. Lo único molesto. Pero por el precio es indiscutible.

title: ビーサン必須
text:
日本に比べてNYのホテルは高く、貧乏旅行の我々はここに宿泊しました。
立地は良かったですが、値段なり宿です。
私には合わず、後悔しました。
部屋は3畳あるかないかで、スーツケースを広げられない。
シャワーや洗面は共用となっており、使い方が荒い人もいて水浸しでした。ビーチサンダルは必ず持って行きましょう。
あと、使い捨てスリッパとドライヤーも持参をオススメします。
日本のビジネスホテルとかを想像してると、間違えます。

title: Un buen hostel si quieres ahorrar en NYC
text: Me gusta este hostel por que tiene una ubicación buenísima: frente a central park y a una cuadra de columbus circle. Tiene wifi en las habitaciones y aunque son con baños compartidos las habitaciones si son privadas así que no tienes que estar con otra gente en la habitación. Es de los buenos hostel de manhattan!

title: Excelente ubicación, buena relación en base a costo, práctico
text: Es básico que te hospedes en Manhatan para una experiencia completa!, por eso este lugar al no ser caro, estar en la calle 63, pegado a central park y a 3 4 cuadras de la estación de metro de columbus circle, hará de tu experiencia en NY mucho más agradable. la zona es bonita y las caminadas de regreso o de salida del hostal los disfrutaras. es un hotel para viajeros, pues sus habitaciones son pequeñas y sumamente básicas pero con todo lo necesario para poder llegar a descansar, asearse y conectarse al mundo con su wifi.  en definitivo se los recomiendo para que conozcan manhatan.  de ahi vas caminando al Dakota building, a central park, a times, a la quinta avenida, al empire a muchismos lados te queda excelente!!!

title: Average but would stay here again.
text:
I stayed here for 4 nights and it was fine. The location is great, the room was good (staying on the 9th floor) but the bathroom was disgusting. The bathrooms were clean enough but very old, hot and the showers don't offer much privacy or any space to get changed.
Still, due to the location I would stay here again.

title: good deal and location for the money
text: i've alway enjoyed my stay at the westside. close to central park. easy to get to from jfk airport. just take the A train to colombus center and walk a couple of half block. near a lot of choices for food.

title: Levné ubytování na Manhattanu
text: Toto ubytování vítězí svým umístěním. Nachází se přímo na Manhattanu u Central parku. Cena přes booking byla 2400 za dvoulůžkový pokoj za noc. Jedná se o malý pokojík s palandou, stolkem a TV. Sdílené toalety a sprchy. To může většinu lidí odradit, ale úklid probíhal každý den, tak se i toto dalo přežít. Dámské toalety opatřeny kódem u vstupních dveří. Ve dvou patrech navíc možnost soukromých sprch. YMCA nabízí volnočasové aktivity pro místní s posilovnou, bazénem apod., které jako ubytovaný host můžete bezplatně využít také. Personál na recepci velmi vstřícný. Velmi zajímavá volba, pokud chcete bydlet přímo v centru.

title: Excelente ubicación
text:
El lugar es muy agradable de estilo antiguo, con los servicios y comodidades que necesitas, la limpieza es muy buena, servicio de wifi, ascensor, servicio de información en español, con personal bilingue.
Al ingreso hay un mini shop para proveerte de alguno alimentos para desayunar y demas colaciones durante el día, ya en la noche no se encuentra abierto, al menos hasta cuando estuvimos alojados.
La ubicación es exelente cerca del transporte público y del Columbus Circle que justo enfrente se encuentra el Shopping de Columbus Circle donde se puede ir a comer a precios muy baratos.
Es destacar la cercanía al Central Park. 
Buena relación precio/calidad.

title: Lo necesario, bien.
text: habitación mínima, pero con lo necesario: una cama cómoda, sábanas impecables, buena calefacción. El baño es compartido, y a determinada hora puede llevar un tiempo conseguir una ducha libre. Lo bueno es que hay muchos baños con ducha individuales, por eso hay buena privacidad. Un rico starbucks puertas adentro para desayunar. la ubicación es genial: a dos cuadras del Central Park y a dos de Colombus Circle, donde está el subte.

title: 場所と値段のギャップが凄いです。
text:
セントラルパークが目の前です。
他の名門一流ホテルと同じアクセスが、こんなに安価で良いのかという感じです。
セミシングルに泊まりました。
部屋は質素で、最低限のものだけ備わっていますので、日本のビジネスホテルから、バスとトイレを引いた感じです。
トイレとシャワーは共用でしたが、セキュリティキーを使って入るため、占有可能です。
割り切ったら、節約長期滞在が可能です。

title: Does what it needs
text:
The beds are not the best. The showers are not the nicest. But it's relatively cheap, is in a great location and acts as an amazing base for your time in the city! I spent most of my day out in the actual city, so I really only needed this to be a place where I could sleep and it does just that! 

Would recommend to anyone visiting NYC on a budget!

title: ubicación
text: la ubicación es excelente y la relación calidad /precio es lo mejor que vas a encontrar al lado de central park y cerca del centro.los baños son compartidos pero muy limpios, los limpian a cada nada. las camas son cómodas y el suelo de moqueta.

title: Great location, average rooms, good gym
text:
As the title says you are in a great location if you stay here, only a short walk from Times Square and right across the road from Central Park.
The rooms themselves I think could do with a bit of a deep clean and the showers could definitely do with a refurb. A good bonus of this place is that you can use the gym/sauna/steamroom downstairs and use the showers there too which are a lot nicer and this is what I tended to do. The gym itself is great. It's nice and quiet though even though it's central. The downside to using this as a hostel is that there is no kitchen or laundry facilities, I missed not having a kitchen but there is a laundromat round the corner that you can do a load for $4.25, soap included.
Overall I'd say it's a good place in the city to lay your head but I have stayed in better hostels.

title: Ostello
text: Letto a castello per il viaggiatore singolo? Camera picollissima! Condizionatore d'aria fredda molto rumoroso. Il bagno in comune. Non si dorme per i mille rumori provenienti da ogni parte. Caro per essere un ostello. Si trova di meglio e ad un prezzo più basso. Unica cosa positiva è la vicinanza al Central Park.

title: Férias
text: Excelente localização. Fiquei em um quarto individual, para um hostel achei espaçoso. O quarto foi limpo todos os dias. O Hostel é bem grande, limpo e tem ótimo atendimento. Mas a melhor parte é a localização.

title: ミストサウナ
text:
口コミを読んで行ったので、水周りがとても心配だったのですが、私には問題なかったです。
8階のシングルに4泊。とてもシンプル。匂い問題なし。最初、部屋のドアが開かなくて何度も試してたら、通りかかった向かいの部屋のおじいちゃんが開けてくれました。湿度が高く強く押さないと開かないよ、と言ってました。
初日は8階のシャワーを利用。ここは最悪でしたね。
2泊目以降は、3階にあるスポーツジムのシャワールームを利用。タオル、水、ペーパー、ビニール袋、ドライヤーは使い放題。
特にミストサウナは最高です。朝はあまり人がいなくオススメ。
水着を持ってきていたら、プール、ウェアを持って来ていたら、4階でヨガなどのプログラムに参加したかったです。

なにしろ宿泊費が馬鹿高いニューヨーク。一人旅だと特に。お安く泊まれて立地もよく助かりました。

title: Aceptable
text: El hostel tiene una ubicación excelente, al lado de central park y a pocos metros de la estación de metro columbus circle y unos 10 minutos andado de times square. La verdad es que es lo único que tiene excelente. Nosotros reservamos una habitación con baño semiprivado que consiste como en unos 12 baños completos en la planta de la habitación, lo bueno es que lo tienes para ti solo, lo malo esq a ciertas horas tienes q esperar y como están saturados pues la limpieza no siempre es buena pero bueno es aceptable para el precio que tiene. La habitación es enana pero ya lo sabíamos, lo reservamos porque simplemente lo queríamos para ir a dormir, para este tipo de viajes esta bastante bien.

title: Great family gym, budget hotel
text: If you're looking for a singles club, this isn't it.  :-/ If you're looking for a well run facility with a great variety of exercise options for the whole family, including two pools, then this is it!  Great classes, a classic building, an amazing location.  The best weight room in the city.  If you're looking for the place as a hotel -- well let's say the rooms are clean and very basic.  One step up from a hostel.

title: Aceptable por ese precio. Buena ubicación.
text:
Aceptable para lo que cuesta, si bien tienes que sobrevivir durante tu estancia.

Respecto a los WC
Nosotros fuimos a habitación con WC semiprivado, que consiste en que hay varios 12 WC en toda la planta totalmente independientes. No estàn muy bien cuidados y en algunos no hay agua fria, o se sale el agua del lavabo, o no hay jabonera... Cada uno tiene su fallo.
Respecto a la limpieza, están decentes para la cantidad de movimiento que tienen.
Si madrugas, cosa que no es dificil teniendo costumbre del horario Español, lo tienes más facil para ducharte (6-6:30 de la mañana) en un baño decente, ya que no están tan ocupados.

Respecto a la habitación
Camas decentes, mobiliario muy machacado y paredes llenas de suciedad.

Respecto a la ubicación
Excelente ubicación, a menos de 5 min de Columbus circle, donde paran las lineas de metro que te permiten llegar facilmente a cualquier parte.

En general: para lo que cuesta, y si solo vas a ir al hotel a dormir, está bien, pero tienes que buscarte la vida con los baños y sus carencias.

En el hall del hotel hay una tiendecita que vende cafe de starbucks, bollería y sandwiches a precio barato. Ideal para desayunar.

title: Emplacement superbe
text:
A quelques metres de Central Park et à 1 km de Times Square. L"emplacement est idéal.
Les matelas sont un peu durs (il faut aimer dormir sur des ressorts), il manque également une échelle pour les lits.
Au niveau des sanitaires le menage est fait régulièrement, si c'est sale cela est majoritairement dû au manque de respect des utilisateurs. (9eme étage)
Pour une semaine c'est bien !

title: Buon rapporto qualità prezzo, ottima posizione
text: Certo, non è un hotel a 5 stelle ma per i prezzi degli hotel a new york questo ostello ha un ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo. Consiglio: se non volete i bagni in comune, chiedete di stare al 12 piano dove i bagni sono divisi in stanzette a cui si accede con la tessera dell'ostello (negli altri piani i bagni sono in un'unica grande stanza). Ogni stanzetta ha doccia, wc, e lavandino. I bagni sono un po' vecchiotti e mezzi scassati, ma c'è acqua calda e sono quasi sempre puliti (dipende da chi c'è entrato prima, ma comunque vengono regolarmente puliti dagli inservienti). Abbiamo alloggiato in una stanza da 6 persone con 3 letti a castello. Ogni mattina ci rifacevano il letto e all'arrivo l'abbiamo trovata pulita. Unico neo: la finestra si apriva pochissimo. In complesso consiglio questa sistemazione a chi non ha tante pretese e gli serve un alloggio solo per dormire (alla fine si è in giro tutto il giorno per la città). Se dovessi tornare a NY prenoterei in questo ostello, soprattutto per il prezzo e la posizione (comodissima!) :)

title: Convenient location
text:
Chose the place for its location and affordable price (comparing to other accommodations in Manhattan) 

Positive sides:
1) Location (it's really perfect location in Manhattan)
    - very close to central park;
    - subway is around 8 min walk;
    - within walking distance to Time Square (we were walking every day);
2) Free WIFI in the room (what is even not common for many 4 star hotels in NYC)

Negative sides:
1) the place doesn't look very clean ... 
    - room cleanness are satisfactory,, though the showers and toilets needs improvement.
    - no trash bins in the toilets.. paper is all over the place (looks disgusting).
2) Not allowed to leave to bag for free after check out.
3) A lot of staff in the rooms has to be fixed.
    - heater was't working;
    - bed was crying out (very uncomfortable to sleep)
    - window couldn't be fully closed.

title: Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis
text: Die Lage ist wirklich toll?Die Zimmer zum Teil sehr klein, aber für einen NY-aufenthalt ausreichend und erschwinglich. Für junge Leute mit keinen sehr hohen Ansprüchen und nur einen Platz zum Schlafen benötigen eine gute Empfehlung.

title: Não era o que eu queria
text: Hotel com categoria de hostel. Muito ruim. Atendimento horrível, quarto pequeno, sem banheiro. Cama ruim, televisão sem controle remoto. Banheiro muito longe do quarto. A única qualidade é que fica próximo dos points de New York.

title: Nul
text: Matelas bas de gamme,clim du moyen age même arrêté elle fait un bruit terrible,douche sale,robinet cassé,distributeur de savon défoncé, eau brûlante ou glacé,les wc n'en parlons pas, ça vaut 10 euros la nuit pas plus, en France les foyers de sdf sont mieux

title: Perfecta elección, bien ubicada
text: Fui con mi hermana y deseábamos estar bien comunicadas con el transporte y el centro de Manhattan, y esta fue una excelente decisión. Caminábamos diario y todo está cerca, central Park, times square, Broadway blvd, el metro, el bus. Nuestra hab tenía tv, aa y dos camas, el baño era compartido y afortunadamente no tuvimos ningún inconveniente. No pudimos disfrutar de los demás servicios pues salíamos todo el día! Por supuesto volveré! Gracias!!

title: Lo sconsiglio fortemente!
text: L'ostello è in una posizione abbastanza comoda, però le camere sono minuscole non ci si può muovere, la toilette sporchissima, mal funzionante e dispone di acqua calda solo due ore in mattinata quindi una settimana di docce fredde non sono state piacevoli! La reception è vuota durante le ore serali e notturne quindi dopo le 23.30 non si dispone di nessun tipo di assistenza nemmeno in casi gravi !! Spero di tornare presto a New  York ma certamente in altre strutture!!

title: Great value, clean, and friendly!
text: Stayed here for a weekend with a friend, clean rooms, friendly staff, great value - plus access to the fitness facility. No food on site, but close to everything!  There is a wholefoods at 59th and many restaurants nearby. Great location!

title: Prima
text: Aardig personeel, schone kamer, sanitair meestal ook schoon, nooit wachten om te douchen. Ik had uitzicht op Central Park. Wel duur, maar dan zit je wel op een ideale locatie. Super voor een citytrip.

title: 立地と価格重視の人向け
text:
1ヶ月滞在しました。
最初、年配の男性スタッフが対応しチェックイン、12階の部屋に行きましたが渡されたカードキーが使えずフロントに戻ると先程とは違う女性スタッフが対応、
事情を説明して新しいカードキーを持って部屋に向かいましたがまた使えず、またフロントに戻り先程対応した女性スタッフに言うとかなり面倒くさそうな態度で
「これで最後だから！」
みたいな事を言ってきました。
ホテル側のミスなのにこっちが怒られるという意味がわからない対応。。
しかもこっちは重いスーツケースを引きずりながらなかなか来ないエレベーターを1階と12階の往復を2回している。
初日から不愉快。
3日目に突然、「別の部屋に代われ」と言われ部屋を11階の部屋に移動させられました。
シャワー、トイレは共同で12階だけ個室、それ以外の階は個室ではなかったです。
シャワー、トイレルームの清掃係りが毎朝8時前後から掃除を始めるので、朝の忙しい時間帯にシャワー、トイレルームが使えず非常に困り、トイレの為にわざわざ他の階に行っていました。
部屋の壁も薄く、廊下、隣の音はかなり聞こえます。
途中の6日間くらいノルウェーの小学生の団体が同じフロアに宿泊していて大変でした。

滞在中、日本人には1人だけ会いました。

立地はコロンバスサークル駅から近いし、セントラルパークも目の前で、タイムズスクエア、5番街も徒歩圏内なので便利です。

1ヶ月滞在しましたがかなり精神的に疲れた宿でした。

title: prestations médiocres mais localisation intéressante près de Central Park
text: Le manque de confort et la vétusté de l'équipement de l'établissement. Accueil impersonnel, défilé permanent de nouveaux arrivants et de partants qui créée un va et vient incessant et bruyant.la chambre "de luxe" que nous avions réservée était en fait plus un grand placard pas très propre qu'une véritable pièce, avec une chaise tachée de peinture, sans table, une petite commode qui n'avait pas été nettoyée, un placard sans porte ni cintres. la clim particulièrement bruyante ne facilite pas le sommeil ! la salle de bain censée être partagée avec une seule autre chambre était en fait utilisée par au moins une dizaine d'autres chambres: en fait une huitaine de salles d'eau/WC sont partagées entre les 60 chambres de l'étage et il était fréquent de devoir attendre pour pouvoir y accéder.(envie pressante s'abstenir !) Compte tenu du nombre d'utilisateur la propreté laisse franchement à désirer et parfois le papier toilette vient à manquer malgré les efforts louables du personnel d'entretien. La salle à manger commune est très bruyante, le mobilier est insuffisant et vétuste.Il est impossible de réchauffer les plats (même pas un micro-onde!) ni de conserver des aliments (pas de réfrigérateur). la présence d'une piscine accessible gratuitement ne compense malheureusement pas le reste.

title: YMCA
text: Thoroughly enjoyed my stay here, I found the room to be spotless, the bed extremely comfortable, and the staff very helpful and friendly.  Close to Central Park, and a Starbucks just down the street on the corner.  What else could you ask for???

title: Ostello si ma le pulizie?!?
text: Stanca per 2 persone poco pulita bagno in comune molto sporco la posizione e buona vicino al central park e a due passi (15 minuti a piedi) da time square! È ovviamente in tutto e per tutto un dormitorio personalmente non ci tornerò più troppo sporco per me!!!

title: Excelente Hostel
text:
Pase unos dias en NYC antes de un viaje de trabajo, ocupe una habitacion privado y fue mas grande de lo que yo me esperaba para ser un hostel.
Tenia todo lo que necesitaba. Todo muy limpio y los ba;os tambien. Muy bien ubicado, media cuadra del Central Park y a dos y media de la estacion Columbus Circle. A la noche sola pude camiar tranquilamente hasta llegar al Hostel. Tiene un Sturbucks dentro, tiene pileta y gym. Ademas, frente a la estacion hay un tipo shopping que en el subsuleo tiene un mega market por lo que podia comprar para comer en ese lugar o en mi habitacion tranquila despues de un dia agotador de caminata. Para mi fue ideal, ya que ahorre muchisimo en comparacion a ir sola a un hotel. Sin duda, de volver sola a la ciudad, volveria a este hostel. El personal muy amable y no tuve que esperar una habitacion. El check out fue self service, yo me retire a la madrugada. Super conveniente.

title: Not nice at all
text: I wont stay here again even if it is near central park. The receptionists were not helpful or welcoming, and when I arrived at my room there were some men just randomly hanging around there doing nothing. As a solo traveller I didnt feel safe. The air con was so loud I could not keep it on. Only good thing was the private room element. Showers were dirty with hairs in the bottom and dirt everywhere. There was puddles of water on the floor by the sink which created a mess too. All in all not very relaxing. I was going to hostels all around the area so i am not high maintenance. I just would not go here again sadly. Which is sad as I respect the YMCA and the work that it does in general terms.

title: Localização excelente!!!!!
text: Hostel simples, mas super bem localizado Pra quem quer economia e estar no centro no mundo vale muito a pena!!!!!!! O quarto é super simples, o ar condicionado não funcionava direito, mas o atendimento na recepção foi muito bom e fomo auxiliados em tudo que precisamos. Colado ao Central Park, tem como querer mais que isso???

title: C'è di meglio ma anche di peggio
text:
La struttura è una sorta di centro giovanile. 
Ottima posizione vicino Central Park e non lontano da Times Square.
Personale gentile e disponibile. 
Stanza sufficientemente pulita con pulizia quotidiana. 
Bagni condivisi non completamente funzionali e puliti.
Per 50 € a notte a persona si potrebbe avere un po' di più.

title: Bon prix
text: C'est un hôtel parfait pour un petit séjour. Les installations sont quand même propres et la force c'est qu'il est bien situé. Au coeur de Manhattan, central park est à côté et Times Square à 15 minutes à pied. Si on compare prix et services, je croix que ça vaut la peine. Je me suis hébergé pour le tournoi de la copa America et je ne regrette pas.

title: Cheap and good location
text: We had a private room with bunk beds, can't lie not what I was expecting at all it was tiny and nothing in the room no home comforts at all. There was a shared bathroom with misted glass doors on the showers but this gave no privacy at all. For the price it cost you can really moan - right on Central Park. Good for travellers and there are dorms from what I believe but we were going on a romantic weekend away and got confused with booking the hotel, the room was quiet and mostly clean and so cheap. The place did have a fantastic gym though with good quality equipment and range of machines and weights.

title: Excelente lugar
text:
Já é a terceira vez que me hospedo no YMCA e é sempre muito bom. São quartos privativos com banheiros coletivos mas sempre limpos. 
O hostel tem ótima localização entre o Central Park e a Broadway Av., tem uma academia incluída na diária e recebe compras com a maior segurança.
Existe recepção e segurança 24hs e câmeras de segurança por todos os lados.

title: Location is excellent, but that's it...
text:
Positive: Location (100 meters from Central Park), Free WiFi. We got a room facing Central Park. The Gym was nice, but not the pool.

Negative: This hostel is really worn and in serious need of maintenance. Every single door (toilets/showers and our room) that we encountered, needed to be lifted by the handle in order to close with lock. Cleaning of toilets/showers were really poor. Mattresses was too short for the beds. Staff should try to smile sometimes and be just a bit positive towards guests. (maybe we were really unlucky with the ones we met, because New Yorkers elsewhere were really friendly in general. Well...except for the Subway staff...)

title: close to city centre
text: its a hostel so its good for basic needs.! i will probably go back again when i go back to new york as it is very close to broadway and central park. female reception staff need to take a step back and remember customer service skills but in general all staff are kind

title: Could be better but not so bad
text: A bit dirty bathrooms. Tiny bathrooms. Just two toilets and three showers for a lot of rooms around 50 on the floor. Windows wouldn't open.  Very damp and no fresh air on the corridors. Noisy. Not very well soundproof. Could hear banging loud doors all night.

title: Bueno, Bonito y Barato
text: Estuve ahi en Mayo, el Hostal esta bien ubicado, puedes caminar 10 minutos hacia times square, esta ubicado frente a central park y a unos 5 minutos del subway. Los baños estaban generalmente limpios, las regaderas generalmente limpias. El personal fue amable. La zona en general es segura, en lo personal volveria a hospedarme.

title: Cheap. cheerful and very central
text:
I found this place great for the location and price. The rooms were functional, and let's face it you don't really spend that much time in them anyway! The rooms were very clean.

The communal showers however were quite dirty. They get cleaned every day but with the amount of people using them they don't stay clean for long. Definitely bring flip flops to wear in the showers!

The towels provided are quite small but perfectly usable.

If you want to use the swimming pool you have to wear a swimming cap regardless of the length of your hair so bring one with you.

I would definitely stay here again.

title: Vacaciones con amigas
text:
Hotel básico, ideal para estar recorriendo todo el día y solo volver a descansar, baños compartidos con personas del mismo sexo muy limpios.
Buena ubicación a unas 4 cuadras de Columbus Circle, a unas pocas cuadras del Central Park y Times Square.
No tienen opción de desayuno aunque hay un kiosco dentro del hotel que vende cafés ricos y económicos. Wi fi funciona pésimo.

title: Localização perfeita!
text: Custo benefício e localização! Não encontrei nenhum problema para ser sincero, melhor hostel que me hospedei. Banheiros sempre limpos, quartos em tamanho ok e o preço foi a melhor parte! Recomendo a todos que pretendem ir a NYC, estação de metrô a 200 metros!!!

title: Fantastic location, so dirty, broken toilets, smelly, rude staff and very noisy.
text:
Be very careful when you book through expedia. the rate I paid through expedia was about double when I reviewed other sites which was certainly too much for a bunk bed.
You must realise that this building is over 100 years old, the rooms are not like to photos. They are dirty and smelly. Very very small. Actually, depressing. Every bathroom on our floor had something broken and there were two not in use. 
I reported leaking pipes and nothing was attended to during my 8 day stay.
Beware, take an eye mask to sleep because the lights from the hall come through the slats in the door. You need to wear ear plugs to sleep, constant slamming of doors all night. They must be at least 60 rooms on a floor. Nose clip for the smell! 
Having said this the location could not be better, you can walk everywhere. Quite safe as well.

title: Cool pour 2 nuit
text: De passage 3 jours 2 nuit hotel simple avec sanitaire comun. L'avantage proche de tous en plein coeur de la big apple suffisant pour dormir quelques heures. Chambres correct propre vue sur central Park. Rapport qualité prix c bien.

title: Aceptable
text: Teniendo en cuenta los precios de nyc es aceptable.La habitacion es basica, tiene aire acondicionado y una tele que no agarra ningun canal. Me dejaron ingresar 2 horas antes del check in y eso estuvo muy bien porque afuera hacia 35 °C.

title: Buena ubicación
text: El lugar es un hostel sobrepasado de turistas jóvenes. Un desastre todo y gente entrando y saliendo las 24hs. El baño comunitario esta bien ,limpieza regular pero aceptable. Las habitaciones (en mi caso de 2 camas individuales) eran prácticamente del tamaño de mi maleta. Si abrías del todo la maleta tenía que salir la otra persona de la habitación. Igual la ubicación al lado del central Park lo justifica todo.  Es caro pero dentro de esa zona no se encuentra nada por menos precio. Ruidoso y lleno de gente, demasiado para mi gusto. No volvería es muy masivo de gente

title: Grosse déception
text:
J'étais partie avec une amie pour passer un séjour à New York de deux jours, ce qui n'est pas énorme. Cet hôtel nous paraissait correct, avec un prix raisonnable pour l'emplacement (il est placé à vingt mètres de Central Park), et les photos présentées sur Booking.com étaient en apparence engageantes. 
  Quelle déception lorsque nous sommes arrivées ! A quelques exceptions près, le personnel était peu aimable, voire exécrable pour certains. La chambre était minuscule, avec un lit superposé dangereux car sans barrière pour celui du dessus et qui tremblait un peu trop lorsque quelqu'un bougeait, un wifi plus que médiocre, trois douches et toilettes pour femmes par étage, quand on sait que le nombre de chambres atteignait au moins la trentaine à chaque étage, la télécommande de la télévision qui ne marchait pas, la télévision elle-même qui s'éteint toute seule comme si elle était possédée...
  Mais le pire a sans doute été la négligence du personnel de ménage, qui n'a même pas pris la peine de fermer la porte en sortant de notre chambre alors que nous n'étions pas là ! Résultat : la chambre est restée ouverte et n'importe qui aurait pu entrer sans que nous soyons au courant. Cela n'a heureusement pas été le cas, mais le problème demeure et c'est inadmissible de la part d'un établissement hôtelier. Et lorsque nous avons signalé ce problème, leur réponse a été aussi vague et peu intéressée que pour les problèmes signalés précédemment. 
  Alors il est sûr que l'emplacement est séduisant, de même que son prix, mais pour moi, ça ne valait même pas la somme que j'ai dû dépenser, même pour deux jours, pas plus que cela valait le risque de se faire voler ses affaires alors qu'on fait confiance à l'hôtel pour fournir un environnement sécurisé.

title: Un séjour gâché
text: Je suis venue en juillet avec une amie pour un weekend. Ayant un budget restreint, nous avons de suite été séduites par les tarifs proposés par cet "hôtel'. Le rapport qualité/prix est pourtant loin d'être intéressant... A commencer par la chambre, minuscule, dans laquelle nous pouvions à peine circuler à deux. Le wifi était défectueux, il marchait une fois sur deux. La literie était médiocre; un lit superposé penché et absence de barrière en hauteur. Il y avait seulement trois douches et trois toilettes à se partager pour tout un étage chez les femmes. Le pire était à venir: lorsque nous sommes rentrées le soir, la porte de notre chambre était ouverte; les femmes de ménage avaient tout bonnement oublié de la fermer... Voilà qui est rassurant! Pour couronner le tout, le personnel devrait apprendre la politesse et le respect. Leur attitude envers les clients étaient inadmissible: un monsieur à l'accueil me rit.au nez lorsque je lui rapporte ces problèmes, me trouvant trop "exigeante" (et pourtant...). Le seul point positif est sa situation géographique idéale (à deux pas de Central Park et proche du métro). Notre séjour a donc été bien terni à cause de cet endroit que je vous recommande de fuir, quitte à élargir un peu votre budget.

title: Great location and decent stay
text: I had to spend a night by myself in NYC and a hostel seemed like a good plan, even though I'm in my 40s...I like to travel on a budget when alone.  In July, I was happy that this place had window air conditioners at least.  The 9th floor where I stayed was not as remodeled as the pictures shown here but it was clean, quiet and met the needs for a reasonable price.  I walked back from the theaters with no trouble on a nice evening.  Would stay again.

title: Like being in college again!
text:
The West Side YMCA was exactly what I needed during my NYC visit! My single room was small but pleasant. It included a desk and chair, wifi, a comfortable bed, a window, a closet, an air conditioner/fan unit, and a small flatscreen TV. Housekeeping changed the sheets daily and provided a fresh towel every day or every other day. The bathrooms down the hall were generally quite clean, with three toilet stalls, three working faucets (and one that didn't work), and three shower stalls (plenty of hot water, too). The small convenience store on the ground floor was perfect for a quick pre-packaged meal or coffee, and I frequently used the bottle-filling water fountains on the ground floor and 4th floor. Guests are invited to attend group exercise classes and use the swimming pool during open swim times (swim cap required), though I didn't have a chance to take advantage of these offerings. The location is stellar--within a short walk of Lincoln Center, the Upper West Side, Central Park, the American Museum of Natural History, a variety of restaurants, Midtown, and the various subways stopping at 59th Street-Columbus Circle. My only complaint is that only one shower stall had a decent shower head; the other two were like taking a shower using a fire hose: lots of pressure, but stinging. If you're coming from a smaller city, the price might seem ridiculous for what you get, but it's actually a decent deal for New York. 

All-around, this was a great experience, and I would stay here again without hesitation.

title: Te saca de un apuro
text: Estuve alojado aki y me imagino que para los standards de new york con respecto a hoteles era barato pero segun mi criterio no.pagabamos 130$ la noche y era una habitacion que parecia la celda del chapo guzman..una litera,un pequeño escritorio y un aparato de aire acondicionado.sin duda no volveré

title: 딱 그정도!
text: 가격이 싼만큼 시설이 좋지는 않아요. 이층침대랑 화장대와 에어컨, 서랍이 있고 따로 벽장이 있지않고 구석에 벽걸이가 설치되어 있어요. 하지만 직원분이 친절하고 공동욕실 또한 생각보다 쾌적했습니다!

title: A vous de voir!
text:
Sincèrement j'hésite entre horrible et médiocre... la pire auberge de jeunesse que j'ai faite... 
Nous avions loué une chambre avec lits superposés. Lits propres, TV ok, mais climatisation bruyante : une horreur.
1 Salle de bain partagée pour TOUT un étage composée de 3 toilettes (dont 1 cassé), 3 douches (dont 1 cassée) pour lesquelles il n'y a pas de verrous ce sont des portes vitrées (bonjour l'intimité) et 3 lavabos juste en face des douches...
Donc un conseil, si vous avez un budget limité comme le mien, prenez encore mieux le tarif supérieur avec salle de bain privée...
Pour les + , quand même, établissement très bien situé à côté de Central Park et du métro sur la 59ème. Et personnel hyper sympa, je pense à Jorge, qui nous a bien aidé. Merci à lui.

title: you get what you pay for
text:
The line to check in was long and slow. they offer a lot of service's but only one line so the wait was long. I paid $120 for one night and didnt expect much. yup i was right. Creeky bunk beds that squeeked with the slighest movement. Bare rooms. Clean but bare. The add said shared bathroom. I expected one other room perhaps. nope! the hole floor. 10 pluse rooms shareing three showers and four stalls. umm bring your flip flops.
I was charged once by paypall to travelocity then they charged me again to my credit card when i checked in. I didnt realise this till days later. many calls and emails. they will not respond!

title: Good location on a budget/ you will be charged an extra 28.00 for membership on top of your bill
text: The location is great, steps away from central park and the subway. Gym facilities are good and not too busy and the main entrance doormen are helpful and friendly. The downside of staying here is that the rest of the staff and cafe are not the most friendly to deal with, with the exception of a few. The rooms are clean and functional a bit institutional. The bathrooms are a mess both women's and men's. Bring flipflops and don't go bare foot in the bathrooms!

title: Super locatie voor een redelijke prijs(voor New Yorkse begrippen)
text:
Wij wilden graag bij Central Park zitten voor een betaalbare prijs.West side YMCA is een hostel met een kleine kamer zonder wasbak.Douche en wc op de gang,is goed te doen,géén lange wachttijden.30 meter linksaf uit het hostel en je zit in Central Park.Ook de Subway(Columbus Circle) is om de hoek.Verwacht geen luxe van je hostel,maar het is toch alleen om te slapen voor een betaalbare prijs.Er zijn ook kamers met 2 persoonsbedden.Volgende keer gaan we wéér naar West Side YMCA.
Als je voor de eerste keer naar New York gaat neem de New York City pas en een metro kaart voor hele week.Maar vooral wordt lid vd FB site New York.nl.Daar krijg je super veel tips.
Veel plezier in "the city that never sleeps"

title: Muito legal
text:
Muito legal pra quem está de passagem. Quarto pequeno mas ótimo para uma boa noite de sono. Bem localizado, com piscina, academia, um starbucks interno próximo da recepção para um café da manhã rápido, ao lado do central park, estação de metrô pxoxima... ótimo atendimento. 

Voltaria lá, com certeza.

title: Fortement recommandé
text:
Très bon rapport qualité prix.
En chambre premium avec salle de douche et toilette privative en couloir.
Relativement propre pour une auberge de 300 chambres.
Très bon emplacement également
Personnel aimable

title: Worth to stay
text:
Localization is the biggest attitude and its great. The room was small but nice and clean. I was there for 2 nights and for the price the condition was good. The bathroom clean, staff nice and helpful. 

Minus: Hm.. no idea. For me the quality of room for such a price was good. Especially that in centrum of Manhattan

title: Toppen!
text: Bodde i dubbelrum med våningssäng på våning 11. Rummet va litet, med väldigt mjuka sängar. Finns separata toalett/dusch på varje våning för killar/tjejer. Tyvärr stängdes toan av för städning i tid å otid. Rummen städades dagligen. Rätt så stort gym samt gruppträning finns som man får besöka gratis med generösa öppettider! Läget på hostelet var perfekt ansåg vi med!

title: Cheap but terrible service and unethical
text:
This place may be cheap but I would have rather use air bnb after my experience here.

Its cheap for new york but don't expect much. A single bed on wheels that rolls around all night, a tiny blanket and minuscule towel; a small tv and a small dresser or table is all you will get. Bathrooms are shared.

None of this bothered me though as it was the cheapest place I could find and it's a great location - right across from Central Park.  My entire problem with this place is it's ethics and lack of customer service.

Don't bother using the "do not disturb" sign on the door because it gets ignored. The company policy - without telling you - is they must check the rooms despite the do not disturb sign. I would have no problem with this if I had known.  BUT THEY DON'T TELL YOU.  Due to not knowing this there was a problem that occurred that was not handled well.

We created an ice bucket out of the bin in our room - we left the bin liner in the bin and put ice in it. We then put a bottle of vodka, a bottle of water, a bottle of pink lemonade and a bottle of cranberry juice in it.  We opened the lemonade and the vodka only and had 2 drinks only before heading out.

We returned the following afternoon with the bin empty - everything was gone.  On top of this stupid no thought process of throwing out 2 unopened bottles and 2 almost full bottles other actual trash was left around the room.  When we informed staff they were unhelpful and did nothing. Disgraceful and idiotic. Also be aware that you have to pay to keep your luggage in storage here and it is a painful process with a machine that says it accepts credit card but the credit card doesn't work and the reception can't give you change.

title: Bien ubicado,Buenas piezas,regulares baños
text:
Un lugar muy bien ubicado, en una zona segura y a pocas cuadras de la estación de metro "colombus circle" donde convergen distintas líneas. Por booking.com encontré una pieza doble con baño "semiprivado", tes noches a 402 dólares. 
La pieza era pequeña (2x4mt aprox), con una litera, un escritorio con su silla y una tele. Cómoda, sabanas limpias y ordenan tu pieza cada día. Ahora, significa baño "semiprivado"? Significa que nadie usa el baño mientras estás tú ahí. A diferencia de un camarín donde hay más personas usando el baño al mismo tiempo o un baño privado que durante tu sólo lo usas tú.
Me gustó mucho la ubicación y las piezas, el baño deja bastante que desear. Huele a humedad y en más de una ocasión los encontré sucios, son pocos para la cantidad de personas por piso. Recomiendo buscar pieza con baño privado.

title: ótimo
text: o hostel é adequado para quem vai ficar apenas para dormir. Fomos bem recepcionadas e conseguimos nos virar mesmo não falando inglês fluentemente. o banheiro é compartilhado porém não tivemos problemas com isso pois é separado entre feminino e masculino.

title: Alojarse en un lugar privilegiado de Manhattan
text:
Este alojamiento se caracteriza por su súper-organización. Y una ubicación buenísima: fácil de desplazarse, a mano de todo.
Es un edificio grande que comparte muchas actividades, además de los pisos para hotel. Y ninguna se molesta con las otras.
En mi piso había 11 baños completos, pero 3 estaban fuera de servicio, por lo cual había que esperar a la hora de utilizarlos. Y podría mejorarse, con muy poco, el lugar de guardado.
El personal muy correcto y amable.

title: Voltariamos!
text:
Ficamos em um quarto compartilhado. O quarto era ok! O banheiro no corredor estava sempre limpo, o único problema é que achei que o box deveria ser mais "privativo". As cortinas não fechavam direito e você não tem espaço seco para colocar suas roupas. Elas ficam alí no chão, onde outros hospedes estão utilizando o banheiro. Esse foi o único incomodo. Receberam minhas compras pela internet sem nenhum custo.
Ah, e a localização é fabulosa! 2 quadras do metro.

title: 滿足晚上不要流浪街頭的基本條件
text: 以台灣的觀點，紐約暑假的房價太高了，來住這真的不是好選擇，就是地點優越的簡陋宿舍，冷了也沒辦法加被，因為人家下班了，如果不是為了隔天要在這邊附近跟家人會合，貪方便，建議找遠ㄧ點的民宿，住宿條件都比較好！

title: Extremely uncomfortable beds - springs digging into me
text:
Great location and price. Room is small but absolutely adequate. Good air conditioning. So i was very happy until i went to bed. Apparently my floor (13th) had been rennovated. But the mattress is the worst i've ever slept on. Completely sagging, springs right beneath the surface and painful to lie on. I changed rooms but the second one was just as bad. 

Sure its cheap, but the most fundamental purpose of a hotel/hostel is sleep. It really is not too much to ask for comfortable mattresses - they don't need to be luxury. but this is shocking.

title: Uma cama e um chuveiro
text: Para quem gosta de bater perna o dia inteiro e só precisa de uma cama e um chuveiro aqui é perfeito. Banheiro limpos e quartos também. Localização perfeitaaaaaaaaaaaaaa! Se você não tem frescura aqui é o local. Estação do metrô há 3 quadras. Central park ao lado.

title: Awful experience
text: Uncomfortable beds, dirty carpets: the light wasn't working so we complained with the receptionist who told us they would fix it and in 5 days they didn't. Not enough room to move in the room. It wasn't even that cheap. The location was good though

title: Caro y malo!
text:
Ni bien llegué tuve que esperar 45 min para que me dieran la habitación (individual privada sin baño). Al entrar tanto la ventana como la persiana estaban rotas y el olor a tabaco era infernal. Las chicas de limpieza me cuentan luego que la demora era porque estaban tratando de ventilar el cuarto. Dicho esto, pedí cambio de habitación y por suerte había disponible. Otra media hora de espera.  El cuarto si bien estaba limpio amanecí con ronchas de pulgas en toda la pierna.

Me hospede 3 noches. Durante toda la estadía el baño estuvo inundado y dos de las 4 piletas/lavamanos tapadas. Muy mala la limpieza en esta área. 

La ubicación es muy buena y solo por eso vale el precio. No esperen mas. De todas maneras, seguro hay otras opciones. NO volvería.

title: Uncomfortable bed, poor air con, great location.
text: We stayed in a private double. The room was clean, storage space, great shower and wonderful view over central park. The bed was the worst I've ever slept on. Tiny double and collapsing springs on either side. We originally booked into a private bunk room but they placed us in a double. I thought they were trying to be nice at first but we requested to move to a bunk as originally booked (the bf was very ill and wanted his own space) and they said they didn't have any rooms. There was no lid on the toilet and it splashed out when flushed. The air con was terrible and barely cooled the room down. On the 11th floor it was extremely hot. When we finally moved to a bunk room on our last night the beds were a lot more comfortable and the air con was way better. Unfortunately one of the toilets in the female bathroom was out of order and there was always people waiting. OK stay, I'd stay again for the location.

title: Ideal para 1 pessoa - para dormir
text: O hostel é bem localizado fica na esquina do Central Park, uma região bem tranquila de Manhattan. O YMCA west side é enorme muitos quartos. O quarto que fiquei era o standard com uma beliche, uma TV e um móvel para roupa. É uma habitação pequena é ideal para quem somente precisa do hotel para dormir, vc chega cansado e só pensa em dormir. Os banhos geralmente estão sempre disponíveis e há muitos por andar. Eu ficaria outra vez.

title: Befriedigend:
text: Befriedigend ist die räumliche Situation. Genau genommen ist sie noch unter "befriedigend", was ja in der Schule einer "3" entspräche. Deutlich besser als befriedigend ist aber die Lage dieses YMCA-Hotels, nämlich am Broadway nahe dem Lincoln Center und dem Central Park. Daher ist die Gesamtwertung natürlich höher. - Die Zimmer (Kammern) sind sehr klein, vielleicht 6-7 qm klein. Ein Fenster gibt es zum Innenhof; mit sehr viel Glück zum Central Park, aber diese Zimmer werden wohl von Dauergästen wie Wohnungen genutzt und sind also kaum je verfügbar. - Das Restaurant im Erdgeschoss gibt es leider nicht mehr. - Das YMCA hat zwei Eingänge, es liegt als ganzer Block zwischen zwei Straßen. Der eine davon wird abends aber leider immer zugeschlossen, so dass man dann meist Umwege in Kauf nehmen muss. - Wie gesagt: Die Lage entschädigt für Vieles. - Wer aber das Geld für ein Hotel in der selben Gegend ausgeben möchte, hat natürlich beides: Ein angenehmes Quartier und eine reizvolle Gegend.

title: Adequate
text: Very adequate for my needs and my budget. Clean, comfortable for a short stay.  Nice they will keep luggage even after you check out ($2.00 fee per bag) so you are free to wander around NY. Bathrooms could have been tidier.  Nice part of town with drugstore and eateries.  Fresh produce sold on one corner.  Transportation very close by (A train going to the left, and #1 train going to the right). Lincoln Center very close. Would book there again.

title: Prisvärt och mycket bra läge!
text:
Riktigt bra vandrarhem till ett bra pris!

Rummen var helt okej storlek på och badrummen var egna små rum med lås. Toalett och dusch fanns i varje "badrum".

Nära till Columbus Circle där man smidigt kan ta metron dit man vill!

Personalen kunde kanske varit lite mer service-minded men det är ju ett vandrarhem och inte ett hotell.

title: Ótimo custo benefício e localização.
text: Gosto dos Hostel da YMCA. Atendimento muito bom, quartos são pequenos mas confortáveis e os banheiros compartilhados a equipe mantém um esforço para estarem sempre limpos. O melhor mesmo é o custo benefício e a localização, praticamente do lado do Central Park, próximo a museus e a Columbus Circle.

title: Worst customer service of my entire life
text:
Pro: good location near central park, clean (but very thin/used) sheets

Con: the most foul customer service I have ever experienced in my life (being talked to rudely, ignored, and the front desk purposely ignoring multiple calls from Expedia customer service and then being rude to the Expedia representative), dirty communal bathrooms with poor drainage, saggy bunk beds with no back support, dirty bleach gym smell in the hallways, poor cell-phone service coverage, 90+ min check-in 

Out of the countless places I've stayed in my life, this was the first booking I made where I checked out early, after 1 night. 

The YMCA West Side was a nightmare from beginning to end. 

Check-in took over 90 minutes, with both of the front desk staff behaving exceptionally rudely. They talked to me in a condescending tone, telling me to "just sit down and wait," and then ignoring me. I had to call Expedia customer service (which is where I made the booking) to try to check-in. It took Expedia over 90 minutes and multiple phone calls to resolve the situation, as the YMCA staff kept ignoring incoming calls. Actually, after the first round of phone calls from Expedia, I went up to the front desk to tell them of my update; the front desk staff smirked at me, and told me that because I didn't have the name of the staff member Expedia talked to, he didn't know what I was talking about, and to sit down. 

Finally, Expedia managed to reach a YMCA manager, who walked in and let me check-in. When I asked him why the YMCA kept ignoring Expedia's calls, the manager just laughed me off. 

The rooms are horrible. The bunk beds are saggy, with no support; it's literally a poor quality bunk bed with a sheet thrown on top, and it hurt my back. 

The communal bathrooms are filthy. One of the 3 cramped toilets was clogged, and the second was covered in urine. The draining on the 8th floor woman's bathroom also wasn't working properly, so there was a standing pool of dirty water by the sinks. I didn't try using the shower.

Because it's a YMCA, there are gym facilities on the lower levels, and the hallways smell like a dirty gym that has a gloss of chemicals or bleach to try to clean it. 

Wi-fi is free, but slow, and cell phone service is bad, to the point where I couldn't use some of my cell phone apps in my room. 

The only civil staff member I encountered was on check-out. He was nice and polite, but every other encounter I had was the worst service I've ever experienced. 

I called Expedia to try to get a refund on my stay, as I checked out after 1 night of what was originally a 4-night stay. Expedia tried calling the West Side YMCA twice, once in the evening, and once in the morning, and no one picked up. Finally, someone picked up in the afternoon, and Expedia said that the woman they talked to was very rude, and refused to give zero refunds for my checking out early. Expedia issued me a $200 voucher as an apology, which I appreciated, but the YMCA's service was awful.

I am no stranger to less-than-ideal housing; I'm a student who currently lives in a dorm, and has lived in multiple dorm rooms in the past. The YMCA is like the worst dorm experience I've ever encountered, with its dirty bathrooms and back-hurting bunk beds, magnified by the single worst customer service I've ever encountered.

title: Localização privilegiada, bom preço
text: Os quartos são limpos e tem um bom tamanho. Os banheiros embora sejam compartilhados são limpos o tempo todo, a equipe de limpeza faz um bom trabalho. Alguns andares do hostel são mais modernos do que os outros, e isso se reflete nos banheiros, mas de um modo geral, todos atendem bem. É permitido o uso da academia da YMCA. A localização do hostel é privilegiada. Muito perto da Columbus Circle, que tem estação de metrô para a cidade toda. O hostel fica AO LADO do Central Park, e isso não tem preço, é muito bom.

title: Sitio horrible
text: Habitación horrible con colchones que crujen y ni tan siquiera televisión, baños terroríficos, desconchados y sucios y para colmo me dejo dos bolsos y las señoras Jeenifer Hoffer y Ellen Murphie no responden a los mails.

title: Localização Muito boa
text: Lugar simples mas muito bem localizado proximo as principais atrações turisticas da cidade a pé, em frente ao central park e a algumas quadras da times square, quartos e banheiros limpos sem luxo algum.

title: Small adjustments would go a long way
text:
Currently staying here for 14 nights. I tried to shorten my stay by one night (check out a day earlier) and via email was told it would cost me more money to stay one less night. When I replied questioning this I never got a reply.

I also requested a room change but was told this was not possible.

Pros:
Location
Friendly staff
Price

Cons:
VERY small towels (not enough to cover the important bits) and the shower curtains don't close all the way so you have to be ok with people seeing you naked.
No kitchen so you can't make any of your own meals not even 2 minute noodles
Not very clean in general the rooms and bathroom are not heaps clean but good enough
Flat screen TV in room but reception is fuzzy on all channels

title: Hotel cercano a todo, limpio y seguro, con cafetería, wifi y buen servicio.
text: Me hospedé 10 días sola en este hotel. Está ubicado a 3 cuadras de la esquina del Columbus Circle y el Central Park. Es un hotel seguro, con baños compartidos en los últimos pisos y con baños tipo gimnasio en el tercer piso, con excelentes duchas, secadores de pelo, balanza (que puede usarse para verificar el peso de la valija), casilleros para uso con candado (llevar uno), baños de vapor, pileta y gym (no use la pileta ni el gym, estaba de vacaciones en NY!!!!). En la planta baja tiene un salón para usos múltiples con mesas, tv y wifi, donde podes desayunar o almorzar. ENn la habitación tenes acceso a wifi gratis y tv. Te permiten hacer el check in antes de tiempo y dejar tus valijas por u$s2 (máquina en el hall de recepción donde se puede obtener el ticket). Hay una cafetería interna con café de Starbucks y snacks para almorzar o desayunar (creo que abre a las 8am). No es un hotel lujoso, pero tiene todo lo necesario para pasar unos días sintiéndote segura y a pocas cuadras del metro para hacer todas las combinaciones (estación columbus circle). La gente es muy amable, varias personas hablan español. Ellos te contratan el servicio de bus para ir al aeropuerto (mi avión salía a las 9pm y ellos aconsejaron el servicio a las 4:30pm, la camioneta pasó por mi en forma puntual). Cuando realicé el check out a las 10am pude dejar mis valijas (por u$s2) e ir a pasear hasta la tarde, al volver me dieron un ticket para uso de las duchas y pude bañarme cerca de las 3pm para luego tomar el avión de regreso a Bs As. Podes usar toallas a gusto gratis sin tener que desarmar la valija. En el mismo edificio hay una escuela, un jardín de infantes o guardería y además, se hospedan chicos de intercambio, por lo que no lo recomiendo para gente mayor ni para familias, solo es ideal para amigos, parejas o estudiantes. Hay gente de todo el mundo y es muy juvenil. Dato importante, en la equina contraria al Central Park hay un puesto de frutas frescas ideal para desayunar!

title: Good hotel near Central Park
text: I stayed here for a few days in December 2016. It was very close to central park. There were many good restaurants within walking distance. the facilities in the hotel was good and generally is a clean and safe place to stay. It was reasonably priced in a strategic location and close to metro station and central park. Its an ideal place for budget travellers.

title: Good price and great location
text:
Nice place and friendly staff, walking distance to the Suwbay and the bus and many coffe shops and restaurants. The room is simple but thats all u need on a trip.
The area around it is safe and secure and u can walk out anytime. In the hotel itself there are security cameras and two employes working at the main entrance all the time.

title: 問題無かったです。
text: 一人旅で利用しました。行く前は口コミを見ていても評判があまりよくなく不安でしたが、行ってみたら何も問題は無かったです。フロントのスタッフの方々もフレンドリーでチェックイン等もスムーズに出来ました。部屋はシングルを利用しましたが、ベッドとテレビと机があるシンプルな造りでクロゼットもありました。壁や窓はあまり綺麗ではありませんが、部屋自体は臭いも無くクーラーも正常に作動して普通に快適でした。シャワーとトイレは共同で私が泊まった階には三つずつありました。同じ空間にあります。綺麗好きな方にはお勧め出来ませんが、臭いは無くシャワーもしっかりお湯が出ます。立地も良く、コロンバス・サークルから近く分かりやすい場所にあります。またニューヨークに機会があれば利用したいです。

title: Solo la ubicación
text: Me quedo por cuatro días la tercera semana de Mayo y la verdad si no fuera por la ubicación todo sería negativo, cero ayuda ubicando lugares para almorzar o salir a comprar cosas, cero actividades que realizar, camas con colchones que dejaban mucho que desear, un baño para todo el piso, el cual tenía nos urinarios uno de ellos malo,tres tazas de baño, tres duchas las cuales no tenían lugar para dejar toallas o shampoo, tampoco un lugar donde cambiarse, sinceramente si solo buscas ubicación este es tu lugar, pero si buscas algo más escoge otra opción

title: great location
text: across from central park, two blocks from Columbus circle, Lincoln center etc. rooms are not comparable to traditional hotel rooms but it is my first time staying at a hostel so not sure what to expect. We first got a room, but it didn't have a bathroom. changed to 1207(??) it has a full size bed and bathroom AND great view of central park. Priceless!

title: Sola y segura en Manhattan!
text: A 1 cuadra del del central park y de la séptima avenida, un lugar económico y muy seguro. Luego de salir a times square puedes regresar caminando y no corres riesgos. Un lugar limpio con todo lo necesario para la estancia, para qué pagar más si estar en la gran manzana es disfrutar afuera y sólo llegar a dormir. Una opción que recomiendo, excelente transporte a 2 cuadras de la estación circle del metro. A pasos del acceso principal de central park y pocas cuadras de la gran quinta avenida. Moverse de compras al outlet guarden jersey es sencillo caminando hasta la terminal de la 42 y octava tomando un bus que tarda 40 minutos aprox. Moverse en Manhattan es sencillo y se pueden conocer muchos puntos de interés si gastar tanto. Ubicarse con los mapas y a recorrer esa siempre alucinante ciudad, en este mi segundo no dejé de sorprenderme, cada estación es un disfrutar distinto pero sin duda volveré nuevamente en Otoño, creo que Navidad es lo màximo en NY, el espíritu y la magia que transporta es superior al frío de la época!

title: Uma cama para dormir
text: Era exactamente o que esperava. Um quarto minúsculo, cama tipo beliche, uma secretária e um ar condicionado. Ficámos no andar 11. Limpo todos os dias, casas de banho partilhadas limpas mas a das mulheres, que tinha código para entrar, tinha a fechadura avariada. Funcionários simpáticos. Os colchões foram o pior, muito moles.

title: Localização perfeita
text: Hospedagem em NY em geral é cara. O hostel é uma opção mais em conta e conta com uma localização perfeita. Os quartos são simples e os banheiros são compartilhados. Na opção standard, eles são como os de academia, várias portinhas. No deluxe, são fora do quarto, mas individuais - a chave do quarto abre as portas. Limpeza razoável. Fica muito perto do Columbus Circle, e consequentemente, de uma das principais estações de metrô de NYC. Daqui vc vai pra qq lugar. E na esquina , o Central Park. Vale a pena pelo preço se vc não faz questão de luxo. Pode chegar antes do check-in e pagar uma taxa de USD 2.00 por mala para deixar sua bagagem no hotel e ir bater perna.

title: simple but good! reliable staff, kind guests.
text:
I can agree with the generally positive reviews very clearly- I liked it! ... and btw regard that every other mediocrate hotel around might cost you much more! YMCA Staff succeeds in keeping the (quite large) house clean, organized, orderly, craftsmen and cleaning Teams were around all day. Room service comes daily, security has a view on who´s entering (which is right way- they won´t harm anyone). Be aware that shower and facility rooms are across the hall, no water in your room, but that´s all you have to bear- I can NOT confirm single reports that the facilities are overcrowded, too loud, not in a good shape- it´s all under control. Don´t await too much of infos and support from the staff concerning tourist infos on New York, where to enter the subway aso. - they´re only staff. New Yorkers out on the streets will be helpful giving you further advices. Note that you should ask for single rooms if you want a maximum of silence at night (we had only single rooms on our floor, plus mothers with little babies, and there was a consensus of wishing a calm night rest for all). There is a Gym o the 4th floor and a hall on the ground floor that may be crowded and somewhat noisy sometimes, but only during daytime. I guess alcoholic drinks are forbidden in the hostel. It works. Air condition might be a little noisy for sensitive people, but doesn´t run all night (and- imagine that hostel during summer without air conition...) They offer one towel, peace of soap and a plastic cup for drinking each day, if you need more, bring with you. Europeans should remember to bring an 110/220-V Adapter for electricity plug-in with them.
Hostel offers Snacks, soft drinks and coffee near the entrance but no further meals. For more and reasonably priced breakfast or lunch, best try direction downtown 8th or even better 9th or 10th Ave (not Broadway or 7th Ave) to find a cheap one, look for Italian Pizza or Asian Diners, there are a lot. Kind of supermarkets, too.
all in all it´s a multi-ethnic come-together in a polite way. Not to mention the highlight that you´re very close to beautiful Central Park which is a safe and orderly place these days (though we did not try and go there at night)

title: What it is
text: This is my 2nd visit to the YMCA West Side. It is everything that you need. Somewhere to dump your stuff and put your head at night. Yeah it's not posh or perfect but if you want to go to New York and stay in a great location and not pay a lot of money then the YMCA West Side is fine!

title: Super locaties, goede faciliteiten en eenvoudige kamers
text: Super locaties, goede faciliteiten en eenvoudige kamers. Bij dit hostel zit je direct naast het Central Park, veel plekken kun je per voet bereiken. Daarbij zit de metro om de hoek dus dat is prima. Kamers (tweepersoons met stapelbed) zijn heel basic maar prima voor een city trip! Wij konden ook gebruik maken van het zwembad en de sauna's dus dat was perfect. Beneden zit ook nog een kleine shop voor coffee etc. Vriendelijk personeel.

title: Great !!!!
text:
Sono stato in questa struttura durante il mese di maggio. L'ostello è strutturato su 13 piani alcuni dei quali adibiti agli alloggi, altri a servizi; al piano terra, ad esempio, oltre alla reception troviamo un bar/alimentari dove è possibile fare colazione con prodotti Starbucks a prezzi convenienti oltre a poter acquistare snack e bevande in genere. Al terzo e al quarto piano invece troviamo la palestra, le varie sale di spinning, campo da basket coperto, la sauna e la piscina riscaldata sempre al coperto tutte cose usufruibili gratuitamente dai clienti della struttura. 
Le camere sono piccole ma pulite (hanno cambiato lenzuola ad asciugamani ogni giorno!!!) e abbastanza silenziose. I bagni sono tendenzialmente al piano e si presentano molto puliti (notavo che le pulizie venivano effettuate almeno 3-4 volte al giorno).
L'ostello inoltre si trova in una posizione ottima, a soli 200 metri dalla fermata della metro 59th street, a due passi da Central Park (la mia stanza all'11 piano aveva come panorama proprio Central Park e i grattacieli dell'Est Upper Manhattan! ). Ma per chi come noi voleva vivere la città a 360°, arrivare a Times Square a piedi e'  stata prassi consolidata (15 minuti a piedi).
Insomma, viaggiando tanto, devo dire che questo ostello è sicuramente il migliore dove sia mai stato...d'altronde siamo a New York...città sublime che vi porterete per sempre nel cuore!!!!!

title: Position and price ok
text:
I've spent three nights here, single bedroom and shared bathroom.
Let's start by saying that its position is great, minutes from columbus circle, central park, lincoln centre. I found the room not very clean and noisy during the first night . However I've to say that the price is very appealing, that's why I decided to book it (I'm not a fan of hostels in general). I give 3 out of 5 as position and price are very important to me, but not sure I'll be back... Main issue is the shared bathroom. Good if you want to save some money in a super expensive city.

title: практические советы
text:
Для тех кто все-таки решил сэкономить на отеле и поселиться здесь.... отель не плохой, может повезти и вас заселят в чистый номер с белыми стенами, лампой, стулом у стола и с видом на централ парк. Еще лучше если на 12 этаже, там самые приемлемые на моем опыте туалетные комнаты (душ и туалет в приватной комнате) они открываются только ключом от комнат 12 этажа, но не все захлопываются до конца, так что можно всегда подняться на пару этажей вверх и воспользоваться ими или сходить в душ бассейна, там же есть сауны. В бассейне дают шапочки бесплатно. Вот и все о плюсах
Но если для вас не принципиально остановиться именно у центрального парка советую заселиться в одноименный отель в мидтауне. В сингл румах есть маленький холодильник, на 4 этаже кухня с плитой, посудой, кипятком и ледогениратором. Все тот же спортзал с бассейном 1 этаж, одна из самых недорогих прачечных самообслуживания 3 этаж (довольно приличная, купить заранее порошок или взять собой) интернет быстрее и ресепшн приятнее!!! ЗА ТЕ ЖЕ ДЕНЬГИ!
+ напротив буфет с лучшей едой на вынос в округе (лучше приходить пораньше, за завтраком с 7:30, за ланчем с 12, а то все вкусное следят)))) 
В общем за такие деньги лучше на манхетене не найти!!!! всем удачи)

title: Absolutely fine!! Location is amazing!
text: We stayed here for 4 nights in a private room with a shared bathroom. The hostel rooms are basic but we spent so little time in it as we were out all day and night sightseeing. Location is amazing for Central Park with a subway 4 blocks away. Can't fault it for what you need it for really. Sleep for a few hours!

title: Gross
text: So dirty and stinky. We had a double bed with private bath. Carpet looked like it was last cleaned in 1990s. The room stank of sweat. Shower barely worked. A/C didn't work at all. Not worth $170/night. The only star is for great location to Central park and metro etc.

title: Absolutely HORRIBLE
text: We reserved a standard double room with a private bath. We were given a room smaller than the average walk in closet with a bathroom a quarter mile away. My daughter is claustrophobic, prone to panic attacks and had one within a minute of walking in. We immediately went down and checked out. This place should be ashamed of themselves for misrepresenting their accommodations.

title: Custo benefício maravilhoso!
text: A localização é fantastica, ao lado do central Park! Tem a facilidade de dispor de comodo para guardar bagagens e os funcionários são atenciosos. O banheiro está sempre bem limpo e o quarto arrumado! Recomendo.

title: Slidt og ulækkert
text: Hvis du vil bo billigt er dette stedet. Men du går virkelig også på kompromis med alt! Gange, værelser, håndklæder, fællesområder, toiletter, bade og selv receptionen er beskidt og yderst grimt. Der er fælles bad på gangen som er er af de klammeste bade jeg nogensinde har set. Selvom rengøringspersonalet lige havde været der, var der ikke fyldt sæbe op, fjernet ulækre ting fra vasken eller rengjort bade. Kan på ingen måder anbefales. Dog skal det siges at personalet er søde!

title: Ótima localização
text: O quarto é bem simples (a cama não é muito confortável) e o banheiro é limpo. O melhor benefício é a localização, pois está ao lado do central park, tem fácil acesso ao metrô e principais ruas/avenidas de Nova Iorque,

title: Awful
text:
I booked a single room for 1 night based on photos and also the location for my first night in New York. When I arrived the person at the desk wanted to keep my passport for security as it was late in the evening, never have I ever had to do that before. Luckily they accepted my drivers license instead.
The room was all white, the bed was white also and on wheels I felt like I was in a hospital bed. 
The showers on my level were really strange, no where to put your things and 1/3 didn't work. For the price I paid I honestly feel like you can spend an extra $30 per night and you can go somewhere so much better!

title: Location, location ,location
text:
YMCA west side is 60 % location and a big 40 %  great art nouveau  external architecture ( i think ) with some still remaining features inside but not many. You will find your self in the heart of Manhattan. Yards from central park and a 5 min walk to the closest metro station. Rooms are basic but you should not be going to New York to sleep. 
If you just want a safe very friendly atmosphere to lay your head and stow your gear you could do a lot worse . 
You will have communal showers and toilets so if this is not you then done go. If you like back packing then its for you.  To be honest your stay will depend on your state of mind. Luxury or practicality. There is no luxury. There are  no tea making facilities in the rooms and the one and only coffee shop wont open until 7.00 to 7.30 am but there are plenty of street vendors near by. There is a big gym but you should really just go for a jog in central park and soak up the atmosphere. 
However there is a fantastic swimming pool right out of the Victorian era  full of glazed tiles . 
There is also a sauna all free to use if you are  staying there . For comfort its only a 5/5 if you can live with that you will find your self n what could be said to be the best starting location to start your days explanation from .

title: Simple..
text:
Cette auberge de jeunesse est très bien situé dans new York le confort n'est pas top la fenêtre de ma chambre était cassé pour ma part la salle de bain et toilette était commun pour tt l'étage c'était affreux. 
Les femmes de ménage passe mais ne font pas le ménage lol. 
Sinon le personnel à l'accueil était très gentil et c'est super super super bien situé

title: Trashy NYC
text:
This was my first time in NYC and most likely it will be the last time. Obviously experiences are subjective but I see a lot of misery and dirtiness. The hotel YMCA is located next to central park. In order to enter, you have to go thorough security. I'm glad because there are really ask kind of people around and better be safe than sorry.
The check-in procedure took half hour, with verification of ID, reservation, etc. 
The room we got was a simple 10 by 10 with a bunk bed, 1 sheet and 1 towel for each.  One chair one table and one TV. Pretty much like a jail. The bathroom is shared on the floor but you can lock in and have some privacy. I saw a huge cockroach the size of a quarter coming out from the sink. Loud people around 24h per day. Overall a bad experience I don't recommend anyone.

title: Pretty Basic
text: I came here with my college for a 4 day trip in February, as expected it was pretty standard - the room was average with a bunk bed, little cupboard/closet, drawers and a chair! The room was quite cold at night however it was -11 on our coldest night. The bathroom wasn't the nicest as on our floor only 1/3 female toilets locked and there wasn't much privacy for the showers meaning our clothes and personal items were left around for anyone to see which personally I didn't like.
