Rooms are super basic, just a bunk bed, a small TV and an even smaller desk and closet. They give you a soap and towels. Baths are shared, women get the code for the women's bathroom. Bathrooms are actually not that bad, they are cleaned regularly, they have three showers (with curtains) and hot water.
The good thing about this place (apart from the price) is that it's located right by central park and it has easy access to the subway-Columbus Circle.  There are lots of restaurants and shops nearby.
You also have access to the YMCA's facilities and pool but I've never had time to use them so I can't comment on that.
The bad stuff is that of course, it's an old place and rooms are basic, service is not good and it can be quite noisy (our room was right by the heater-A/C) and we couldn't sleep at all. People also come in at all hours and they just slam the doors without a care. 
Stay here if you have a limited budget, if you are not picky and if you are just basically looking for a bed to stay in NYC.

title: Economico
text: Buena ubicación, a pasos del Central Park y Columbos Circle. El precio es conveniente comparado con otras alternativas en NYC. Pero si deseas comodidad en las instalaciones, creo que no es una buena alternativa.

title: Localização
text: Com localização privilegiada a poucos passos do Central park, metro e vários museus, o local e bem simples e conta com piscina, academia, um otimo sistema de segurança.  Fiquei hospedado por 15 dias e adorei.

title: OK
text:
We started off poorly when our room keycard didn't work and we had to go back down to reception. We were told it was the door and the maintenance guy would be there in five minutes to fix it. Fifteen minutes later we went back down again and got someone to replace the card. The new card worked fine. 

We were in a twin room with bunkbeds on the twelfth floor. On the plus side, we were at the end of the corridor so had a five-star view of Central Park. On the negative, it was through a teeny tiny half-obscured window. The corridors on that floor are quite depressing and institutional. The room was tiny and a bit shabby but clean. The mattresses are cheap. 

There are loads of toilet+shower rooms at the end of the corridor which you have to yourself, if you can find a free one. Not easy in the morning when everyone's washing. They are nicely done out and generally clean, although not always. 

The day security guy is really nice and the location of the place is fabulous. Big of a mixed bag really. Don't expect much, just a bed for the night, and you'll be fine.

title: Загадочное заведение
text:
Хороший вариант для тех, кто ищет жилье подешевле в неплохом районе и без клопов с тараканами. 1 минута пешком до Централ Парка! 3 минуты до метро. 
Комната на двоих очень маленькая, с неработающим телевизором и удобствами на весь коридор. Туалет, умывальники, душ - всё вместе. Живут там люди, не очень похожие на туристов - пожилые персонажи всех рас. Стирают в раковине свое белье (то есть очень мало шансов оказаться в душе/туалете одному). Прачечной нет, кухни нет. В общем, тихо. Только иногда воет пожарная сигнализация, а за окном (на 8 этаже) ходят пожарные.
ВиФи работает неплохо, но банит некоторые российские новостные сайты.
Внизу есть бассейн и спортзал, куда приходят не только жильцы, но и какие-то люди с улицы.

title: Entrega o que promete
text:
O West Side YMCA é um tipo de alojamento (talvez esta seja a palavra mais adequada) que conta com toda a estrutura da rede YMCA - que no Brasil recebe o nome de ACM - Associação Cristã de Moços. Assim, a YMCA NÃO É um hotel. É importante que este ponto fique bem claro.
    Dito isso, o ponto forte é a localização, que é bem no coração do Lincoln Square, um dos quarteirões mais culturalmente relevantes de Nova York - onde se localizam cinemas, salas de música, a Filarmônica de NY e a prestigiada Juilliard School of Arts. Você se encontrará na "quina inferior esquerda" (lower west side) do Central Park, para onde WS-YMCA tem vista, além de estar a uma caminhada leve do Museu de História Natural, da Columbus Square e até mesmo da Times Square. É uma localização privilegiadíssima.
    Por outro lado, não busque conforto. Os quartos são minúsculos e muito antigos. As camas são beliches com colchões de mola e o WS-YMCA não oferece café da manhã. Os quartos não possuem banheiro, sendo o esquema comunitário ou semi-comunitário. 
    Este é o ponto mais fraco do local, que na minha opinião mais que é compensado pela localização, além de ter um pessoal bastante gentil e atencioso. E a estrutura YMCA (piscina, quadras, salas de musculação) ficam à disposição do hóspede. 
    Considerando ainda que hospedagem em Manhattan é MUITO caro, recomendo o West Side YMCA fortemente, desdde que tenha em mente que seu propósito não é descansar num spa, mas ter um teto seguro e um banheiro para dormir.

title: Great location, clean & amazing view from end of hall rooms facing Central Park
text:
At $100 a night for a private room with a bathroom down a long hall, it's not exactly dirt cheap. But it was clean and comfortable, and if you can get a room at the end of the hall on the side of the building facing Central Park, you will have a view that is not available in hotel rooms costing hundreds more. 

The room only has a single bed, but it was all I needed and I appreciated that it had a desk and chair. There was also a TV and ample closet space. Daily maid service, though I chose not to have them in my room because there is no safe for my electronics. They did a very good job keeping the bathrooms in decent shape, though, in my opinion. And I liked the bathrooms, good sized showers and place to put your things. Hooks on the wall and shelf by lavatory.

And the location can't be beat. Columbus Circle is right there, with subway lines going in all directions. 72nd Street is a nice walk in good weather and will whisk you to trendy Harlem in no time. Even getting to the East Village for a theater festival wasn't difficult. 

Hostel rooms are available, as well, and there is a little convenience store right off the lobby. There are cheaper hostel rooms, even cheaper hotel rooms. But if they can guarantee a room with that view, I would stay there again for a night or two.

Also, though this probably doesn't matter to many, but it's a great old building and I like the exterior architecture.

title: Bom custo benefício!!
text:
Ficamos 5 noites no West Side YMCA em NY. 
A limpeza, atendimento e organização do hostel nos atenderam, porém o ar condicionado do quarto era muito barulhento. Como saíamos cedo e chegávamos muito tarde, isso não chegou a nos atrapalhar, mas poderiam melhorar esses equipamentos. 
Localização é ótima. .metrô, vários locais para comer e próximo a alguns pontos turísticos!! 
Voltaríamos ao YMCA com certeza.

title: 共用バスルームは臭いし、ホテル代はボッたくられるし最悪
text:
ロケーションが最高でニューヨークの中では比較的手頃な値段ってことで宿泊を決めました。
シングルルームのバス共用で泊まりましたが、ちゃんと清掃されてないのかバスルームは汚く、常に生乾きのような異臭がしました。
そして、終いにはホテル代をボッたくられるというハプニングまで。
4泊416ドルで予約したのに、クレジットの明細を見ると引かれていたのは520ドル！
デポジットが加算された訳でもなく何を引かれたのか全く分からず、すぐBooking.comに電話し、後日なんとか返金してもらえましたが...
ロケーション以外何もいいところのないホテルです。
二度と泊まりません。
やはりちょっといい値段出してでもちゃんとしたホテルに泊まりたいです。

title: En seng at sove i
text:
Hvis du ikke har andre steder at sove så ok. Men du gerne vil opleve bare lidt luksus så er det ikke der. Jeg oplevet at det blev meget koldt, deres evne til at problemløse var ikke imponerende. Der gik flere dage før de åbnet for varmen, det skal lige siges at selv deres ansatte klaget over kulden.  Vi kunne dog få flere tæpper så det hjalp dog noget
  Men vinduern
Spædet

title: Top locatie maar verder niet te veel eisen stellen!
text:
Meer dan een pluspunt is de locatie van dit hostel. Vanuit het hostel struikel je Central Park in en ook het meest centrale metro punt ligt om de hoek.

Wanneer je niet zoveel geeft om de kamer waar je bed staat is dit een goede keuze.
De kamers zijn vrij klein, de airco werkt maar maakt veel geluid en het meubilair is wel aan vervanging toe.
Daarin tegen ontvang je iedere dag schone lakens en handdoeken.
De douche en WC vind je op de gang en wordt regelmatig schoon gemaakt.

Prima hostel voor als je hele dag buiten bent en alleen een slaapplaats zoekt.

title: Atende ao que se propõe.
text: Perto do que já li sobre hostel, eu acho que este atende ao que propõe. Não vi problemas no banheiro que é compartilhado, com a utilização de uma pessoa por vez e com uma chave de segurança (que é o próprio cartão do quarto). Ótima localização.

title: Albergue bem localizado, com academia de ginástica free
text:
Fiquei somente 3 noites nesse hotel/albergue da YMCA. A diária nem era tão barata, mas os outros hotéis de NY estão insuportavelmente caros.

O atendimento do staff é meio impessoal, o que é normal num hotel com grande circulação de hóspedes.

Quarto individual um pouco pequeno e simples, TV pequena, ar condicionado funcionando razoavelmente, WiFi free funcionou bem, sem reclamações. Serviço de limpeza (boa) diário, trocam a toalha de banho diariamente. Sem quaisquer amenidades, salvo um sabonete em barra. Eu sabia que o quarto não teria banheiro, o que foi realmente inconveniente, mas no fim deu tudo certo.

O banheiro, que fica no mesmo andar, é limpo, não tive qualquer problema quanto a isso.

Eu estava hospedado no oitavo andar, e havia um cheiro pouco agradável nos corredores. Eu sugeriria uma melhora nesse ponto.

O melhor de tudo é a academia (gym center), que é acessível gratuitamente aos hóspedes do hotel. Equipamentos de primeira qualidade, tudo funcionando bem, uma boa experiência.

Outro ponto positivo é a localização: fica a poucos metros do Central Park, e a umas 3 quadras pequenas do Lincoln Center.

Não sei se voltaria ao hotel. Se você não se importa em dividir banheiro, com quarto espartano e a tarifa for baixa, é uma boa escolha.

title: terribile
text: Appena arrivati non c'erano le camere nonostante avessimo le ricevute di prenotazioni, dopo due ore ci hanno dato una camera sporca dei clienti precedenti, poi ci hanno cambiato di nuovo con lenzuola rotte e letti a castello senza scaletta per salire, spifferi di vento ovunque e copertine ultrafine. I bagni sempre otturati e con le chiavi rotte cosi ognuno poteva entrare, personale anche ignorante. Peggio di cosi...

title: Vale mais do que custa.
text: Preço inacreditável pela localização. Não visa o conforto, quase que obviamente. Os quartos são simples, o banheiro é comunitário por andar e não é suuuper bem cuidado, mas é muito barato e não apenas fica em Manhattan, mas ao lado do Central Park. Não é pouca coisa. Recomendo.

title: Удобный вариант!
text:
Очень хотелось разместиться в центре, на Манхеттене, но не за 500$ за ночь. Никогда раньше не останавливалась в хостелах, YMCA не разочаровал. Расположение превосходное, у меня из номера был вид на Центральный парк - фото прилагаю, правда,  делала через оконную решётку. Номер был чистый, не такой уж и крохотный. Единственный нюанс отсутствие индивидуальной ванной, но мой номер располагался прямо напротив душевых, поэтому было удобно пользоваться. Душевые убирали каждое утро, всё действительно чисто. 
В YMCA очень приятная атмосфера, похоже на Университет, хотя гости хостела не только студенты, но и семейные пары и пожилые люди. Персонал приветливый, всегда рад помочь, подсказать, посоветовать, если есть вопросы. Мне, например, любезно поменяли номер, чтобы вид был на парк. 
Нью-Йорк потрясающий город, для тех, кто как и я, едет посмотреть интересные места, посетить музеи и погулять в парке, такое размещение будет очень удобным и выгодным! 
Желаю вам приятных путешествий!

title: Good enough!
text:
My friend and I stayed 10 nights in the hotel. This was our first time staying at a hotel with a shared bathroom, so we were a bit reluctant to book it, but the reviews we read were all very good, the location is great, a block from central park, 4 minutes walk to Columbus Circle and the subway, so we booked and were very happy we did. There was always a perfectly clean restroom available. There´s a small "grocery store" on the ground floor, sort of like a mini 7/11, so we could buy any breakfast we wanted, eat it at the tables of the comfortable lounge and make friends before leaving in the morning. The prices are very reasonable. Service was very good. 
The crowd is very mixed which makes it fun, being it YMCA, you can run into little groups of kids who are coming for a competition, or you´ll see kids drawings posted. It gives the stay a nice twist.
The only inconvenience we had was the check in time, at the place we booked it showed it was 2 hours earlier than what it was once we got there. Also, the room was pretty small! Just enough room for the bed, the luggage and us. 
We stayed on one of the upper floors, I think it was 10 or 11.

title: Really undecided abt this one.
text:
It's probably 6 of one and 1/2 a dozen of the other when it comes to the positive and negatives of this location.

Great location, you really can't beat it.  I don't know that I would have been able to find something better when it comes to price per location no matter how long I searched.

However, do I think I might have been able to procure more comfortable lodging per price range, probably. The issues we did encounter we felt we could put up with for our time there and because the YMCA does do so much good work.

* Full size bed that wasn't very comfortable.  
* Air conditioning that while it worked (someone had long since broken the control knobs so the settings couldn't be changed without a pliers), it wasn't keeping up with the heat and humidity of a unusually warm September. We opened the door and let the hall air conditioner help us out.
* Question if the bathroom was clean.  My definition of clean is generally that if there are still hairs in the shower, you didn't actually "clean" it.  And that most certainly applies when there is a used soap still in the dish when you arrive.
* The towel bar was hanging on by a thread or two.  Toilet was tricky to flush.  Shower head was like needles.  The room and bathroom just really needed some good quality TLC & maintenance (if you get paint on the door jam, wipe it up before it dries.  wash the walls from time to time.  fix small issues b4 they become large).
* The wifi is iffy.  We didn't think it was a big issue like some people - we weren't there to play on our electronic device.  When we would get on at 4 am no issues but it gets really slow at high use times.  If we NEEDED internet we simply paid to use the computers - problem solved.

If you go in with a open mind about some of the issues you may encounter, I think you will appreciate this lodging.

title: You get what you pay for
text: This is not a great place to stay but a decent one. Stayed there for two nights. Rooms are very small but clean. No attached washrooms, you need to use common ones on floor. Depends on which dates you are visiting NY. On non rush days, you could get 4 star property at same prices, then avoid this one. If busy days in NY, other hotels may become too costly, this is decent option. Very close to Central Park, 1 min walk.

title: Good price for what you are getting!
text: This place is so cheap with friendly staff, clean rooms (and bathrooms) and THE best location. You are less than one building from central park. Three blocks from Columbus circle where you can get the red and blue lines and connections. This is the cheapest accommodation i have ever paid in NYC and i would 100% stay again. If you happen to stay there on a Sunday there is a local market on the west side and the other end of the block, which hosts clothes and food (may be seasonal). Ps. you get included gym and swim access.

title: My second time and I will be back
text:
This was my second time at the YMCA, I was not let down and I will be back.
Extremely well located right around the corner of Central Park (west) and right in between Columbus Circle Station & Lincoln Center Station. You can get there right from the airport ($8)
You get strictly what you need no luxuries....clean towels, clean bed, clean room (rooms are cleaned every day).
Most rooms have a shared bathroom (you can get a room with a bathroom for an extra charge), shared bathrooms are located on the hallways.
Please note that on floor 12th there are "private" bathrooms...these are unisex bathrooms in which you can lock yourself and you have your own shower, sink and toilet.
So if you are not on floor 12th it is worth it to go there. 
The place in general is safe, clean and the building is very pretty.

title: サウナが良かったです。
text: コロンバスサークル駅から徒歩2分の好立地です。24時間出入り自由ですが、1階のコンビニは朝7時から夜7時までと、やや不便です。wifiはロビーのみ使用可です。デラックスシングルにしては部屋は狭く、壁掛けテレビの受信も良くありません。窓は開けられませんが、空調は快適です。廊下の音はかなりうるさいです。このホテルの素晴らしい点は、サウナ、プール、ジムを無料で使用出来る所でしょう。この点は近代設備です。サウナ等を利用したい人は泊まりましょう。

title: Não vale a pena
text: O preço e a localização agradam, mas todo o resto não vale a pena. Os atendentes da noite são grosseiros e não parecem querer ajudar. A cama é ruim, mas é possível aguentar. No quarto, a tv e wifi não funcionaram (em lugar nenhum aliás). O banheiro é muito sujo e, pelo menos no 8 andar, não tinha água quente. A localização e preço são as única coisas que valem a pena.

title: Vale pela localização e preço
text: Esqueça os luxos, a limpeza perfeita, o quarto espaçoso e o bom colchão. Este é um hostel com uma localização perfeita e um otimo preço. Tem piscina e ginásio e algumas comodidades extra mas é só isso!

title: We got a great room away from elevators and bathrooms!... Whew!!
text:
If you've stayed at any YMCA in NYC, you know you're rolling the dice on room location.  

Well, we got a great "deluxe" bunk room away from the elevators and around the corner from the dozen individual bathrooms.  It was quiet for both nights, no noise, no disruptions!  Room was very clean, except I did take out the A/C filter and it was loaded and 100% clogged with dust.  Took it to the bathroom and cleaned it (a habit I have), then we were good to go!  TV reception is a bit iffy, but it got the job done.  Showers/bathrooms were clean and a great hot shower every time!  

All in all a nice comfortable stay in a location we needed to be, and right next to Central Park to boot.

title: Gute Lage-sonst nichts
text:
Das Hotel (falls man es so nennen kann) überzeugt lediglich durch die gute Lage an der Upper Westside, direkt am Central Park und der Nähe zur Subway Station, die eine gute Anbindung nach Lower Manhattan gewährleistet. 
Weiterhin positiv: Handtücher. 

Dass das YMCA hier eine gute Lage zu einem in dieser Lage und für Manhattan recht günstigen Preis bietet, lassen sie die Kunden an jeder Ecke spüren.
Der Service ist eine Katasrophe, die Mitarbeiterr arbeiten aneinander vorbei wo es nur geht, Freundlichkeit ist ein Fremdwort. Wenn man eine Auskunft bekommt, dann unfreundlich. 
Wir mussten 2 1/2 h auf unser Zimmer warten. War eine Tortur, die von keinem Mitarbeiter (nicht mal vom Supervisor) mit einer Entschuldigung abgetan wird. Frei nach dem Motto - wir bekommen das Hostel so oder so voll, ist uns ziemlich egal, was mit unseren Kunden ist. 
In den Bädern wird zwar geputzt, von Personal das weder Englisch spricht noch versteht, ändert aber nichts an der Tatsache, dass es teilweise weder Seife noch Klopapier gibt, was dann für ein gemeinsam genutztes Bad hygienisch unter aller Sau ist. 
Wifi funktioniert auch lediglich zum whats appen, Anrufe über Apps, sowie E-Mail Dienste sind aber gesperrt. Wären Sie frei, würden Sie jedoch eh nicht funktionieren. Lächerlich. 

Für low budget sicher geeignet, aber nichts erwarten. Man hat halt ein Zimmer zum schlafen auf einer Matratze, deren Federn in den Rücken stechen...Aber man lebt in Manhattan.

title: Great Location, Low Price, Not So Nice Stay
text:
I loved the location.  This place is right across the street from Central Park.  It is within walking distance of several museums, Times Square, Broadway and many other places.  The price was quite a bit lower than almost everything else available. The employees are nice.  I liked the little store. It was convenient and the prices are reasonable.  

My room was ok, it was nothing fancy at all.  It was small but is was clean. The AC was powerful.  The room was nice and cool when I got there.  The bed was not the most comfortable.  It was not much bigger than a cot and I could feel the springs in the mattress.  The shared bathroom was not very clean.  

If you are someone who is used to staying in moderate to nice hotels, I would not recommend this place.

I would only stay again if I was stuck.

title: Basico
text:
Lo mejor:   la ubicacion 
Lo peor:  habitaciones muy austeras sin baño Privado
Caracteristas: limpio muy concurrido es ademas de albergue un  gimmasio tiene un buffet q se puede desayunar almorzar un sándwich o ensalada cierra 7 7:30 pm 
Conclusion: tenerlo en cuenta por el precio y la ubicacion

title: Lage top,  Hostel schlecht
text:
Die Zimmer sind noch ganz ok aber das Bad war einfach nur schrecklich. Teilweise sogar nur kalte duschen! . Ein Gegenstand hat auch aus dem Zimmer gefehlt.  nur die Lage konnte alles retten 
Alles schon veraltet und teils im schlechten Zustand

title: Práctico. Buen servicio y ubicación.
text: Excellente para los que buscan un lugar limpio y seguro para tomar una ducha y descansar despues de pasar el día fuera recorriendo la ciudad. La ubicación excelente, a metros de Central Park y a tres cuadras de Columbus Circle donde tenes acceso a todas la líneas de subte para llegar a cualquier lugar.

title: うるさくて…
text:
某旅行会社の一人旅プランで行きました。
予算の関係で、立地優先でここに。
ま、値段が値段なので仕方ないんですけど。
まず部屋が掃除されていない（笑）
ベッド下がホコリだらけ。
着いてすぐに掃除しました。
エアコンの音もかなりうるさかったけど、近くで夜中まで工事してて寝られず…
シャワールームが共用なんだけど、着替えとか置く場所もなく、シャワーも固定なので使いづらい。
何より同じ期間に周囲の部屋に現地の学生の団体がいて、夜中まで大騒ぎ‼︎
あまりに連日でムカついて、日本語でうるさい‼︎と怒鳴ってしまいました（笑） 静かになったけど…w
でもスタッフはこっちの拙い英語にも笑顔で対応してくれたし、
寒いって言ったら毎日ブランケット追加でセットしてくれてあったから、優しいなーと感動。

title: Incredible budget option right in the centre of New York!
text:
My 11 year old daughter and I stayed for 2 nights, paying a total of $220. Amazing deal for Manhattan. I have to admit to feeling a little concerned prior to our arrival about taking her to a youth hostel...I needn't have worried. The staff were incredibly friendly and helpful. The room was private. Tiny, but we were only sleeping and storing clothes there so that was no problem. We opted for bunk beds and the sheets were immaculate and the room very clean. The shared bathroom was great, women only and a code on the door to get in. The building is very old (beautiful actually) so there was a slight problem with water pooling on the old tiled floor, but it was kept very clean.
It was quiet at night, no crazy behaviour from any of the guests and we mostly saw families using the facilities.
The location is amazing, 3 blocks from Colombus Circle and the subway at the end of Central Park. A taxi to Times Square was only 6 bucks. 
The swimming pools are beautiful old baths with the original bright blue tiling. Gorgeous! Super warm too. Bring a swim hat - or pay $6 to buy one at the front desk. 
Check in and out was smooth, and you can pay a couple of bucks to securely leave luggage on the day of arrival and the day you leave.
All in all I would highly recommend this for couples, families, friends - anyone who feels that staying in New York is insanely expensive, when you're out from early morning until late night and all you need is a bed!

title: Great gym and location, perfect to explore NYC
text: Since you'll only sleep in your room while you are in NYC, you won't need much more than a bed, a big cupboard, a table, a chair, and a TV - which is what the rooms at the Y have. Everything is clean (and being cleaned daily), the shared bathrooms are clean as well; the ones on the 3rd floor (that belong to the gym) are top-notch, the ones on the upper floors (hostel rooms) are clean and OK. Go to the amazing, well-equipped gym to meet locals and to enjoy a nice workout before heading out (gym opens at 5am on weekdays). The staff is very friendly and helpful, the small shop with Starbucks coffee, chilled beverages, and small snacks is good to get your day started (opens at 7am). Downsides: you sometimes have to force the doors to open or close, which causes some noise, so if you need silence and a lot of sleep, you should bring some earplugs. Love the spirit of the place.

title: В кризис - самое то!
text: Поездка в Нью-Йорк совпала с очередным кризисом, поэтому выбирали бюджетное жильле. Остановили выбор на этом хостеле - чудный вариант для экономных путешественников, причем прямо на Манхэттене, с его атомными ценами, район Мидтаун. В номере все простенькое, старенькое, но годное и рабочее. Вид из окон на Сентрал Парк. Все чисто, в комнате - кровать, тумбочка и кондишн. Завтракали в кафешке, расположенной прямо под окнами, там же есть бассейн, вечером и утром было приятно поплескаться.

title: great location just a shame about the lack of sleep.
text: Firstly i would like to say how fantastic the location is, you really can't fault it. It is so close to everything! The staff we spoke to were always helpful and the hostel itself felt very safe and secure. The only downside to this hostel are the uncomfortable beds. The lack of sleep on a daily basis became a struggle towards the end of the week. However for the money this hostel is worth it, just be prepared for the sleepless nights.

title: Best affordable option in Manhattan
text: Having stayed in various New York hotels - from budget to luxury - the West Side Y is in my opinion the best option for visitors to Manhattan coming on a budget, particularly if there are two or three of you. The rooms are small (this is New York) but if you don't mind a little ruggedness you can save some money here to spend on days and nights out. Good location and good people.

title: Sleepless night
text: I stayed at the West Side YMCA Hostel for only one night, but it was the worst night ever.The staff was not rude but whenever I was approaching them with basic questions(I had to because they didn't explain anything when I was checking in), the facial expressions of the ladies at the reception were not friendly, rather highly annoyed and bored.The hostel is very big and crowded.My room was located at the 9th floor.The noise coming from the ventilation outside was unbearable.The moment I entered the room I realized immediately that the night was going to be sleepless and requested to be moved elsewhere.They did move me, however, the new room was at the same floor, same noisy.I haven't slept the whole night.The location is good, so if you are not planning to sleep but prefer to explore the night life of NY instead, this offer might suite you.Otherwise, you may be too tired to enjoy the sights a step away.

title: Excellent location
text:
West Side YMCA was on par with pricing of other hostels in the area but with added bonus of having private accommodation.  The room is not too bad in size -  it is small but it does have bed, towel,  television and hanging space for clothes. 
Stay for the location  - easy walk to Times Square and any Broadway show.  I stayed alone and had no trouble in walking at night. Closest subway is only a 2 minute walk away.  
Fitness center is extensive and guests can participate in classes.
The bathroom was the only down side. Because the shower and toilets are in the same area the room is always wet to the point of having pools of water on the floor. Also, none of the toilets seemed to lock. Cleanliness  is average maybe a bit above.

title: Excelente, preço único em manhattan
text:
A localização é incomparavel, ao lado do lincoln center, atravessa a rua e está no central park (meu quarto tinha vista para o central park!) na rua 63, que é ótima localização, a passos do metro 59 columbus circle, onde inclusive tem o time warner, shopping com whole foods market e lojas ótimas. 
ia andando até a quinta, e até mesmo até a broadway. o metro da 59 é excelente, pois diversas linhas param ali.
o YMCA é obviamente simples, mas para quem deseja desfrutar da cidade e ter apenas um lugar para dormir, aqui é perfeito.
Peguei um quarto individual, e foi ótimo, o quarto era o que eu precisava, pois realmente só ia para dormir, os banheiros era super limpos, e realmente foi melhor do que eu imaginava. A limpeza, segurança são impecaveis, e os funcionarios muito solictos sempre.
É realmente simples, mas com esse preço, eu não encontrei nem mesmo hosteis mais simples, em bairros menos interessantes.
A melhor surpresa é a área fitness, que todo hospede tem direito de usufruir sem pagar nada a mais!! são 3 andares de área fitness!!! fiquei chocada, equipamentos life fitness de primeira linha, 3 salas para musculaçao, sala cárdio de primeiro mundo, 5 quadras de squash, pista de corrida indoor, 2 salas de lutas, quadras poliesportivas, diversas salas par aulas de ginastica e piscina indoor, fora o vestiário incrivel!!
Com certeza, quando eu voltar, ficarei lá novamente!!!

title: Semplice ed economico posizione ottima
text:
Ho soggiornato al WSYMCA che non è un hotel come ho letto in alcune recensioni, e nn vuole esserlo, si tratta di ostello, e come ostello è buono. Ci sono camere singole, doppie e più grandi, i bagni sono in comune, vengono puliti puntualmente diverse volte al giorno, anche le camere pur avendo il minimo indispensabile sono pulite e in ordine.Come punto d appoggio lo consiglio assolutamente anche perchè i prezzi che hanno gli hotel sono molto più costosi; x chi c soggiorna mettono a disposizione piscina e palestra con tutti i corsi d fitness. 
Ho inoltre trovato il personale gentile e disponibile.

title: Bx2= bueno y barato...
text: Estuve en este hotel hace 15 dias con mi pareja, en el piso 12, no logramos reservar cama matrimonial, fueron cuchetas, pero tenian buenos colchones, sabanas y frasadas polar bien blancas. Las habitaciones chicas pero para ir solo a dormir, estaban bien, tenian escritorio con una silla, espejo, pequeño placard con perchas, lcd y aire acondicionado de ventana que te congelaba (se puede regular y apagar). Los baños son afuera de la habitacion pero privados, podes trabar la puerta del lado de adentro, son muy nuevos y en este piso habia 10 con vanitory, espejo, inodoro y ducha, lo cual fueras a la hs que fueras siempre habia alguno disponible. la limpieza tanto de la habitacion como del baño excelente, te dan toallas y jabones todos los dias cuando hacen las las camas y en los baños siempre hay pepel higienico y de manos (no hay shampoo, ni secador de pelo). Si te falta para la hs del check in podes dejar valijas, hay una maquina en lobby que te cobra 2 dolares por maleta, y las ponen en un deposito,las podes dejar las horas que quieras. Para usar wifi del celular tenes que entrar al navegador, ahi aparece la web del hotel y te pide contraseña que te la dan en la recepcion, tenes en las habitaciones tambien buena señal. En el lobby hay baños, bebedero con agua fria para tomar y cargar botellas y un local con algunas cosas como para desayunar, muy practico. Demas instalaciones del hotel no pude recorrerlas, tiene pileta y gym pero las desconozco. Unico punto negativo: la mayoria de los empeados de la recepcion no son nada amables, no te ayudan en nada, no hablan otros idiomas, y si ven que no estas entendiendo mas rapido te hablan y te complican las cosas. Ubicacion: a media cuadra del central park, a una de broadway y a dos y media de colombus circle donde combinan muchos subtes y lineas de colectivos.

title: Lo malo son los baños compartidos
text: Muy buena ubicacion, limpio, pero lo malo son lo chico de las habitaciones y la incomodidad de las camas marineras, Los baños son compartidos, por lo que es muy incomodo, si tu habitacion esta lejos del baño. No volvería mas.

title: まずは値段、そしてロケーション
text:
この値段、そしてマンハッタンのこのロケーションは大いにプラス。
部屋の古さ、シャワー・トイレが共同なのはマイナス。
部屋の古さは我慢、シャワーは、早めの時間に使ってしまえばきれいだと思います。
同じぐらいの値段の安ホテルに泊まるより、YMCAなだけあって、セキュリティや掃除など、管理面はきちんとしていると思いました。また、宿泊客はジムやプールを自由に使えるのはよかったです。ジムのシャワーは宿泊フロアのシャワーよりも広いし、きれいだし、使いやすかったです。

title: Great location, OK accomodation
text:
What a fantastic location for a hostel. Being on a budget, staying in Manhattan is tricky, but for the price of a 5 star spa hotel in Budapest, you can get a nights stay here at this well located NYC hostel. So if you want location and don't want to have to travel in from Long Island or other places to save money, and don't mind staying in less luxurious accommodation, this is for you. 
It is expensive for a hostel, but again for Manhattan this is a bargain. 
30s walk to Central Park, 5 minutes to both Columbus circle and in the other direction the Lincoln centre. 
Showers and toilets in the gym facilities were superbly clean, compared to the shared toilets and showers in the accommodation. All three nights I stayed, I could not even use the shared toilet block on my floor so I used the gym facilities each morning. The two toilet doors did not close properly, the showers and sinks leaked onto the floor (If you intend to go in to wash hands/ brush teeth make sure to bring shoes you don't mind getting soaked..) and both the soap dispenser and hand towel machine were broken. Luckily, nice towels and soap is provided for free in your room.
The sauna and steam room in the gym were a dream and a nice break from the liveliness of New York.
Averagely clean room but very clean bed sheets and towels provided. TV did not work in my room.
A noisy place, but this is obvious, it being both a hostel and in the centre of New York.
I used the safe storage luggage facility offered for $2 at the end of my stay, but 5 hours after me giving them my bag to be put into storage, it was still on the floor where they had put it when I left... Not such safe storage if I am completely honest as a YMCA is used by many people not just people using the accommodation here.

title: Localização muito boa
text: O hotel fica próximo à estação da Columbus Circle, a rua do hotel fica de frente para o Central Park, tem uma Apple Store a 4 quarteirões, Bestbuy a 2 quarteirões e outras coisas como farmácia e cafés muito próximos. O quarto em que fiquei era sempre limpo e organizado. O ponto negativo fica para o banheiro comunitário do 9º andar, mas se você subir para o 10º  a situação melhora.

title: It's all about the location
text: We spend just one night here and this hostel had all we needed- room with bed and shared bathroom. The room was small and simple. Not exactly clean but okay. We didn't care. But the bathroom was disgusting. 2 out of 3 toilets didn't flush and showers were nasty. We survive and we would probably stay again cause the location is great and who needs to sleep in NYC right?! :D it just seemed a little overpriced for that.

title: Mai più
text: Stanza piccola, brutta e maleodorante. Bagni abbastanza decenti. Il bar dell'hotel è abbastanza fornito. La palestra è  grande e fornita ma poco utile per chi è in visita qualche giorno nella Grande Mela. La posizione è il vero e unico punto forte di questa struttura!

title: Posizione favolosa, hotel mediocre
text:
Che posizione: favolosa, a due passi dal cuore di Manhattan! 
Hotel/ostello di medio/bassa qualità. Pulizia accettabile, camere piccole, sobrie, non vi aspettate nulla di eccezionale! Il punto forte di questa struttura è la logistica: posizione favolosa, West Side Central Park, 63esima strada. La mia stanza era situata al 13° piano, con vista magnifica sul Central Park. Altro punto a favore la possibilità di utilizzare piscina (25 metri) e palestra del centro sportivo YMCA.
I bagni sono in comune, ma non ho mai dovuto attendere, in quanto sono numerosi. Vengono puliti più volte al giorno.
Per chi non ha molte pretese e come me decidesse di viversi NY 18 ore al giorno, è una buona scelta. 04/2012
Luca

title: It's an hostel (not an hotel)
text:
Single room fairly clean with towels provided. Air-condition and tv in the room.
Shared bathroom in the corridor - not too bad - fairly clean..
Excellent position, 50mt from Central park, 5 min to Columbus circle and subway.
Quite pricey for an hostel, but you are paying the position in Manhattan.

title: Weekend at the YMCA
text: Had a great time in NYC the location is great and the hostel is good stayed here for 2 nights. last day i put my luggage in storage for $2 when i got back in the afternoon i asked if i could grab a quick shower even though i had already checked out the guy said sure go up to the 3rd floor there is a shower for the gym and i got a free towel. The only drawback to this place is the beds have wheels on them if you move when you sleep the bed moves. The shared washrooms where very clean.

title: Good and Bad
text:
I stayed here for 15 nights. There is good and bad things about this place.
The Good:-  The Location was brilliant. 2 minute walk to Central Park and 5 minute walk to Columbus Circle Subway. Many eateries and grocery stores close by as well.
Security was nice a touch. You had to show your room key as you entered the building.
The room was ok. Small but hey your not in New York to spend time in your room. Tv and internet worked fine. AC worked fine bit noisy but ok.

The Bad:- The shared bathrooms were OK? They were cleaned daily and the staff did a great job. It was other people staying that made it bad. not putting rubbish in bins. Not flushing toilet's and leaving sanitary pads on the backs of toilets. 
The showers were ok. No where to put soap or your belongings. For 3 days there was no hot water.
Also the lock on the female bathroom door was broken and was taped so you could open the door.
The beds were terrible. The mattress was like sleeping straight on springs and not comfortable at all. The bed also had wheels so if you moved the bed moved.

I personally would not stay here again. I would spend a bit more to have just that bit more comfort. 
But if you are on a really tight budget then maybe its for you :)

title: Great and cheap stay
text:
We stayed at the West Side YMCA for 2 night on a short visit to New York City. The location was excellent, minutes from Central Park and Columbus Circle but still relatively quiet.

The room: We had a deluxe bunk bed room on the 12th floor, furthest away from the elevator, which meant no noise from other guests coming and going. The room was clean and had great AC which was very welcomed after a long day in the August heat. Towels, bar soap and cups were in the room, as well a TV which we never used. The beds were bunk beds, and I was a bit nervous getting in the top bunk as it was a bit shaky but that did not effect the sleep quality.

The bathrooms on the 12 floor are all single rooms, with a toilet, sink and shower. This was a very nice surprise, as I was expecting several stalls in a shared bathroom. The quality was a bit hit or miss with some bathrooms not having soap or tissue to dry your hands but most of them were acceptable. The water pressure was excellent! 

Overall, for the price we paid we were very happy with our stay and would recommend to anybody going to NYC on a budget.

title: Buena estadia
text:
I travel with a friend and the check in was very late, like 2 pm sth like that so we pay 2 dollars to keep our luggage there. At the check in desk the lady told us that we didn't have any booking with them, luckily we printed our booking (2 single beds in one room and shared restroom) and they didn't have that room available so they offered us for the same price 2 rooms with a single bed each one so it was a good solution, but I strongly recommend that you print the reservation to not have this problem.
The hostel was on a very good location, half block from central park, and some bars and Lincoln center, 2 blocks from Columbus circle mall and subway station.
I was doubting to stay here according to the comments about the bathrooms, but we didn't have any problem, Even though they're shared, they're always clean and available to use.
We stayed in the 13th floor and wifi signal ddoes not get the rooms, if you wanna use wifi in this level you have to stay close to the elevators or the first bathroom.
One day we were sleeping and there was a fire drill at 9.00 am, NO ONE wants to wake up scared at that time in the morning in a foreign country, so I recommend the hostel to inform their guests the possibility of a fire drill, because if you dont speak english and hear that u are gonna be scared.

title: Great location, otherwise very average.
text: The location is amazing, literally across the road from central park. I shared a tiny twin bunk room with my mum. The air con was crucial in 35 degree heat, but started making loud noises at 4am, so I eventually turned it off. The shared bathrooms are small (just one on the floor, for a whole lot of people) and decidedly average. They smelt terrible, which made them feel unclean.  Of three toilets, one didn't lock and one was blocked. Of four basins, two were out of order.  The three showers all worked but there is very limited space and no where to easily stash dry stuff.  Reception staff at check in were surly and unhelpful. A different staff member later on was more approachable.  I see pictures of a lounge on here that we were never told about and I am unsure if it actually exists.  This is definitely budget accommodation that would get you much more for your money anywhere else in the world. If you are just looking for a bed, close to central park, then its a great location and adequate accommodation (just).

title: The Lack of Service Mindness
text: The staff could´ve done a better job at welcoming us and making us feel at home. The only seemed bothered by our presence and their attitude towards their job made me feel like they didn´t even want to be their. Keep those feelings outside of work and do your job!

title: Excelente Hotel
text:
La verdad que no tiene nada de Hostel. Es un hotel modesto y super agradable.
La ubicación es genial, estas muy cerca de columbus circle con acceso a muchas lineas de subte.
La limpieza es buenisima ,todos los días te cambian las toallas y ordenan la habitación.
Si bien reservamos habitación con baño compartido y nos daba un poco de temor ,la verdad que no hubo ningun problema al respecto.
Los baños estan siempre limpios , hay muchos y son completos por ende en mas comodo en el momento de usarlos.

title: Excellent location
text: Excellent location right next to Central Park. Rooms were ok, apart from really noisy air con and no safety barrier on top bunk. Restroom facilities were good and kept fairly clean. Adequate for just sleeping in, didn't make use of any other facilities

title: La posizione è il punto forte
text: Ottima posizione, vicino a Central Park e attaccato ad una stazione metro, ma comunque in 15-20 minuti di camminata sei in pieno centro NY. Letti che cigolavano e tanto, si formava una conca appena ci si sdraiava! Stanze un po' troppo piccole per chi si porta appresso una valigia normale (eravamo in due + 2 valige e bisognava fare lo slalom) però a livello di pulizia era perfetto. Non c'è la "camerata" dei bagni, sono tutti bagni singoli in comune dotati si doccia, WC e lavandino così si ha uno spazio tutto per sé.

title: Awesome location with reasonable price
text: The place is huge and not really new. Location is awesome right by Central Park and Columbus Circus, which conects you to most all the places in the city. I have stayed in a 2 bedroom room, kinda small but not a problem. Has air conditioning and a small closet. Shared bathroom wasnt a really good thing, most because people dont keep it clean, but the hotel staff did clean it everyday. During summer the room might stay warm which makes you keep AC on all the time.

title: Convenience at low cost!
text:
A friend and I shared a bunk room here towards the end of November 2014. The room wasn't particularly large, and was in fact quite small, but there was room enough for us both to dress and get around, and the wifi was strong enough on our floor that we could stream a movie before bed in our room. Beds were fairly comfortable, and though the blankets felt a bit inadequate we weren't cold. Extra blankets made that even better, and were easily obtained when requested. Same with extra towels.

The shared bathroom was... Okay. It was almost always usable, though one of the toilet stalls would not lock (there were 3 or 4 in the bathroom, if I remember right) and they often ran out of bathroom tissue. The shower and sink area was almost always damp, as the drainage was a bit lacking, but other reviews had warned of this. A pair of dollar store flip-flops kept our feet dry to brush our teeth or wash our hands. Showers were not particularly private, but they were just large enough to towel off inside of to avoid giving anyone trying to use the restroom an unwarranted show. Some people were not so shy about their bodies, though!

The little corner store was great for running down for breakfast and coffee, and there was plenty in the area if we wanted to eat something more substantial.

The security desk was a little brisk when we checked in, but nothing that wasn't easily brushed off as the officer having a poor day. The actual check-in desk for the hostel was very friendly. If you need to leave your bags in the storage area downstairs, make sure you leave NOTHING valuable! It's not particularly secure, but functions as a place to leave your stuff when needed.

Excellent area. Easily walkable from the Port Authority bus station, and literally across the street from Central Park. If taking the subway, get off at Columbus Circle and walk north a few blocks along the side of Central Park, and you're there.

title: Great location, basic accommodations (but no surprises)
text:
Firstly, the location in fantastic--short distance to subway, restaurants, Lincoln Center, cinemas, Whole Foods, etc. 

This is the Y so the accommodation is basic, but livable.  The room is small, but has A/C and a fuzzy TV.  The internet worked most of the time.  Most of the time, the shared bathrooms are clean and fine.

title: Excelente para jóvenes en busca de un hotel económico
text:
El hotel es una especie de club-hotel. Un lugar muy raro, repleto de gente y con mucho movimiento. 
En mi caso, estuve con una amiga alojada en una habitacion hiper chica, sin baño. El baño es compartido por piso al menos en la que yo habia reservado. De todos modos, descubrimos que se podian usar las intalaciones del vestuario de la pileta, que era muy amplios y muy limpios.
La ubicacion esta bárbara, enfrente al central park y con el subte muy cerca.
Lo recomiendo solo para gente joven o parejas con bajo presupuesto, mas que nada por el tema del baño compartido.
En la planta baja hay un local chiquito tipo almacen, que podes comprar fruta, bebidas o comida, de autoservicio y que se puede pagar con tarjeta de credito.
Para nuestra estadía estuvo perfecto.

title: New York'un merkezinde kalınabilecek makul otellerden biri.
text: Konum itibariyle çok iyi bir noktada, 3 gün kaldığımız bu otelde metroya çok az bindik. Odalardan çok fazla bir şey beklemeyin, Banyo Tuvalet ortak kullanımlıydı fakat temizdi. Fiyatları ise ortalama. Ama bi avrupaya göre tabiki çok pahalı. Genel olarak tavsiye ediyorum.

title: Fantastic Location and Amenities
text: This was a great hostel with an amazing gym and pool, right on central park and by broadway. Lots of things within walking distance. The rooms were a bit pokey, but this is in the heart of NYC, so can't complain.

title: Location location!
text: Amazing location right near Central Park and a quick walk to Times Square. The rooms are tiny and of course it's New York so overpriced for the room you get. Many facilities and security. For a place to stay it wasnt very much in regards to party and meeting people.

title: Excelente localização
text: Hotel simples, quarto pequeno, fiquei num quarto individual com banheiro compartilhado. Mas pelo preço e pela localização vale muito apenas. Você esta a apenas 3 quadras da estação de metro. Tem um Starbucks na esquina, muito conveniente pois o hotel não serve café da manhã. Hotel para aqueles que passam o dia todo fora e voltam só para dormir mesmo.

title: 1 Punkt für die gute Lage
text:
Wir waren 4 Nächte im YMCA und schon bei der Ankunft hatte ich ein schlechtes Gefühl. Die Sevicemitarbeiterin war pampig  und schmatze uns laut mit einem Kaugummi irgendetwas an den Kopf.

Die Bilder welche von YMCA eingestellt worden sind, sind nur 9 bis 11 Stock.

Wir waren im 12 Stock und es war der Horror. 
Die Zimmer waren etwas klein aber ok von der Größe. wir hatten ein Stockbett haben aber zusammen im unteren Bett geschlafen, da wir uns oben nicht rein legen wollen, da die Federkern-Matratze so unbequem war und man Angst hatte das man runterfällt. Die Matratze waren eh sehr alt und man merkte jede Feder beim Umdrehen in der Nacht. Die Klima lief leider unrund aber nach der zweiten Nacht hat man sich nicht mehr erschreckt wenn sie anlief.

NUN zu den Badezimmern ( nicht auf den Bildern zusehen)
Die Badezimmer wenn man es Badezimmer nennen darf waren sowas von ekelhaft  obwohl sie von den netten Putzkräften jeden Tag mehrmal geputz worden. Keine Seife usw. 
Die Dusche war eher ein Schimmelbiotop und Reparatur dürftig.

Als kleinen Tipp  wenn schon gebucht ist und man ist dort lasst euch den Türcode von dem Frauenbad im 11ten Stock geben da sind die Duschen und  Toiletten besser und sauberer. Auch bei den Männern sind die Duschen dort besser.

Das einzige gute war die Nähe zum Central Park, in dem man seinen Schlafmangel wieder zurück holen konnte :) 
Lg

title: Preis/Leistung ok, Wifi eine Lüge
text:
Zuerst muss man sagen für die Lage und den Preis ist das Zimmer ok, jedes hat eine Klimaanlage und täglich kommt das Housekeeping. Ein Bad im Flur ist bei Hosteln vor allem aus dem Baujahr nunmal Standard, zumal es eigentlich genug Bäder gibt und diese auch täglich gereinigt werden.

Das Wifi ist jedoch a)langsam was verschmerzbar ist, jedoch b) was entscheidend ist gefiltert, so werde Seiten die nicht die Ansicht des YMCA vertreten gesperrt. Auch ist kein Aufbau eines VPN möglich oder einer anderen gesicherten Verbindung, dadurch entsteht die Gefahr, dass alles was geschrieben oder besucht wird, gespeichert oder vielleicht sogar durchsucht wird. Das ist untragbar!

title: Buena relación precio calidad.
text:
Hospedarse en NYC es caro, mas aun si lo que se busca es buena ubicación.
Este sitio ofrece una excelente ubicación a un precio económico.
Desde ya se saben las condiciones de la estadía. Las habitaciones pueden ser privadas o compartidas y el baño es siempre compartido.
En mi caso fui a una habitación privada la cual estaba bastante mejor de lo que esperaba. Las camas eran marineras pero con un buen colchón para descansar luego de un día agitado.
Los vestuarios eran limpios, cómodos y siempre había una ducha disponible.
Lo mejor lejos: excelente ubicación.

title: VALE LA PENA
text:
Es un hostel mucho más caro de lo normal, pero tiene una ubicación espectacular. Cerca del Time, zona tranquila, residencial. a media cuadra del central park.
Los empleados te atienden super bien, hablan castellano tmb. Cuenta ocn un  buffet con variedad de productos lo malo es que cierra alas 19.3. cuando uno va  NY y se la pasa caminando suele llegar más tarde que ese horario. El hostel está abierto las 24 hs.
Los baños estuvieron siempre impecable, y todo los dias te limpian el cuarto. NADA DE QUE QUEJARME. RECOMENDABLE

title: Buena ubicación y precio
text:
Alojarte en NYC es batante caro, entonces si quieres conocer y gastar poco esta es la opción perfecta. Esta a unos metros del
Central park y del Museo de Historia Natural, Columbus Circle y Lincoln Center. Para el tiempo que pasas en el hotel, vale la pena.

title: Lo unico bueno es el precio
text: Viaje a NY por trabajo y me quede unos dias mas por mi cuenta, este fue el lugar mas economico que encontre y ademas me lo habia recomendado una compañera. La ubicacion es muy buena, los baños son compartidos, y te dan llave para que nadie entre cuando lo estas usando, son limpios y el agua caliente funcionaba bien. La habitacion era bastante deprimente, media 3 x 3 metros mas o menos, tenia un escritorio feo y una cama dura, y un aire acondicionado de ventana (no split) que si lo prendia no me dejaba dormir por el ruido y si lo apagaba me moria de calor. La habitacion parecia una celda de carcel. Lo bueno era el precio, y por suerte no pase mucho tiempo en la habitacion porque estuve paseando y de compras todo el dia. Pero la verdad no iria ahi con mi familia, y mucho menos a pasar unas vacaciones romanticas. El servicio a huespedes horrible, ni siquiera me quisieron asesorar para encontrar un shuttle para ir al aeropuerto. No te ayudan en nada, hay una escalera en la entrada y es bastante pesado subir y bajar valijas por ahi sin ayuda. Espero les sirva !

title: Buen opción para uno buscando alojamiento a bajo precio
text: Ubicación ideal frente al Central Park y a unos 300m del Metro, muy fácil para llegar a los lugares populares, en verdad se pasa muy poco en el hostel por eso mismo es un excelente opción para los que no buscan algo de lujo, o personas que buscan algo simple

title: Nie mehr YMCA West Side!!!!
text:
Falls es sich irgendwie vermeiden lässt, würde ich auf keinen Fall in diesem Hostel übernachten. Für diesen hohen Preis (152 SFr. für ein Doppelzimmer ohne Bad/WC) findet man sicherlich eine schönere und saubere, wenn auch nicht so zentrale Unterkunft.
Das einzig positive ist hier die sehr gute Lage (nähe Columbus Circle), auf den Rest hätte ich nur zu gerne verzichtet!
Bei der Ankunft wurde mir durch die unfreundlichen Mitarbeiter keinerlei Entgegenkommen für ein falsch gebuchtes Zimmer gezeigt. Da die Reisebestätigung auf Deutsch war und hier niemand Deutsch spricht, war für sie dieser Beleg irrelevant.
Die Zimmer sind klein und muffig. Die harten Sprunfedern der Matraze und der laute Lärmpegel der Kühlung im Innenhof liessen mich jede Nacht lange keinen Schlaf finden (durch lautes Musikhören kann diesem Problem zumindest teilweise entgegen gewirkt werden ;))
Die sanitären Anlagen waren grenzwertig. Seife scheint hier ein Fremdwort zu sein, die Waschbecken waren immer  total nass und es klebte Papier daran. In der Dusche kam mir als Erstes der Regulierungsknopf entgegen, ansonsten ok.
Der kleine Laden im Parterre ist ein Witz. Es ist hier nicht möglich mit Münz zu zahlen, nur mittels Kreditkarte oder Scheinen. Bezahlt wird nicht an einer Kasse sondern an einer Maschine, welche kein Rückgeld gibt. So habe ich am Schluss mit komischer Begründung für ein Becher heisses Wasser anstatt den angeschriebenen 54 Penny satte 2 Dollar hinblättern müssen.
Summa Summarum würde ich hier hier auf keinen Fall wieder übernachten und bin froh endlich abreisen zu können.
Zum Glück gibt es in New York so vieles zu Entdecken, so dass ich möglichst wenig Zeit im Hostel verbringen musste.

title: Great place to stay if you are travelling in a budget .
text: This is a great location, for young people who like to explore the city, It is situated right next to Central Park and only a 15-20 minute walk to time square. Even though the rooms are basic and small , they are very clean  and housekeeping was regular . Staff are friendly and me and my friend felt very safe. Bathrooms are keep relatively clean and showers were a good temperature, with clean towels given everyday . This hostel is perfect for travellers  as it is safe , clean and good if you are on a budget . I will definitely use YMCA hostels again !!

title: Ubicación excelente
text: Ubicación ideal frente al Central Park y a unos 300m del Metro. La habitación, para lo que la usamos, está perfecta (aunque pasamos un poco de frío). Los baños eran compartidos pero estaban limpios y nunca tuvimos que esperar para ducharnos. Ambiente tranquilo para la de chic@s jóvenes que había.

title: Un carcere nel verde
text: Posizione ottima ma condizioni della camera e dei bagni da zero. Rumore la sera tardi e veramente disagio per il bagno . Come posizione è ottima sia a piedi sia per i mezzi ma per il resto tutto negativo . Accoglienza minima e cordialità di certi operatori mancante proprio. Qualità e prezzo non vanno d'accordo .

title: Satisfied
text:
Simple rooms but good for sleeping. 
Good cleaning service. Clean toilets and showers.
Helpful staff. 
Good location near metro station and Central Park. 
We appreciated luggage storage ($2) in the last day.

title: Esperava mais
text: É um ambiente apenas para dormir, o quarto é apertado e pequeno mais pelo custo benefício é o suficiente para descansar a noite.  O banheiro é um pouco sujo no período da manhã e à noite, as camareiras costumam limpar antes ou depois do almoço. É seguro e a localização dele é perfeita, próximo a Times Square, Central Park, Apple, 5th avenida e o metrô fica na esquina.

title: Great Location, decent room for price
text: The location is great. The rooms are what you pay for. The bathrooms need ventilation and a good clean. I would recommend going down to the 3rd floor to use the gym showers and change room rather than using the hotel change room. The young man that first helped me was very helpful and professional, but the second woman with the crazy purple eye shadow could use a major lesson in customer service! She was just plain rude!

title: Martina, Nürnberg, 8 Nächte im Hostel
text:
Zum Empfehlen:
+ ca 70 m vom Central Park entfernt 
+ nächste U-Bahn-Station ist nur 3 bzw 4 Querstraßen entfernt
+ Zimmer waren immer geputzt
+ Handtücher, obwohl sie auf der Kleiderstange hingen, wurden selbstständig nach paar Tagen ausgetauscht
+ sobald ein Handtuch am Boden liegt bekommt man ein neues

Das Bett steht auf Rollen, aber ich fand dies nicht schlimm.

Nicht zum empfehlen:
- Seifenspender ging nach 2tem Tag an keinem der 4 waschbecken mehr. Wurde auch nicht repariert. 
- bei 1 Duschkabine ging nach paar Tagen Licht nicht mehr, wurde auch nicht repariert
- es wird kostenfreies Wlan angeboten, jedoch nur die ersten 3 tage des Aufenthaltes (Empfang ist aber nicht so gut)
- für diesen Preis ist kein Frühstück inbegriffen!!! Kann man sich im Kiosk kaufen bzw in den Geschäften/Starbucks an der Straßenkreuzung

title: ホテルの高いNYの中では、低価格・高立地!!
text:
初めての一人海外旅行時に使用しました。
ニューヨークはただでさえホテル代が高いうえに、一人部屋
１日中観光して寝るだけ…の私にはピッタリでした。

立地はセントラルパークまで徒歩１分
地下鉄の駅も近く、タイムズ・スクエアまで10分前後で行ける距離で
夜の出歩きも問題ないエリアでした。

学生やバックパッカーが多く、アメニティはバスタオルと石鹸のみ
シャワー・トイレは共同となりますが
２４時間カウンターもあり、ロビーには簡単なコンビニも有り便利でした。

部屋も広くないし、国内で同じ値段を出せば普通にホテルに泊まれる金額ではありますが
ニューヨークの他のホテルや、立地の悪い安ホテルと比較し
総合的には満足できました。
ベッドメイクも毎日行ってくれましたし、フロントマンの対応も良かったです。
１人で再びニューヨークに行く際には、選択肢に入るかと思います。

title: Não é muito ruim, mas é ruim
text:
Os preços em Manhattan são absurdos e, considerando um quarto individual por pouco mais de 100 dolares, o preço está bem abaixo do que se encontra na região. O hotel é muito bem localizado, em frente ao Central Park, próximo à estação Columbus Circle e a uma distância pequena de lugares mais badalados, como a Times Square, teatros da Broadway, etc. O hostel é super limpo, não vi sujeira nenhuma nos banheiros e os quartos eram limpos diariamente, com troca de lençóis e toalhas. O problema fica por conta das instalações dos quartos. As paredes têm mofo, o colchão é horrível, e alguns quartos não têm  wifi. Fiz minha reserva para  um quarto com
Vista da cidade, e só o que eu tinha era uma bista de janelas do mesmo prédio. Mandei um e-mail antes da minha chegada confirmando a existência ou não de wifi jos quartos e o jotel prontamente respondeu que todos os quartos tinham wifi. Porém, não tinham! Fui ver o que estava acontecendo na recepe a atendente foi super grossa e disse que eles nao tinham wifi nos quartos. Indaguei também sobre a bista e ela disse que não podiam garantir nenhuma vista pra nnhum hospede. Ou seja, estavam enganando e cobrando mais caro dos hospedes sendo que nao podem garantir nada. Depois de muito brigar, fui trocado de quarto com vista e wifi (tudo no mesmo andar, mesmo depois da atendente afirmar que eles não possuíam wifi nos quartos). Bom, no mais o hostel tem uma academia MARAVILHOSA, vale a pena marcar as aulas, nadar na piscina ou explorar a sala de ginástica.

title: Custo benefício
text: Os quartos, e em especial a cama, não são muitos confortáveis, mas estamos falando de um hostel. A localização é excelente, ao lado do Central Park e Lincoln Center, próximo à Times Square. O prédio possui piscina, academia, e diversos espaços de convivência, pois na verdade é um clube, dentro do qual há o hostel e os hóspedes podem usar toda estrutura sem custo adicional.

title: Pas mal et à bon prix
text:
pour une première à NYC, le choix de cette établissement a été motivé par le prix et son emplacement à 200m de Central Parc et en plein coeur de Manhattan.

Chambre correcte, idéal pour court séjour et les étudiant

title: Pretty crap place
text: Really bad room, really bad staff, really bad facilities, no extras (like all other hotels), wifi was difficult to attain, constantly too hot, it's like the literally didn't care about anyone in there and were just churning people in and out as fast and cheaply as possible.

title: Its just what it is
text: You will probably consider this hotel if you're short on cash. Great location. But the hotel is worn down. I'm not a picky type, but had to ask for another room when I found half-eaten food and used q-tips on the floor. Cleaning is not that good in showers. Walls are definitely not sound proof! More like cardboard-walls.

title: good location
text: The location of the hostel is quite convenient. Takes maybe 10-15 minutes to walk to Times square from the hostel. The staff was very friendly and helpful. Our room was quite nice, with a small tv screen in the corner and a small closet were we could hang our clothes. In the lobby of the hostel is a small shop where you could buy breakfast which was very convenient.

title: For what it costs, its great
text:
This was the cheapest place I could find for our NYC trip, and for what we paid, it was great. 

The rooms are small, the bunk beds are not really that comfortable and the elevators are slow. 

But, the location is fantastic and the price is very low. 

When your in NYC, you shouldn't be planning on spending too much time in the hotel, so I would highly recommend this.

title: Great value for money
text: I got what I expected. Simple, clean room. Friendly staff. Lots of facilities. Central location. Exactly what was needed after a long weary train trip! I'll certainly be back next time my travels take me through NYC.

title: Not the best...
text: It's hard to find cheap accommodation in New York, but we did our best and booked a double room in New York. This is a enormous hostel, with a lot of guests... Most of them older. The location was very very good, three blocks from Colombus Circle, just by Central Park. The room was ok, but nothing special at all! Very basic, with a bed and a desk. The shared bathroom was horrible! The toilets didn't always work, there were no paper and the showers were not very nice.. The staff i friendly. I good place to stay at if you have a tight budget, but don't have any high expectations on the rooms/bathrooms!

title: Decent for the price
text: My mom and I stayed here for a week. We had a bunk bed room, and the mattresses were comfy. However, the sheets were only changed once throughout the week we stayed. The room had ants, and housekeeping threw away our leftover food we had brought back from dinner the previous night. Besides the constant smell of wet carpet in the hallways and the ants, the stay was good enough. You get what you pay for here, nothing special but a place to sleep and rest if you need it. I wouldn't stay here again, but it is good for guests on a tight budget.

title: Boa localização
text:
Tem uma excelente localização, em frente ao lado do Lincon Center e do Cental Park a 2 quadras do Columbus Circle.

Um bom predio com otima academia, funcionários solicitos.

Fiquei em um quarto individual renovado com um bom espaco, armario, cama de solteiro, tv de lcd e escrivaninha. Entretanto o corredor era estranho e com muito mofo.

O banheiro poderia ser mais limpo, as cabines para banho eram pequenas com uma cortina que não tapava 100%.

Fiquei no 8 andar não sei se era apenas este ou comum mas no meu andar so tinham idosos não com aspecto de turista mas sim moradores dava um ar de abrigo e não de hostel de turismo.

title: Due punti solo per la posizione..
text:
Una bettola! Io ho soprannominato la mia stanza "San Vittore"! Ho soggiornato da sola per 3 notti e ho pagato circa di 365 $ in bassa stagione (solo per dormire!!!). Appena arrivata ho fatto la fila all'ingresso per il check in e mi hanno fatto pagare subito. Dopodichè mi hanno dato un foglietto con il numero della stanza, senza dirmi nulla, nè il piano nè dove sarei dovuta andare. Avevo due valige enormi ed ero sola, nessuno si è degnato di darmi una mano, nemmeno gli ospiti! La camera non ne parliamo. Avevo un letto con le rotelle che vagava per la stanza ogni volta che mi giravo, materasso durissimo, cuscino con bozzi, una mini scrivania, uno specchio e una barra di ferro  con alcuni appendini che fungeva da armadio. Piccolissima. Il riscaldamento della mia stanza era rotto (fuori c'erano -15/-20 gradi) e in quella stanza non si respirava, ci sanno stati almeno 40 gradi! Ho provato ad aprire la finestra ma era bloccata. Allora sono andata di nuovo alla reception per chiedere che venisse riparato. Dopo un'ora è arrivato l'addetto ad aggiustarlo, ma  l'indomani ero punto e a capo e ho dovuto chiamare di nuovo il tecnico. I bagni in comune erano puliti solo alle 8 del mattino, poi sporchissimi! Di notte un casino infernale, gente maleducata che urlava, correva avanti indietro, per fortuna avevo con me i tappi per le orecchie. E dire che io sono una persona che si adatta facilmente!!! Ho cercato di stampare il check in dell'aereo dal computer sul mio piano, ma la stampante si è bloccata e mi ha mangiato 5$...Ho chiamato il tecnico alla reception (si, probabilmente mi avranno odiato ahahah) che mi ha sbloccato la stampante, ma ho dovuto rimettere i soldi...
Tuttavia ha una posizione invidiabile, vicino a Columbus Circle, a due passi da Central Park e Time Square! Ho girato quasi tutto il centro di Manhattan a piedi! Poi c'è un bel via vai di gente di ogni nazionalitá e c'è una stanza al pianterreno dove si puó conversare con gli altri ospiti e fare giochi in scatola. Il wifi é presente in tutta la struttura, ma nella mia camera non prendeva molto bene.
Se non avete tante pretese e, soprattutto, avete MOOOOLTA pazienza lo consiglio. Altrimenti NO! Io di sicuro non ci torneró...

title: Bad bathrooms, normal rooms
text:
Disgusting bathrooms in the 9th floor. They are dirty, broken and clearly insufficient for everyone in the floor.

The rooms are small and basic, but they are cleaned everyday. They reflect the price paid, but the bathrooms clearly don't.

title: Muy buena ubicacion
text: La habitacion individual en el piso 13, todo el piso era mas antiguo que el resto, las habitacion tenian alfombra y habia un olor raro, los baños individuales de ese piso no estan remodelados, por lo cual es preferible ir a los baños en los pisos 10 u 11. La ubicacion es excelente frente a central Park. Llegue de noche, el auditor nocturno era poco informativo y amable, y te retienen el pasaporte hasta el otro dia que abre el chek in una ridiculez, de ultima se deberian quedar con una fotocopia! El WIFI no funciona en todo el edificio.

title: Basic needs met
text: Very basic hostel in a great location, covers all grounds. Nothing fancy at all, but for the price and location it can't be beaten. Bathrooms where a little untidy but that was due to the messiness of other patrons- not lack of cleaning by staff, they were cleaned daily, but probably could of used one extra clean, fresh sheets and towels were provided daily. Reception and security staff lovely. I was on a tight budget so I understood the amount i paid for the location I was in and dealt with the rough edges of this place.

title: DO NOT STAY HERE!! STAFF ARE CRIMINALS!!
text:
Had to PAY for luggage storage, which is in a secure location, behind security desk, many cameras pointing at the door. When I return to YMCA less than 4 hours after putting my luggage in safe area, I check my things only to find my Ipad had been stolen!!! The man at security refused to help, said that was nothing he could do. When I asked him to review the cameras he said, he wouldn't waste his time. "Do you know how many people go through there a day", I responded with " We have been gone less than 4 hours, when we put our bags in there, there were only 3 other bags and the same bags are still there!!! I highly doubt that many people PAID to put there bags in the LOCKED luggage storage room for 3.5 hours. They refuse to help you make a police report or contact the police, they only thing I could do is get in my cab that had been waiting and cry. Other than the lack of help from the staff, I could tell it was an inside job because....
The Ipad had been on my bed one day, so the house keepers left a note saying that they wouldn't be cleaning my rooms as I left my valuables around. My Macbook was left in my suitcase out of sight. Going back to when I realise my Ipad was stolen; I found it funny that they had taken only the Ipad and not the Macbook. This goes to show they new what they were looking for and once they found it the stopped looking through my bag. THIS PLACE IS DISGUSTING I cannot believe there are people like this in the world. Please do not enable this to happen to more people!

title: Great Stay.
text: Comfortable stay. The location of YMCA is perfect, right in front of Central Park. Rooms are small but clean. However, there are only three restrooms between many rooms. But overall it was a good experience.

title: Excelente
text: Localização excelente próximo a Brodway no upper west side, a poucos passos do central park, próximo a estação de metrô da 59a st. - columbusCircle onde passam várias linhas diferentes de metrô. Além de quartos individuais, é possível uti a piscina e a sala de ginástica. Limpeza nota 10.

title: Very bad
text:
A staff of the hostel entered in the room of my son and stole the charger. God sake the case was with a padlock.
Too much money paid in a place not secure.
At the end people was very nice but the charger does not come back.

title: Muy buena ubicación
text:
Excelente ubicación,  hostel que debería tener cocina, o en su defecto el buffet debería estar abierto durante más tiempo (cierra a las 19 hs). Este es muy completo en lo que ofrece para desayunos y comidas pero no se puede cenar por estar cerrado. 
Los baños son pequeños y para pocas personas (para tres al mismo tiempo) por piso, con más de 60 habitaciones en cada uno.
Excelente para deportistas!

title: Muy buena ubicación
text: Está muy bien ubicado, el precio corresponde perfectamente con la zona y la verdad, para donde está, es un precio super accesible. Es cierto que los baños son compartidos y a veces están sucios, pero los limpian todos los días. Los cuartos son  pequeñitos, apenas y cabes con dos maletas. El deli que está abajo es de un precio más accesible que los que están afuera y lo mejor de todo es que tienes acceso al gimnasio, está super grande, muy cómodo y abren a las 5:30 de la mañana, cierran a las 11 de la noche (creo).

title: Inexpensive...
text: Location is awesome, beds OK, price was rock-bottom. Plan to spend waking time outside, as there's nothing other than beds inside. Near Lincoln Center, Central Park, Carnegie Hall, Ghostbusters apartment.

title: Amazing Position
text:
It's a massive Hostel with pool and gym, 2 minutes walking from Central Park and Subway station..
The room was very small and basic but with everything that you need, and very clean..
If you are in New York you won't spend a lot of time in the Hostel so if you are traveling low budget it's perfect! =)

title: Everything is on your doorstep
text: What more could you ask for, with central park literally on your doorstep and walking access to all of Manhattans attractions. The room was clean and just big enough for one person, and never had an issue with the shared bathroom. If you're after luxury this is not the place, but if you're after cheap. comfortable and friendly accommodation then this is the place to stay. I will definitely stay here again. All the staff were welcoming and always offered assistance and it was great to be able to use the gym also!

title: You should not expect more for that money
text:
Pro
+Shared but individual bathrooms with privacy
+Cheap
+Location (less than 100 m walking distance to the amazing central park)
+Rooms were regularly cleaned
+AC
+Gym and Swimming pool
+Nice Staff

Con
-Wifi worked ony occasionally (approx. 50% of time)
-Bathrooms not that clean 
-Tiny rooms
-No kitchen

If you are looking for an affordable place to sleep in NYC and do not need a lot of luxury you should definitively go to that hostel. The location is amazing-you can walk to times square in 10 minutes. The area seemed to be safe - even at nights!

title: The best place ever
text: Awryte troops just a quick message from the bold as gold all saints.Me and a few eh the troops done a 5 day stint here . (Shoutout to Jamie,Payton,Ellie,Holly,Bekah,Will.I.Am,MarkyMark and DJ Duru)and I can honestly say I've never been to a better hostel One luxurious bunk he'd with pillows so soft ones head could be lost in swirls of dreams and happiness. the insects are some of the friendliest I've ever met and are always up for a game of cards Aye fair enough you'll pay 60 quid for a can of coke but fuk up ?Located next to some beautiful rat infested streets Aw these fuking daftys saying it's suite are Gonny end up getting cracked  10/10. In a word. Heaven

title: Não vale a pena
text: A localização é MARAVILHOSA, fica 5 minutos da Times Square e 2 minutos andando da entrada do Central Park, PORÉM os quartos são ruins, desconfortáveis, os corredores fedorentos, funcionários bem mal educados e o wifi não funciona em diversos andares.

title: Right at Central Park West gate
text: The location of the Y is awesome. Right at Central Park (I went three times during my 5 night stay), close enough to walk to Broadway down to Times Square (if you're in NYC on a Sunday I highly recommend this walk). Central to Starbucks and restaurants. Check out the fruit vendor on the corner. The staff are friendly and helpful. The rooms are very basic, but clean. The mattress however left a lot to be desired. After walking for hours everyday I really could have used a good rest. I didn't expect a 5 star mattress at all, but this one felt like a box with springs. It just didn't make for a comfortable stay. I know the YMCA is cheap accommodation, but I discovered during my stay, I could have done better for my money. I stayed there late spring, so the noisy air con was a necessity. On the plus side, the rooms were "people" quiet. The staff, location and the "market" were well worth a 4 rating, but the discomfort held me back from a 5 rating. Be warned: if you don't want to share a communal bathroom stay somewhere else. Frosted glass doors, and sharing a bathroom with other "girls" doesn't bother me, but if you'd feel uncomfortable or need to use the amenities frequently through the night you may want to re-think.

title: The worst place I have ever stayed
text: Stayed here one night, which was one night too many.  Have happily stayed in other YMCA accommodation before, but this one did not compare.  The room was literally rotting, the sensor lights tame on every time I rolled over in bed, the big box TV didn't work.  It was actually revolting.  My first thoughts on seeing the room was that this was a converted prison.  We were booked in for four nights, but cancelled the rest of our stay as it would have ruined our time in.NYC.  Not comfortable.

title: Hostel mais em conta em manhattan
text:
$100 dólares a diária para um hostel pode parecer salgado, mas considerando os preços de manhattan é uma boa pedida. Fica melhor se você está só de passagem, com 1 ou poucos dias. A localização é ótima, uma quadra do central park e dá pra caminhar para boa parte das principais atrações da cidade. 
Quando li os reviews de lá, o pessoal reclamava da limpeza dos banheiros compartilhados. Eu não tive problemas com isso.

title: Melhor lugar pra ficar em NYC
text: Sempre ficava no YMCA Vanderbilt ate conhecer a unidade do West Side. Ao lado do Central Park (se você tiver sorte, poderá ter uma vista do seu quarto para o parque). Fechei o quarto individual de luxe sem entender a diferenca desse para o individual com banheiro compartilhado. Grata surpresa, depois que eu passava meu cartão para entrar em um dos banheiros do corredor, esse ficava exclusivo.

title: Central location, clean, basic, good value
text: We two males both 60+ stayed for 6 nights in a two-bunk bed room with separate common bath. Basic room, just a TV and a small wardrobe, small table, nothing else, just enough room to put 2 small suitcases on the floor. 2 minutes walk to Central Park and 5 minutes walk to Columbus subway where you get trains in all directions made this a very good choice for us. Old people may not be able to climb up to the top bunk beds, which don't have any protective barrier to stop you from rolling over and falling off in sleep. One thing we didn't like was, if you arrive after 10:30PM the check-in counter is closed, Security staff have no access to your booking, they let us have a room but only temporarily, they took away our passports and refused to give receipt for it, which we think is unacceptable when we had paid in advance for 2 nights. Neat, get change of towels/sheets/soap daily in room service. Free wifi worked well but not on the last 2 of the 6 days we stayed, they didn't fix the problem.

title: Hell
text: The dirtiest, unfriendliest, and most expensive hostel I have ever stayed in. Do NOT stay here! The rooms were freezing and I was told the heating doesn't work, the toilet didn't flush and the showers and no hot water. What a horrible experience.

title: Manhattan
text: It was a nice ubication in front of central park. The room was ok for the price. The only worst was the service, for example, I asked for a towels and a soap, they told me that I must ask with the man of security he called somebody to give me the towals and soap but nobody wentbto my room, I have to used the same towel...

title: Excelente ubicacion.
text: Sin duda lo mejor que tiene este hotel es la ubicacion, es excelente! Todas las demas comodidades son aceptables, pero no son de lo mejor, los empleados son realmente muy amables. Este hotel es ideal para gente que va sola, o es joven y no va a estar mucho en el hotel y busca un buen precio.

title: Basic but fantastic location
text: Stayed here for 2 nights in May over Memorial day weekend and was very pleased.   A fantastic location right close to Lincoln Centre and Central Park.   Also very close to the 59th Street and Columbus circle subway station (from where you can get the Blue Line  A-train to & from  JFK airport). The rooms (I was in 2 different ones as I stayed a THursday and a Sunday night under 2 seperate bookings) were pretty basic and small.  But I was only in the room to sleep and the rest of the time was out.  The staff were very friendly and helpful. Esspecially the warm welcome when I arrived on the first day.  Everything was clean.  There was not much noise getting in the room from outside    I would definetly come back and stay here again (Indeed I plan to do this in the coming Winter season).

title: Excelente ubicación, todo lo demás...  mas o menos
